trans-unit.target: Võtsime Iisraeli laste üle mere ja vaarao ja tema sõdurid kiusas neid türannia ja vaen kuni, kui uppumine tabas teda, ta ütles: "usun, et puudub jumalus, et kelles Iisraeli lapsed usuvad ja olen ka moslemite."

trans-unit.source: Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters?
trans-unit.target: Nüüd? Ja sa olid täiuslik [talle] enne ja olid ka corrupters?

trans-unit.source: So today We will save you in body that you may be to those who succeed you a sign. And indeed, many among the people, of Our signs, are heedless
trans-unit.target: Nii et täna me salvestada te keha, mis võib olla neile, kellel õnnestub märk. Ja tõepoolest, paljud meie märke inimeste seas on heedless

trans-unit.source: And We had certainty settled the Children of Israel in an agreeable settlement and provided them with good things. And they did not differ until [after] knowledge had come to them. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ
trans-unit.target: Ja meil oli kindlalt väljakujunenud Iisraeli lastele meeldiv kokkulepet ja andis neile häid asju. Ja nad ei erinenud kuni [kui] teadmised olid tulnud neile. Tõepoolest, oma Issanda hindavad nende ülestõusmist päev selle üle, mida nad kasutasid erinevad vahel

trans-unit.source: So if you are in doubt, [O Muhammad], about that which We have revealed to you, then ask those who have been reading the Scripture before you. The truth has certainly come to you from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.
trans-unit.target: Nii et kui teil on kahtlusi, [O Muhammad], sellest, mis meil näitas teile, siis küsi nendelt, kes olnud lugemine pühakirja enne. Tõde on kindlasti tulevad sind oma Issanda, nii et kunagi olla üks kahtlejaid.

trans-unit.source: And never be of those who deny the signs of Allah and [thus] be among the losers.
trans-unit.target: Ja kunagi olema need, kes eitavad Jumala märke ning [seega] seas kaotajad.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those upon whom the word of your Lord has come into effect will not believe,
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kelle oma Issanda sõna on jõustunud pärast ei usu,

trans-unit.source: Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Isegi kui kõik märgid neile, kuni nad näevad valus karistuse.

trans-unit.source: Then has there not been a [single] city that believed so its faith benefited it except the people of Jonah? When they believed, We removed from them the punishment of disgrace in worldly life and gave them enjoyment for a time.
trans-unit.target: Siis seal ei ole [üks] city, mis arvatavasti nii oma usus saanud välja arvatud Jonah inimesi? Kui nad uskusid, meil eemaldatakse neilt häbiplekk karistuse maise elu ja andis neile naudingut aega.

trans-unit.source: And had your Lord willed, those on earth would have believed - all of them entirely. Then, [O Muhammad], would you compel the people in order that they become believers?
trans-unit.target: Ja oli oma Issanda kombeks, need, mis on maa peal oleks uskunud - kõik need täielikult. Seejärel, [O Muhammad], oleks te sundida inimesi, et nad Hakka usklikud?

trans-unit.source: And it is not for a soul to believe except by permission of Allah, and He will place defilement upon those who will not use reason.
trans-unit.target: Ei ole hinge arvata välja arvatud loata Jumal ja ta paigutab defilement neile, kes ei kasuta põhjus.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Observe what is in the heavens and earth." But of no avail will be signs or warners to a people who do not believe
trans-unit.target: Öelda, "Jälgida, mis on taevas ja maa." Aga mingit on märke või warners on inimestele, kes ei usu

trans-unit.source: So do they wait except for like [what occurred in] the days of those who passed on before them? Say, "Then wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait."
trans-unit.target: Nii et ärge nad oodata välja arvatud nagu [mis esines] päevad, kes enne neid edasi? Öelda: "oodake; Tõepoolest, ma olen teiega nende seas, kes ootama."

trans-unit.source: Then We will save our messengers and those who have believed. Thus, it is an obligation upon Us that We save the believers
trans-unit.target: Siis me päästab meie kullerid ja need, kes oleks uskunud. Seega on kohustus meid, et me salvestada usklikud

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "O people, if you are in doubt as to my religion - then I do not worship those which you worship besides Allah; but I worship Allah, who causes your death. And I have been commanded to be of the believers
trans-unit.target: Ütlen, [O Muhammad], "O inimesi, kui olete kindel, et minu religioon - siis ma palvelette, mis te kummardama peale Jumal; kuid ma teenida Jumalat, kes põhjustab oma surma. Ja mind on kästud olevat usklike

trans-unit.source: And [commanded], 'Direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth, and never be of those who associate others with Allah;
trans-unit.target: Ja [käskis], "otse oma nägu religiooni poole, kallutamist tõde ja kunagi olema, kes seostavad teised Jumal;

trans-unit.source: And do not invoke besides Allah that which neither benefits you nor harms you, for if you did, then indeed you would be of the wrongdoers.'"
trans-unit.target: Ja tugineda peale et mis ei ole kasu te ega kahjustab sind, Jumal, kui sa, siis tõepoolest sa oleks selle tagaotsitavate kohta. ""

trans-unit.source: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him; and if He intends for you good, then there is no repeller of His bounty. He causes it to reach whom He wills of His servants. And He is the Forgiving, the Merciful
trans-unit.target: Ja kui Jumal peaks Katsu sa ebaõnne, ei mingit remover see välja arvatud tema; ja kavatseb teile hea, siis ei ole repeller tema halastus. Ta põhjustab tegemiseks, kellele ta tahab tema teenistujate. Ja ta on Forgiving, mille Merciful

trans-unit.source: Say, "O mankind, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul, and whoever goes astray only goes astray [in violation] against it. And I am not over you a manager."
trans-unit.target: Öelda: "O inimkonnale, tõde on pärit teile teie Issand nii kes juhindub üksnes huvitavad [kasuks] tema hing, ja kes iganes läheb astray ainult läheb eksitada [on] selle vastu. Ja ma ei ole sul juht."

trans-unit.source: And follow what is revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and be patient until Allah will judge. And He is the best of judges.
trans-unit.target: Ja järgi, mida on näidanud teile [O Muhammad], ja kannatlik, kuni Jumal kas kohtunik. Ja ta on parim kohtunikust.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book whose verses are perfected and then presented in detail from [one who is] Wise and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Hotell Alif, Lam, Ra. [on] raamat mille salmid täiuslikuks ja seejärel esitada üksikasjalikult [üks, kes on] tark ja Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: [Through a messenger, saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a warner and a bringer of good tidings,"
trans-unit.target: [Läbi sõnumitooja, öeldes], "ei kummarda Jumalat peale. Olen teile teda ka warner ja rõõmusõnumit, kandjad."

trans-unit.source: And [saying], "Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him, [and] He will let you enjoy a good provision for a specified term and give every doer of favor his favor. But if you turn away, then indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a great Day.
trans-unit.target: Ja [ütles] "otsima andestust oma Issanda ja talle, parandage meelt [ja] ta laseb teil nautida head sätet tähtajaliselt ja annab iga inimeseks kasuks tema kasuks. Aga kui sa tõlgivad, siis tõepoolest, ma kardan teile suur päev karistuse.

trans-unit.source: To Allah is your return, and He is over all things competent."
trans-unit.target: Jumal on teie tagasi, ja ta on üle kõik asjad pädev."

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, they the disbelievers turn away their breasts to hide themselves from Him. Unquestionably, [even] when they cover themselves in their clothing, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Kahtlemata on uskottomille nad tõlgivad rindades peita end teda. Kahtlemata [isegi] kui nad otsa end oma nahas, Jumal teab mida nad varjata ja mida nad deklareerida. Ta on tõepoolest, teades, et maksimaalselt rinnad.

trans-unit.source: And there is no creature on earth but that upon Allah is its provision, and He knows its place of dwelling and place of storage. All is in a clear register.
trans-unit.target: Ja ei ole olend maal, kuid et pärast Jumal on selle sätte ja ta teab oma eluruumi ja töökoha ladustamise. Kõik on selge registris.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days - and His Throne had been upon water - that He might test you as to which of you is best in deed. But if you say, "Indeed, you are resurrected after death," those who disbelieve will surely say, "This is not but obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: Ja see on ta loonud kuus päeva - taeva ja maa ja pärast vee - ta võib see test teile kumb teist on parim tegu oli olnud tema trooni. Aga kui te ütlete, "Tõepoolest, te ei Ülestõusnud pärast surma," kes usu. will kindlasti öelda, "See ei ole aga ilmne võlu."

trans-unit.source: And if We hold back from them the punishment for a limited time, they will surely say, "What detains it?" Unquestionably, on the Day it comes to them, it will not be averted from them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui me tagasi hoida neid karistuse piiratud aja jooksul, nad kindlasti öelda, "mida detains see?" Kahtlemata on tegemist neid päeval see näidatakse tuleb neilt ära hoida ja nad on ümbrisega poolt mida nad naeruvääristama.

trans-unit.source: And if We give man a taste of mercy from Us and then We withdraw it from him, indeed, he is despairing and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui me anda mees halastust maitse meilt ja siis me lõpetada selle talle, tõepoolest, ta on Meeleheitel ja tänamatu.

trans-unit.source: But if We give him a taste of favor after hardship has touched him, he will surely say, "Bad times have left me." Indeed, he is exultant and boastful -
trans-unit.target: Kuid kui anname talle kasuks maitse pärast raskusi ei puudutanud teda, ta kindlasti öelda, "halbade aegade loobuma mind." Tõepoolest, ta on exultant ja hooplev-

trans-unit.source: Except for those who are patient and do righteous deeds; those will have forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud need, kes on patsiendi ja teha õiged teod; need on andestus ja suur auhind.

trans-unit.source: Then would you possibly leave [out] some of what is revealed to you, or is your breast constrained by it because they say, "Why has there not been sent down to him a treasure or come with him an angel?" But you are only a warner. And Allah is Disposer of all things.
trans-unit.target: Oleks võimalik, et lahkud [saada] mõned mida on näidanud teile või teie rindade piirab see sest nad ütlevad, "Põhjus, miks seal pole saadetud talle aare või tuled temaga ingel?" Aga sa oled ainult warner. Ja Jumal on kõik asjad jäätmekõrvaldaja.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Say, "Then bring ten surahs like it that have been invented and call upon [for assistance] whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Või nad ütlevad, "Ta leiutas ta"? Öelda: "siis Tooge kümme surahs meeldib, et on leiutatud ja kutsuda [abi] keda iganes saad peale Allahi kui peaksite olema tõesed."

trans-unit.source: And if they do not respond to you - then know that the Qur'an was revealed with the knowledge of Allah and that there is no deity except Him. Then, would you [not] be Muslims?
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad ei allu te - siis tead Koraan avastati Allah teadmisel ja et ei ole jumalus, välja arvatud tema. Seejärel, kas [ei] oleksite moslemid?

trans-unit.source: Whoever desires the life of this world and its adornments - We fully repay them for their deeds therein, and they therein will not be deprived.
trans-unit.target: Kes iganes tahab elu selles maailmas ja selle oodata olevale ajale - me täielikult tagasi maksma neile nende teod seal ja nad seal mitte ilma.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones for whom there is not in the Hereafter but the Fire. And lost is what they did therein, and worthless is what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Need on need, kellele on seal ei tule aga edaspidi. Ja kadunud on, mida nad seal tegid ja väärtusetu on, mida nad varem ei.

trans-unit.source: So is one who [stands] upon a clear evidence from his Lord [like the aforementioned]? And a witness from Him follows it, and before it was the Scripture of Moses to lead and as mercy. Those [believers in the former revelations] believe in the Qur'an. But whoever disbelieves in it from the [various] factions - the Fire is his promised destination. So be not in doubt about it. Indeed, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Nii on üks kes [seisab] selgeid tõendeid tema Lord [nagu eespool]? Tunnistaja teda järgmisel ja varem oli see pühakirja Moses juhtima, aga halastust. Need [usklike endine paljastusi] usu Koraani. Aga kes iganes disbelieves ta [eri] fraktsioonide - tulekahju on tema lubas sihtkohta. Nii et saa pole kahtlust. Tõepoolest, see on tõe oma Issanda, kuid enamik inimesi ei usu.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah? Those will be presented before their Lord, and the witnesses will say, "These are the ones who lied against their Lord." Unquestionably, the curse of Allah is upon the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Ja kes on rohkem alusetu, kui ta, kes leiutab lie Jumalat umbes? Need esitatakse enne nende Issand ja tunnistajad ütlevad, "Need on need, kes valetas vastu nende Issand." Vaieldamatult, Jumala needus on peale selle tekitaja.

trans-unit.source: Who averted [people] from the way of Allah and sought to make it [seem] deviant while they, concerning the Hereafter, were disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Kes ära hoida [inimesed] sellest, kuidas Jumal ja otsis teha see [tunduvad] deviant kui nad puudutavad edaspidi, olid uskottomille.

trans-unit.source: Those were not causing failure [to Allah] on earth, nor did they have besides Allah any protectors. For them the punishment will be multiplied. They were not able to hear, nor did they see.
trans-unit.target: Need olid põhjustab [Jumalat] ei maa peal ega tegid nad mingit peale Allah kaitsjad. Neid korrutatakse karistuse. Neil ei olnud võimalik kuulda, ega nad ei näe.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones who will have lost themselves, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Need on need, kes on kaotanud ise ja kaotanud neilt on mida nad leiutada.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, it is they in the Hereafter who will be the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: Totisesti, on nad edaspidi, kes on suurimad kaotajad.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds and humbled themselves to their Lord - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide eternally therein.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes on uskunud ja teinud õiged teod ja alandlikuks ise nende Issand - need on kaaslased paradiis; nad järgivad igavesti sealsamas.

trans-unit.source: The example of the two parties is like the blind and deaf, and the seeing and hearing. Are they equal in comparison? Then, will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: Näiteks pooled meeldib pime ja kurt ja ei näe ja kuulmise. On nad võrdsed võrdluses? Siis sa ei mäleta?

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Indeed, I am to you a clear warner
trans-unit.target: Ja meil oli kindlasti saadetakse Noah oma rahvale, [ütles], "olen teile selge warner

trans-unit.source: That you not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a painful day."
trans-unit.target: Et te ei kummarda Jumalat peale. Tõepoolest, ma kardan sulle valus päev karistuse."

trans-unit.source: So the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "We do not see you but as a man like ourselves, and we do not see you followed except by those who are the lowest of us [and] at first suggestion. And we do not see in you over us any merit; rather, we think you are liars."
trans-unit.target: Nii väljapaistev nende seas, kes disbelieved tema inimestelt ütles, "me näeme aga kui mees meeldib end ja me ei näe järgisite välja arvatud need, kes madalaimad meist [ja] kell esimene soovitus. Ja me ei näe sind meie üle mingit põhjal; pigem on meie arvates oled valetas."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord while He has given me mercy from Himself but it has been made unapparent to you, should we force it upon you while you are averse to it?
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "minu inimesed on teil kaaluda O: kui peaks olgu selged tõendid: minu Issand, samal ajal, kui ta on andnud mulle halastust alates ise, kuid see on tehtud unapparent teile, peaks me sundida teda teie peale Kuigi teil on tõrksad seda?

trans-unit.source: And O my people, I ask not of you for it any wealth. My reward is not but from Allah. And I am not one to drive away those who have believed. Indeed, they will meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people behaving ignorantly.
trans-unit.target: Ja O minu inimesed palun mitte ning see mingit rikkust. Minu palk ei ole aga Jumalalt. Ja ma ei ole üks juhtida ära need, kes oleks uskunud. Tõepoolest, meet nende Issand, kuid ma näen, et olete inimesed käituvad ignorantly.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I drove them away? Then will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Ja O mu inimesed, kes kaitsevad mind Jumal kui sõitsin neid ära? Siis sa ei meelde?

trans-unit.source: And I do not tell you that I have the depositories [containing the provision] of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel, nor do I say of those upon whom your eyes look down that Allah will never grant them any good. Allah is most knowing of what is within their souls. Indeed, I would then be among the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Ja ma ütlen teile, et mul on Jumal [sisaldava sätte] hoiukohaks või et ma tean, et on nähtamatu, samuti kas ma teile öelda, et ma olen ingel, ega ma ütlen, need, kelle silmad odavnema upon et Allah on kunagi anda neile midagi head. Allah on enamik teades, mis on maksimaalselt oma hinge. Tõepoolest, siis oleksin ka Petturite hulgas."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Noah, you have disputed us and been frequent in dispute of us. So bring us what you threaten us, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O Noah, teil on vaidlustanud meile ja olnud sagedased vaidlevad meist. Nii toovad meid sa ähvardab meid, kui sa peaksid olema ka tõepärast."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Allah will only bring it to you if He wills, and you will not cause [Him] failure.
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Jumal ainult toob see teile kui ta tahab, ja sa ei põhjusta [talle] rike.

trans-unit.source: And my advice will not benefit you - although I wished to advise you - If Allah should intend to put you in error. He is your Lord, and to Him you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: Ja minu nõuanne on kasulik teile - kuigi tahtsin teile nõu - kui Jumal kui kavatseb panna teid viga. Ta on teie Issand, ja temaga saad tagasi."

trans-unit.source: Or do they say [about Prophet Muhammad], "He invented it"? Say, "If I have invented it, then upon me is [the consequence of] my crime; but I am innocent of what [crimes] you commit."
trans-unit.target: Või nad ütlevad [umbes prohvet Muhammad], "leiutas ta"? Öelda: "kui mul on leiutatud, siis mu peale on [tulemus] minu kuritegevus; Aga ma olen süütu, millised kuritegude oled endale. "

trans-unit.source: And it was revealed to Noah that, "No one will believe from your people except those who have already believed, so do not be distressed by what they have been doing.
trans-unit.target: Ja selgus, et Noa, et "keegi ei usu oma inimestelt, välja arvatud need, kes on juba uskusid, et mitte olla hädas mida nad olen teinud.

trans-unit.source: And construct the ship under Our observation and Our inspiration and do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are [to be] drowned."
trans-unit.target: Ja ehitada laeva all meie vaatlus- ja meie inspiratsiooni ja ei puuduta mind puudutavad need, kes on vääriti koheldud; nad tegelevad [olevat] uppunud. "

trans-unit.source: And he constructed the ship, and whenever an assembly of the eminent of his people passed by him, they ridiculed him. He said, "If you ridicule us, then we will ridicule you just as you ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Ta ehitatud laeva ja alati silmapaistev oma rahva vastu võetud teda koostus neil teleekraanil teda. Ta ütles: "kui te naeruvääristada meile, siis me naeruvääristamine sind nagu te naeruvääristada.

trans-unit.source: And you are going to know who will get a punishment that will disgrace him [on earth] and upon whom will descend an enduring punishment [in the Hereafter]."
trans-unit.target: Ja te ei kavatse teada, kes saavad karistuse, mis Häbi talle [maal] ja kelle laskuvad kestev karistuse [in edaspidi]."

trans-unit.source: [So it was], until when Our command came and the oven overflowed, We said, "Load upon the ship of each [creature] two mates and your family, except those about whom the word has preceded, and [include] whoever has believed." But none had believed with him, except a few.
trans-unit.target: [Nii et see oli], kui meie käsk tuli ja ahju kuni ületäitumise, me ütlesime "Koormuse korral laeva iga [olend] kaks semud ja teie pere, välja arvatud need, kelle sõna on ees ja [lisada] kes on uskunud." Kuid ükski uskus temaga, välja arvatud mõned.

trans-unit.source: And [Noah] said, "Embark therein; in the name of Allah is its course and its anchorage. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Ja [Noah] ütles: "alustada nimele Allah on oma kursuse ja selle kinnitus. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on Forgiving ja Merciful."

trans-unit.source: And it sailed with them through waves like mountains, and Noah called to his son who was apart [from them], "O my son, come aboard with us and be not with the disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: Ja see sõitnud nendega läbi lainete nagu mäed ja noa kutsus oma pojale, kes oli peale [neid], "O mu poeg, tule meiega pardal ja ei tohi olla ka uskottomille."

trans-unit.source: [But] he said, "I will take refuge on a mountain to protect me from the water." [Noah] said, "There is no protector today from the decree of Allah, except for whom He gives mercy." And the waves came between them, and he was among the drowned.
trans-unit.target: [Kuid] ta ütles: "Ma võta varjupaika kaitsta mind vette mägi." [Noah] ütles: "Ei ole kaitsja täna dekreedi Allah, välja arvatud, kellele ta annab armu." Ja lained tulid nende vahel, ja ta oli seas ning uppus.

trans-unit.source: And it was said, "O earth, swallow your water, and O sky, withhold [your rain]." And the water subsided, and the matter was accomplished, and the ship came to rest on the [mountain of] Judiyy. And it was said, "Away with the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: Ja öeldi, "O maa, neelama oma vee ja O taevas, mitte anda [rain]." Ja vesi taandunud, ja asi sai teoks ja laev tuli puhkama [mägi] Judiyy. Ja see oli öelnud, "Far valesti inimestega."

trans-unit.source: And Noah called to his Lord and said, "My Lord, indeed my son is of my family; and indeed, Your promise is true; and You are the most just of judges!"
trans-unit.target: Ja noa ta isand helistas ning ütles: "Issand, tõepoolest minu poeg on minu pere; ja tõepoolest, teie lubadus on tõsi; ja te olete kõige vaid Kohtumõistjate!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "O Noah, indeed he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge. Indeed, I advise you, lest you be among the ignorant."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "O noa, tõepoolest ta ei ole teie pereliikmed; ta on tõepoolest [üks kelle] töö oli peale õigemeelsed, nii et millest te ei tea kohta ei küsi. Tõepoolest, ma teile nõu, muidu seas asjatundmatu."

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from asking that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have mercy upon me, I will be among the losers."
trans-unit.target: [Noah] ütles: "Issand, ma otsima varjupaika sa küsida, et millest mul vähimatki. Ja kui olete Vabandage ja halasta mu peale, ma olen kaotajad seas."

trans-unit.source: It was said, "O Noah, disembark in security from Us and blessings upon you and upon nations [descending] from those with you. But other nations [of them] We will grant enjoyment; then there will touch them from Us a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Öeldi, "O noa laevale julgeolekus meilt ja õnnistagu teid ja rahvaste [kahanevas] neist teiega. Kuid teiste rahvaste [neist] me anda naudingut; siis seal on puudutada neid meilt valus karistuse."

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, [O Muhammad]. You knew it not, neither you nor your people, before this. So be patient; indeed, the [best] outcome is for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Mis on nähtamatu, mis me avaldada teile [O Muhammad] Uudised. Sa teadsid seda mitte, ei teie ega ka teie inimesed, enne seda. Nii kannatlik; [parim] tulemused on tõepoolest õige.

trans-unit.source: And to 'Aad [We sent] their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. You are not but inventors [of falsehood].
trans-unit.target: Ja "Aad [saatsime] oma venna Hud. Ta ütles: "O minu inimesed kummardama Jumalat; teil puudub jumalus talle peale. Sa ei ole, kuid leiutajate [kohta valetamine].

trans-unit.source: O my people, I do not ask you for it any reward. My reward is only from the one who created me. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: O minu rahvas, ma palun teid mitte seda mingit tasu. Minu tasu on ainult see, kes lõi mind. Siis näidatakse teile mitte põhjus?

trans-unit.source: And O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in showers and increase you in strength [added] to your strength. And do not turn away, [being] criminals."
trans-unit.target: Ja O minu inimesed kohanes oma Issanda ja talle siis kahetsema. Ta saadab [rain alates] kohati teie peale taevas ja suurenemine tugevust [lisada] oma tugevust. Ja ära Pööra, [on] kurjategijaid."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Hud, you have not brought us clear evidence, and we are not ones to leave our gods on your say-so. Nor are we believers in you.
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O Hud, teil on toonud meile kindlad tõendid ja me ei ole need jätta meie jumalad oma say-so. Ega me sind usklikud.

trans-unit.source: We only say that some of our gods have possessed you with evil." He said, "Indeed, I call Allah to witness, and witness [yourselves] that I am free from whatever you associate with Allah
trans-unit.target: Me ainult öelda, et mõned meie jumalad on vallanud sa paha." Ta ütles: "tõepoolest, ma helistada Allah tunnistajaks ja tunnistaja [ise] et ma vabaks iganes on seostada Allah

trans-unit.source: Other than Him. So plot against me all together; then do not give me respite.
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud teda. Nii krundi vastu mulle kõik koos; siis anna mulle kergendust.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord. There is no creature but that He holds its forelock. Indeed, my Lord is on a path [that is] straight."
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, mul on tugineda Jumal, minu Issand ja oma Issanda. Ei ükski olend, vaid et ta hoiab oma Otsajouhet. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on [see] tee sirge. "

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [say], "I have already conveyed that with which I was sent to you. My Lord will give succession to a people other than you, and you will not harm Him at all. Indeed my Lord is, over all things, Guardian."
trans-unit.target: Aga kui nad pöörduvad ära, [öelda], "Mul on juba toimetatud et kellega ma teile saadetud. Issand annab pärimisõiguse inimestele peale teile ja te ei kahjusta teda üldse. Issand on tõepoolest, kõik asjad üle eestkostja."

trans-unit.source: And when Our command came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us; and We saved them from a harsh punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui meie käsk tuli, päästis Hud ja need, kes usuvad temaga, halastuse meilt; ja me päästnud neid karmi karistuse.

trans-unit.source: And that was 'Aad, who rejected the signs of their Lord and disobeyed His messengers and followed the order of every obstinate tyrant.
trans-unit.target: Ja see oli ' Aad, kes lükkas märke nende Issand ja tema inglid täiuslik ja kirikuõpetaja iga jonnakas türann.

trans-unit.source: And they were [therefore] followed in this world with a curse and [as well] on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, 'Aad denied their Lord; then away with 'Aad, the people of Hud.
trans-unit.target: Ja seejärel [seega] sõlmiti selles maailmas needus ja [ning] edasi ülestõusmise päev. Kahtlemata ' Aad eitas nende Issand; seejärel minema ' Aad, Hud inimesed.

trans-unit.source: And to Thamud [We sent] their brother Salih. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. He has produced you from the earth and settled you in it, so ask forgiveness of Him and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive."
trans-unit.target: Ja Thamud [saatsime] oma venna Salih. Ta ütles: "O minu inimesed kummardama Jumalat; teil puudub jumalus talle peale. Ta on valmistatud maa ja sa elama, nii et palun andestust temast ja temaga siis kahetsema. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on lähedal ja osavõtlikud."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Salih, you were among us a man of promise before this. Do you forbid us to worship what our fathers worshipped? And indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O Salih, sa olid meie seas mees tõotatud enne seda. Kas te hoidku meid kummardama meie isad kummardasid? Ja tõepoolest oleme, sellest kuhu saadate meile, disquieting kaheldav."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has given me mercy from Himself, who would protect me from Allah if I disobeyed Him? So you would not increase me except in loss.
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "O minu inimesed kas te lugeda: kui oleksin korral: minu Issand ja ta on andnud mulle halastust ise, kes kaitsevad mind Jumal kui ma ei kuuletunud teda? Nii sa ei suurenda mulle peale kaotsimineku.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, this is the she-camel of Allah - [she is] to you a sign. So let her feed upon Allah 's earth and do not touch her with harm, or you will be taken by an impending punishment."
trans-unit.target: Ja O mu inimesed, see on Jumal she-camel - [on ta] teile märk. Nii et lase teda toita Jumala 's maa peal ja ei puutu teda koos kahju või siis võetakse eelseisva karistuse."

trans-unit.source: But they hamstrung her, so he said, "Enjoy yourselves in your homes for three days. That is a promise not to be denied."
trans-unit.target: Aga nad Läänerinde teda, ta ütles, "Naudi ennast oma kodus kolm päeva. See on lubadus, et ei saa eitada."

trans-unit.source: So when Our command came, We saved Salih and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us, and [saved them] from the disgrace of that day. Indeed, it is your Lord who is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Nii et kui meie käsk tuli, oleme päästetud Salih ja need, kes usuvad temaga, meilt, halastust ja [päästnud neid] sel päeval häbiplekk. Tegelikult on Sinu Jumal, kes on võimas ja ülendatud võiks.

trans-unit.source: And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
trans-unit.target: Selle kriiskamine kinni need, kes oli ülekohtu ja nad said jooksul langenud kõhuli kodudest [surnukehad]

trans-unit.source: As if they had never prospered therein. Unquestionably, Thamud denied their Lord; then, away with Thamud.
trans-unit.target: Nagu siis, kui nad olid kunagi prospered sealsamas. Kahtlemata Thamud eitas nende Issand; siis ära koos Thamud.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did Our messengers come to Abraham with good tidings; they said, "Peace." He said, "Peace," and did not delay in bringing [them] a roasted calf.
trans-unit.target: Ja kindlasti ei meie kullerid kaasas Aabrahamile rõõmusõnumit; nad ütlesid: "Rahu." Ta ütles: "Rahu," ja ei viivitaks tuues [neid] röstitud vasikas.

trans-unit.source: But when he saw their hands not reaching for it, he distrusted them and felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not. We have been sent to the people of Lot."
trans-unit.target: Aga kui ta nägi oma käed ei ulatu see, ta mitteusaldusväärsena neid ja tundsin neist kinnipidamist. Nad ütlesid: "Ära karda. Meil on saadetud palju inimesi."

trans-unit.source: And his Wife was standing, and she smiled. Then We gave her good tidings of Isaac and after Isaac, Jacob.
trans-unit.target: Tema naine seisis ja ta naeratas. Siis andsime oma rõõmusõnumit Isaac ja Iisak, Jaakob pärast.

trans-unit.source: She said, "Woe to me! Shall I give birth while I am an old woman and this, my husband, is an old man? Indeed, this is an amazing thing!"
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "häda! Peab sünnitama ma kuigi ma olen naine ja see, mu abikaasa on vana mees? Tõepoolest, see on hämmastav asi!"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Are you amazed at the decree of Allah? May the mercy of Allah and His blessings be upon you, people of the house. Indeed, He is Praiseworthy and Honorable."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "on teil üllatunud Allah dekreet? Võib armoilla Jumala ja tema õnnistusi olgu teile, inimesed maja. Tõepoolest, ta on Praiseworthy ja lugupeetud."

trans-unit.source: And when the fright had left Abraham and the good tidings had reached him, he began to argue with Us concerning the people of Lot.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui ehmatus oli jätnud Aabrahami ja häid sõnumeid jõudnud teda, ta hakkas meile palju inimeste vaielda.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Abraham was forbearing, grieving and [frequently] returning [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, Abraham oli hoidumise leinavad ja [sageli] tulles [Jumalat].

trans-unit.source: [The angels said], "O Abraham, give up this [plea]. Indeed, the command of your Lord has come, and indeed, there will reach them a punishment that cannot be repelled."
trans-unit.target: [Inglid ütlesid], "O Abraham, loobuda käesoleva väite. Tõepoolest, oma Issanda käsu kätte jõudnud, ja tõepoolest, seal jõuab neid karistuse, mis ei saa tõrjutakse."

trans-unit.source: And when Our messengers, [the angels], came to Lot, he was anguished for them and felt for them great discomfort and said, "This is a trying day."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui meie kullerid [inglid] tuli palju, ta oli Ahdistunut neid ja tundis neile suur ebamugavustunne ja ütles: "See on üritab päev."

trans-unit.source: And his people came hastening to him, and before [this] they had been doing evil deeds. He said, "O my people, these are my daughters; they are purer for you. So fear Allah and do not disgrace me concerning my guests. Is there not among you a man of reason?"
trans-unit.target: Oma rahvast tuli talle hastening ja [see] enne nad olid teinud kurja tegusid. Ta ütles: "O minu rahvas, need on mu tütart; nad on teile puhtamaks. Nii karda Jumalat ja häbi mulle kohta oma külalistele. Kas mitte teie mees põhjus seas? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "You have already known that we have not concerning your daughters any claim, and indeed, you know what we want."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Teil on juba teada, et oleme seotud oma tütart iga väite, tõepoolest, sa tead, mida me tahame."

trans-unit.source: He said, "If only I had against you some power or could take refuge in a strong support."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Kui ainult mul oli sinu vastu CMO või võiks varjuma tugevat toetust."

trans-unit.source: The angels said, "O Lot, indeed we are messengers of your Lord; [therefore], they will never reach you. So set out with your family during a portion of the night and let not any among you look back - except your wife; indeed, she will be struck by that which strikes them. Indeed, their appointment is [for] the morning. Is not the morning near?"
trans-unit.target: Inglid ütlesid: "O palju, tõepoolest oleme Inglid Issand; [seega], nad ei saavuta kunagi te. Nii esitatud koos perega tolliinspektuur ajal osa öö ja lase mõni teie seast otsida tagasi - välja arvatud su naine; Tõepoolest, olen ta tabanud selle, mis lööb neile. Tõepoolest, määratakse ametisse [jaoks] hommikul. Ei ole hommikul lähedal?"

trans-unit.source: So when Our command came, We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of layered hard clay, [which were]
trans-unit.target: Nii et kui meie käsk tuli, tegime [linn] kõrgeimas osas kõige madalam ja rained neile kihiline kõva savi, kivid, [mis olid]

trans-unit.source: Marked from your Lord. And Allah 's punishment is not from the wrongdoers [very] far.
trans-unit.target: Tähistada oma Issanda. Ja Jumala karistus ei pärine tagaotsitavate [väga] kaugele.

trans-unit.source: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. And do not decrease from the measure and the scale. Indeed, I see you in prosperity, but indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day.
trans-unit.target: Ja Madyan [saatsime] oma venna Shu'ayb. Ta ütles: "O minu inimesed kummardama Jumalat; teil puudub jumalus talle peale. Ning vähendab meede ja skaala. Tõepoolest, ma näen sind heaolu, kuid tõepoolest, kardan teile kõike päev karistuse.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, give full measure and weight in justice and do not deprive the people of their due and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption.
trans-unit.target: Ja O minu inimesed anda täielik meetme ja kaal justiits ja võta inimesed saavad nõuetekohaselt ja pannud kuritarvitamise maal, levib korruptsiooni.

trans-unit.source: What remains [lawful] from Allah is best for you, if you would be believers. But I am not a guardian over you."
trans-unit.target: Mida veel [õiguspärase] Allah on parim teile, kui teil oleks usklikud. Aga ma ei ole eestkostja teie üle. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Shu'ayb, does your prayer command you that we should leave what our fathers worship or not do with our wealth what we please? Indeed, you are the forbearing, the discerning!"
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O Shu'ayb, kas teie palve käsin teid et me peaks lahkuma meie isad kummardama või pole pistmist meie rikkust, mida me palun? Tõepoolest, olete hoidumise, on tähelepanelikumad!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I am upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has provided me with a good provision from Him...? And I do not intend to differ from you in that which I have forbidden you; I only intend reform as much as I am able. And my success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "O minu inimesed kas te lugeda: kui ma olen korral minu Issand ja ta on andnud mulle hea näha teda...? Ja ma ei kavatse erine sinult seda, mis on keelatud sa; Kavatsen reformi ainult niipalju, kui ma võin. Ja minu edu ei ole aga kaudu Allah. Talle on panin ja teda ma tagasi.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, let not [your] dissension from me cause you to be struck by that similar to what struck the people of Noah or the people of Hud or the people of Salih. And the people of Lot are not from you far away.
trans-unit.target: Ja O minu inimesed lasta ei [oma] lahkhelisid minult hakkate tabas sarnane mis tabas Noah inimesed või inimesed Hud või Salih inimesed selle. Ja paljud inimesed ei ole kaugel sinult.

trans-unit.source: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate."
trans-unit.target: Ja paluda andestust oma Issanda ja talle siis kahetsema. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on Merciful ja Affectionate."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Shu'ayb, we do not understand much of what you say, and indeed, we consider you among us as weak. And if not for your family, we would have stoned you [to death]; and you are not to us one respected."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O Shu'ayb, me ei saa aru palju, mida sa ütled, ja tõepoolest, me kaaluda sind meie seas nõrk. Ja kui mitte teie perele, me oleks on kividega sa [surnuks]; ja te ei ole meile üks kinni. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, is my family more respected for power by you than Allah? But you put Him behind your backs [in neglect]. Indeed, my Lord is encompassing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "O minu inimesed on minu pere rohkem austada Power teie kui Jumal? Kuid teda panna [on hooletusse] teie selja taga. Tõepoolest, minu Issand hõlmab mida teha.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, work according to your position; indeed, I am working. You are going to know to whom will come a punishment that will disgrace him and who is a liar. So watch; indeed, I am with you a watcher, [awaiting the outcome]."
trans-unit.target: Ja O minu inimesed töötavad vastavalt oma positsioonile; Tõepoolest, ma töötan. Te ei kavatse teada, kellele tulevad karistuse, mis talle häbi ja kes on valetaja. Niiet; Tõepoolest, ma olen teiega watcher, [ootavad tulemust]."

trans-unit.source: And when Our command came, We saved Shu'ayb and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us. And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
trans-unit.target: Ja kui meie käsk tuli, päästis Shu'ayb ja need, kes usuvad temaga, meie halastust. Selle kriiskamine kinni need, kes oli ülekohtu ja nad said jooksul langenud kõhuli kodudest [surnukehad]

trans-unit.source: As if they had never prospered therein. Then, away with Madyan as Thamud was taken away.
trans-unit.target: Nagu siis, kui nad olid kunagi prospered sealsamas. Siis ära koos Madyan nagu Thamud ära võeti.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: Ja me kindlasti ei saada Moses meie märke ja selget volitust

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they followed the command of Pharaoh, and the command of Pharaoh was not [at all] discerning.
trans-unit.target: Vaarao ja tema asukoha, kuid nad järele vaarao käsk ja käsu vaarao ei olnud [üldse] tähelepanelikumad.

trans-unit.source: He will precede his people on the Day of Resurrection and lead them into the Fire; and wretched is the place to which they are led.
trans-unit.target: Ta eelneb oma rahva ülestõusmist päev ning viia neid Tulle; ja armetu on koht, kuhu nad lähevad.

trans-unit.source: And they were followed in this [world] with a curse and on the Day of Resurrection. And wretched is the gift which is given.
trans-unit.target: Ja seejärel sõlmiti selles [Maailm] needus ja ülestõusmise päev. Ja armetu on kingitus, mis on antud.

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the cities, which We relate to you; of them, some are [still] standing and some are [as] a harvest [mowed down].
trans-unit.target: Mis on uudis linnad, mis on seotud teile; neid, mõned [veel] püsti ja mõned on [nagu [niitmiseks] lõikust].

trans-unit.source: And We did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves. And they were not availed at all by their gods which they invoked other than Allah when there came the command of your Lord. And they did not increase them in other than ruin.
trans-unit.target: Ja me tegin valesti neid, kuid nad ülekohtu ise. Ja nad olid kasutanud üldse oma jumalad, mis nad tugineda, välja arvatud Jumal kui tuli käsk oma Issanda poolt. Ja nad ei kasvanud neid peale häving.

trans-unit.source: And thus is the seizure of your Lord when He seizes the cities while they are committing wrong. Indeed, His seizure is painful and severe.
trans-unit.target: Ja seega on oma Issanda arestimine, kui ta haarab linnad, kuigi nad tegelevad vale. Tõepoolest, tema arestimine on valus ja raske.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign for those who fear the punishment of the Hereafter. That is a Day for which the people will be collected, and that is a Day [which will be] witnessed.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, et on märk neile, kes kardavad edaspidi karistuse. St päev, mille inimesed on kogutud, ja see on päev, [mis] tunnistajaks.

trans-unit.source: And We do not delay it except for a limited term.
trans-unit.target: Ja me ei viivitaks see välja arvatud piiratud aja jooksul.

trans-unit.source: The Day it comes no soul will speak except by His permission. And among them will be the wretched and the prosperous.
trans-unit.target: Tegemist ei ole hinge päeval kõneleb peale tema loata. Ja nende hulgas on selle armetu ja on jõukas.

trans-unit.source: As for those who were [destined to be] wretched, they will be in the Fire. For them therein is [violent] exhaling and inhaling.
trans-unit.target: Aga need, kes olid [sinna olevat] armetu, neid tulekahju. Neid seal on [tugev] exhaling ja sissehingamist.

trans-unit.source: [They will be] abiding therein as long as the heavens and the earth endure, except what your Lord should will. Indeed, your Lord is an effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: [Neid] seaduskuulekad seal seni, kuni taevas ja maa taluma, välja arvatud teie Issandat tuleks näidatakse. Tõepoolest, teie Issand on effecter, mida ta kavatseb esitada.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who were [destined to be] prosperous, they will be in Paradise, abiding therein as long as the heavens and the earth endure, except what your Lord should will - a bestowal uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes olid [määratud olema] jõukas, neid paradiisis, seaduskuulekad seal seni, kuni taevas ja maa taluma, välja arvatud, mida teie Issandat tuleks näidatakse - teenetemärgi katkematu.

trans-unit.source: So do not be in doubt, [O Muhammad], as to what these [polytheists] are worshipping. They worship not except as their fathers worshipped before. And indeed, We will give them their share undiminished.
trans-unit.target: Et ei oleks kahtluse korral [O Muhammad], et need [polytheists] on jumalateenistustel. Nad kummardavad mitte välja nagu nende isad kummardasid enne. Ja tõepoolest, me anname neile nende osa loobunud.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.
trans-unit.target: Ja kindlasti oli andnud Moses pühakiri, kuid see allus lahkarvamused. Ja kui mitte jaoks sõna, mis eelnes teie Issand, see oleks hinnatud nende vahel. Ja tõepoolest nad on, Koraan, disquieting kahtluse kohta.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, each [of the believers and disbelievers] - your Lord will fully compensate them for their deeds. Indeed, He is Acquainted with what they do.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, iga [usklikud ja uskottomille] - teie Issand näidatakse täielikult hüvitama neid nende teod. On tutvunud tõepoolest, mida nad teevad.

trans-unit.source: So remain on a right course as you have been commanded, [you] and those who have turned back with you [to Allah], and do not transgress. Indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Mistõttu jäävad õige muidugi, kui teil on kästud, [te] ja need, kes on pöördunud tagasi teiega [Jumalat], ja rikuvad. Tõepoolest, ta nägi mida teha.

trans-unit.source: And do not incline toward those who do wrong, lest you be touched by the Fire, and you would not have other than Allah any protectors; then you would not be helped.
trans-unit.target: Ja suunitluse poole, kes valesti, muidu ei puudutata tulekahju, ja te ei ole muud Jumalat kui tahes kaitsjad; siis te sooviksite ei saa midagi.

trans-unit.source: And establish prayer at the two ends of the day and at the approach of the night. Indeed, good deeds do away with misdeeds. That is a reminder for those who remember.
trans-unit.target: Ja kehtestada palve algus päev ja öö lähenemine. Tõepoolest, kas ära heateod üleastumised. See on meeldetuletus neile, kes mäletavad.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.
trans-unit.target: Ja kannatlik, sest tõepoolest, Allah ei luba kaduma need, kes seda hea palk.

trans-unit.source: So why were there not among the generations before you those of enduring discrimination forbidding corruption on earth - except a few of those We saved from among them? But those who wronged pursued what luxury they were given therein, and they were criminals.
trans-unit.target: Miks olid seal hulgas põlvedele enne nende kestev diskrimineerimist keelavad korruptsiooni maa - välja arvatud mõned neist me salvestamata nende seast? Kuid need, kes ülekohtu taotletavad milline luksus neile anti seal ja nad olid kurjategijad.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord would not have destroyed the cities unjustly while their people were reformers.
trans-unit.target: Ja teie Issand ei on hävitanud linnade ebaõiglaselt saavad inimesed olid reformaatorid.

trans-unit.source: And if your Lord had willed, He could have made mankind one community; but they will not cease to differ.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui teie Issand oli kombeks, ta oleks võinud inimkonna üks ühenduses; kuid nad ei ole enam erinevad.

trans-unit.source: Except whom your Lord has given mercy, and for that He created them. But the word of your Lord is to be fulfilled that, "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and men all together."
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud kellele teie Issand on andnud armu ja et ta on loonud. Kuid oma Issanda sõna on täidetud olevat, et "Ma kindlasti täidab põrgu dzinni ja mehed kõik koos."

trans-unit.source: And each [story] We relate to you from the news of the messengers is that by which We make firm your heart. And there has come to you, in this, the truth and an instruction and a reminder for the believers.
trans-unit.target: Ja iga [lugu] me seotud sind kullerid Uudised on, et millega me kindlalt oma südames. Ja seal on tulnud teile, see tõde ja juhis ning usklikud meeldetuletuse.

trans-unit.source: And say to those who do not believe, "Work according to your position; indeed, we are working.
trans-unit.target: Ja öelda neile, kes ei usu, "toimi vastavalt oma seisukohta; Tõepoolest, me töötame.

trans-unit.source: And wait, indeed, we are waiting."
trans-unit.target: Ja oota, tõepoolest, ootame."

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belong the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth and to Him will be returned the matter, all of it, so worship Him and rely upon Him. And your Lord is not unaware of that which you do.
trans-unit.target: Ja Allah kuuluvad nähtamatu [aspekte] taeva ja maa ja talle tagastatakse asja, kõik see, nii teda kummardama ja usaldada teda. Ja teie Issand ei ole teadlikud, mida te teete.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the clear Book.
trans-unit.target: Hotell Alif, Lam, Ra. Need on salmid selged raamat.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, meil on saatnud seda Araabia Koraan, et saate aru.

trans-unit.source: We relate to you, [O Muhammad], the best of stories in what We have revealed to you of this Qur'an although you were, before it, among the unaware.
trans-unit.target: Me seotud sind [O Muhammad] parimaid lugusid mida me näitasid teile käesoleva Koraani kuigi te oli äärmiselt keeruline, on teadmata.

trans-unit.source: [Of these stories mention] when Joseph said to his father, "O my father, indeed I have seen [in a dream] eleven stars and the sun and the moon; I saw them prostrating to me."
trans-unit.target: [Need lood mainida] kui Joseph ütles, et tema isa, "O isaga tõepoolest olen näinud [unistus] üksteist tähte ja päikese ja kuu; Ma nägin neid prostrating mulle. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my son, do not relate your vision to your brothers or they will contrive against you a plan. Indeed Satan, to man, is a manifest enemy.
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "O mu poeg ei käsitle oma nägemust oma venda või nad on contrive teie vastu plaan. Tõepoolest Saatanal, mees, on ilmne vaenlane.

trans-unit.source: And thus will your Lord choose you and teach you the interpretation of narratives and complete His favor upon you and upon the family of Jacob, as He completed it upon your fathers before, Abraham and Isaac. Indeed, your Lord is Knowing and Wise."
trans-unit.target: Ning seega näidatakse teie Issand teil valida ja õpetab narratiive tõlgendamise ja lõpetada tema kasuks te ja pere Jacob, kui ta lõpetas ta pärast oma isade enne Aabraham ja Iisak. Tõepoolest, teie Issand on teades ja tark."

trans-unit.source: Certainly were there in Joseph and his brothers signs for those who ask,
trans-unit.target: Kindlasti olid seal Joosep ja tema vennad märgid neile, kes küsivad,

trans-unit.source: When they said, "Joseph and his brother are more beloved to our father than we, while we are a clan. Indeed, our father is in clear error.
trans-unit.target: Kui nad ütlesid, "Joosep ja tema vend on armastatud meie isa meie, kui oleme klanni. Tõepoolest, meie isa on selge viga.

trans-unit.source: Kill Joseph or cast him out to [another] land; the countenance of your father will [then] be only for you, and you will be after that a righteous people."
trans-unit.target: Joseph tappa või teda purskas, [teine] maale; oma isa Pale [siis] olema sinu jaoks, ja sul on pärast, et õiged inimesed."

trans-unit.source: Said a speaker among them, "Do not kill Joseph but throw him into the bottom of the well; some travelers will pick him up - if you would do [something]."
trans-unit.target: Ütles kõneleja seas neid, "ära tapa Joseph aga visata teda alumise osa hästi; mõned reisijad elavneb teda - kui teeks [midagi]."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O our father, why do you not entrust us with Joseph while indeed, we are to him sincere counselors?
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O meie isa, miks sa ei usaldada meile Joseph kuigi tõepoolest, me oleme temaga siiras nõuandjaid?

trans-unit.source: Send him with us tomorrow that he may eat well and play. And indeed, we will be his guardians.
trans-unit.target: Talle saata meile homme ta võib hästi süüa ja mängida. Ja tõepoolest, me palvetame tema hooldajatega.

trans-unit.source: [Jacob] said, "Indeed, it saddens me that you should take him, and I fear that a wolf would eat him while you are of him unaware."
trans-unit.target: [Jacob] ütles: "Tõepoolest, see kurvastab mind, et te peaksite teda, ja ma kardan, et Hunt oleks süüa teda kui olete temast teadlik."

trans-unit.source: They said, "If a wolf should eat him while we are a [strong] clan, indeed, we would then be losers."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Kui Hunt peaks talle süüa, kuigi oleme [tugev] klanni, tõepoolest, siis oleksime kaotajad."

trans-unit.source: So when they took him [out] and agreed to put him into the bottom of the well... But We inspired to him, "You will surely inform them [someday] about this affair of theirs while they do not perceive [your identity]."
trans-unit.target: Nii võttis ta [väljas], ja nõustus pani ta all hästi... Aga me inspireeris teda, "Te näidatakse kindlasti informeerida [ühel päeval] see asi ise samal ajal, kui nad tajuvad [teie isikut]."

trans-unit.source: And they came to their father at night, weeping.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad tulid oma isa öösel, nuttes.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O our father, indeed we went racing each other and left Joseph with our possessions, and a wolf ate him. But you would not believe us, even if we were truthful."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O meie isa tõepoolest käisime racing üksteist ja jäänud Joseph meie omandit ja hunt sõi teda. Aga sa ei usu meid, isegi siis, kui olime tõepärast."

trans-unit.source: And they brought upon his shirt false blood. [Jacob] said, "Rather, your souls have enticed you to something, so patience is most fitting. And Allah is the one sought for help against that which you describe."
trans-unit.target: Ja nad tõid tema särk vale vere korral. [Jacob] ütles: "pigem oma hinge on ahvatletakse teid midagi, nii et kannatust on kõige paigaldamise. Ja Jumal on üks otsis abi vastu see, mis te kirjeldaksite. "

trans-unit.source: And there came a company of travelers; then they sent their water drawer, and he let down his bucket. He said, "Good news! Here is a boy." And they concealed him, [taking him] as merchandise; and Allah was knowing of what they did.
trans-unit.target: Ja tuli ettevõtte reisijad; siis nad saatsid oma vee sahtlis ja ta lasi maha tema ämber. Ta ütles: "hea uudis! Siin on poiss." Ja neid varjata talle [võttes teda] kaupadega; ja Allah oli teades, mida nad tegid.

trans-unit.source: And they sold him for a reduced price - a few dirhams - and they were, concerning him, of those content with little.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad müüsid teda alandatud hinnaga - mõned dirhams - ja nad olid, teda vähe nende sisu kohta.

trans-unit.source: And the one from Egypt who bought him said to his wife, "Make his residence comfortable. Perhaps he will benefit us, or we will adopt him as a son." And thus, We established Joseph in the land that We might teach him the interpretation of events. And Allah is predominant over His affair, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ja see Egiptusest, kes ostis talle öelnud, et tema abikaasa "muuta elamise mugavaks. Võib-olla ta on meile kasulik, või võtame teda poeg." Ja seega me loodud Joseph maal, et me võiks õpetada talle sündmuste tõlgendamist. Ja Jumal on ülekaalus üle tema asi, kuid enamik inimesi ei tea.

trans-unit.source: And when Joseph reached maturity, We gave him judgment and knowledge. And thus We reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui Joseph tähtajaga, andsime talle kohtuotsuse ja teadmisi. Ja seega me tasu hea Kurjategijaist.

trans-unit.source: And she, in whose house he was, sought to seduce him. She closed the doors and said, "Come, you." He said, "[I seek] the refuge of Allah. Indeed, he is my master, who has made good my residence. Indeed, wrongdoers will not succeed."
trans-unit.target: Ja ta kelle majas oli, üritas teda võrgutada. Ta suletud uste ja ütles: "tule, teile." Ta ütles: "[ma otsima] Allah varjupaika. Tõepoolest, ta on mu isand, kes on teinud head minu elukoht. Tõepoolest, tagaotsitavate õnnestub."

trans-unit.source: And she certainly determined [to seduce] him, and he would have inclined to her had he not seen the proof of his Lord. And thus [it was] that We should avert from him evil and immorality. Indeed, he was of Our chosen servants.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta kindlasti määrata [meelitama] teda, ja ta oleks on valmis teda ta ei näinud oma isanda tõend. Seega [oli] et meil tuleks vältida teda kurja ja amoraalsus. Tõepoolest, ta oli meie valitud teenistujate.

trans-unit.source: And they both raced to the door, and she tore his shirt from the back, and they found her husband at the door. She said, "What is the recompense of one who intended evil for your wife but that he be imprisoned or a painful punishment?"
trans-unit.target: Ja nad mõlemad tormasid uks, ja ta rebis tema särk tagant ja nad leidsid tema abikaasa ukse juures. Ta ütles: "mis on üks, kes seda kurja oma naine, vaid et ta saab kinni registreerimiskohas või valus karistus"?

trans-unit.source: [Joseph] said, "It was she who sought to seduce me." And a witness from her family testified. "If his shirt is torn from the front, then she has told the truth, and he is of the liars.
trans-unit.target: [Joseph] ütles: "See oli ta kes püüdsid võrgutada mind." Ja tema perekond tunnistas tunnistaja. "Kui tema särk rebitakse eestpoolt, siis ta on rääkinud tõtt, ja ta on valetas.

trans-unit.source: But if his shirt is torn from the back, then she has lied, and he is of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Aga kui tema särk rebitakse taga, siis ta valetas, ja ta on esitatud tõesed."

trans-unit.source: So when her husband saw his shirt torn from the back, he said, "Indeed, it is of the women's plan. Indeed, your plan is great.
trans-unit.target: Jah, kui tema abikaasa nägi tema särk seljas, haaras ta ütles: "ongi naiste plaani. Teie plaan on tõepoolest suurepärane.

trans-unit.source: Joseph, ignore this. And, [my wife], ask forgiveness for your sin. Indeed, you were of the sinful."
trans-unit.target: Joseph, ignoreerige seda. Ja [minu abikaasa], kohanes oma pattu. Tõepoolest, sa olid sugulise."

trans-unit.source: And women in the city said, "The wife of al-'Azeez is seeking to seduce her slave boy; he has impassioned her with love. Indeed, we see her [to be] in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Ja naiste linna ütles: "naine al-'Azeez püüab võrgutada oma orja poiss; ta on Kiihkeä teda armastusega. Tõepoolest, me näeme teda [tuleb] selge viga."

trans-unit.source: So when she heard of their scheming, she sent for them and prepared for them a banquet and gave each one of them a knife and said [to Joseph], "Come out before them." And when they saw him, they greatly admired him and cut their hands and said, "Perfect is Allah! This is not a man; this is none but a noble angel."
trans-unit.target: Nii et kui ta kuulnud oma intrigeeriv, ta saatis neile ja valmis neid bankett ja andis igaühele neist nuga ja ütles [Joseph], "Come out käsitlusega." Ja kui nad nägid teda, nad suuresti imetlenud teda ja lõigata oma käed ja ütles: "täiuslik on Jumal! See ei ole mees; See pole aga üllas ingel."

trans-unit.source: She said, "That is the one about whom you blamed me. And I certainly sought to seduce him, but he firmly refused; and if he will not do what I order him, he will surely be imprisoned and will be of those debased."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "see on üks umbes kes sa süüdistada mind. Ja ma kindlasti otsis meelitama teda, kuid ta keeldus kindlalt; ja kui ta ei tee ma et teda, ta kindlasti saab kinni ja nende alustest on."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, prison is more to my liking than that to which they invite me. And if You do not avert from me their plan, I might incline toward them and [thus] be of the ignorant."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Issand, vangla on minu maitse järgi rohkem kui see, mida nad kutsuvad mind. Ja kui sa ei ära hoida mind nende plaan, ma võiks incline suunas neid ja [seega] olema asjatundmatu."

trans-unit.source: So his Lord responded to him and averted from him their plan. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Nii ta isand vastas talle ja hoidnud teda oma plaani. Tõepoolest, ta on kuulmine, ning teades.

trans-unit.source: Then it appeared to them after they had seen the signs that al-'Azeez should surely imprison him for a time.
trans-unit.target: Siis selgus, neile pärast seda, kui nad olid näinud märke selle al-'Azeez tuleks kindlasti vangistada teda aega.

trans-unit.source: And there entered the prison with him two young men. One of them said, "Indeed, I have seen myself [in a dream] pressing wine." The other said, "Indeed, I have seen myself carrying upon my head [some] bread, from which the birds were eating. Inform us of its interpretation; indeed, we see you to be of those who do good."
trans-unit.target: Ja kantakse vangla temaga kaks noormeest. Üks neist ütles: "Tõepoolest, olen näinud ise [in unistus] vajutades veini." Teine ütles: "tõepoolest, olen näinud ise pärast minu peas, [mõned] leib, kust linnud sõid veavad. Teavita meid oma tõlgenduse; Tõepoolest, me näeme, kes kas hea olla."

trans-unit.source: He said, "You will not receive food that is provided to you except that I will inform you of its interpretation before it comes to you. That is from what my Lord has taught me. Indeed, I have left the religion of a people who do not believe in Allah, and they, in the Hereafter, are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "sa ei saa toitu pakutakse teile välja, et ma teile oma tõlgenduse teatada enne, kui tegemist on teile. See on, mida Issand on õpetanud mulle. Tõepoolest, mul on jäänud inimesed, kes ei usu Jumalat religioon ja nad, edaspidi, on uskottomille.

trans-unit.source: And I have followed the religion of my fathers, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob. And it was not for us to associate anything with Allah. That is from the favor of Allah upon us and upon the people, but most of the people are not grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ja olen jälginud minu isad, Aabraham, Iisak ja Jaakob religioon. Ja see ei olnud meile midagi seostamiseks Allah. Mis on kasuks Jumal meid ja pärast inimesed, kuid enamik inimesi ei ole tänulik.

trans-unit.source: O [my] two companions of prison, are separate lords better or Allah, the One, the Prevailing?
trans-unit.target: O [minu] kahe kaaslasega vangla, on eraldi lords parem või Jumal, üks on Prevailing?

trans-unit.source: You worship not besides Him except [mere] names you have named them, you and your fathers, for which Allah has sent down no authority. Legislation is not but for Allah. He has commanded that you worship not except Him. That is the correct religion, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Te kummardama mitte lisaks teda välja arvatud [pelgalt] nimed on nimeks neid, sina ja sinu isad, mille Jumal on saatnud oma autoriteeti. Õigusaktid ei ole vaid Jumal. Ta on olnud nii et kummardavad teda ei arvatud. Mis on õige religioon, kuid enamik inimesi ei tea.

trans-unit.source: O two companions of prison, as for one of you, he will give drink to his master of wine; but as for the other, he will be crucified, and the birds will eat from his head. The matter has been decreed about which you both inquire."
trans-unit.target: O kahe kaaslasega vangla, mis puudutab teist, ta annab juua isanda veini; kuid nagu ka teiste, ta on risti ja linnud söövad tema pea. Asja abielulahutusprotsessil kohta, mis sind nii küsida."

trans-unit.source: And he said to the one whom he knew would go free, "Mention me before your master." But Satan made him forget the mention [to] his master, and Joseph remained in prison several years.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta ütles, et üks, kellele ta teadis, et läheks tasuta, "Mainida minu enne teie kapten." Kuid Saatan tegi temast unustada mainida [–] oma isanda ja Joseph oli vanglas mitu aastat.

trans-unit.source: And [subsequently] the king said, "Indeed, I have seen [in a dream] seven fat cows being eaten by seven [that were] lean, and seven green spikes [of grain] and others [that were] dry. O eminent ones, explain to me my vision, if you should interpret visions."
trans-unit.target: Ja [hiljem] kuningas ütles: "tõepoolest, olen näinud [seitse unistus] rasva seitsmega, [see oli] söönud lehmad lean, ja seitse roheline naelu [ja tera] ja teiste [see oli] kuiv. O väljapaistvate ones, mulle selgitada minu nägemus, kui tuleks tõlgendada nägemusi."

trans-unit.source: They said, "[It is but] a mixture of false dreams, and we are not learned in the interpretation of dreams."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "[on aga] a segu vale unenäod, ja me ei õppinud tõlgendamisel unistused."

trans-unit.source: But the one who was freed and remembered after a time said, "I will inform you of its interpretation, so send me forth."
trans-unit.target: Kuid see, kes oli vabanenud ja meenus, pärast seda, kui on aeg ütles: "ma informeerib teid nende tõlgendamise nii saatke mulle edasi."

trans-unit.source: [He said], "Joseph, O man of truth, explain to us about seven fat cows eaten by seven [that were] lean, and seven green spikes [of grain] and others [that were] dry - that I may return to the people; perhaps they will know [about you]."
trans-unit.target: [Ütles], "Joseph, tõde, Oh inimene selgitab meile umbes seitse rasva lehmade söönud seitsmega, [see oli] lean, ja seitse roheline naelu [ja tera] ja teiste [see oli] kuiv - ma võib naasta inimesed; võib-olla nad teavad [te]."

trans-unit.source: [Joseph] said, "You will plant for seven years consecutively; and what you harvest leave in its spikes, except a little from which you will eat.
trans-unit.target: [Joseph] ütles: "sul taim seitse aastat järjest; ja mida sa saagi jätta oma naelu: mis sa sööd natuke teisiti.

trans-unit.source: Then will come after that seven difficult [years] which will consume what you saved for them, except a little from which you will store.
trans-unit.target: Siis hakkab järele tulla, et seitsme raske [aasta] mis võtab enda alla neile salvestasite, v.a vähe, mida kavatsete.

trans-unit.source: Then will come after that a year in which the people will be given rain and in which they will press [olives and grapes]."
trans-unit.target: Siis tulevad pärast seda aastas, kus rahvale antakse vihma ja kus nad vajutage [oliive ja viinamarju]."

trans-unit.source: And the king said, "Bring him to me." But when the messenger came to him, [Joseph] said, "Return to your master and ask him what is the case of the women who cut their hands. Indeed, my Lord is Knowing of their plan."
trans-unit.target: Ja kuningas ütles: "Tooge ta mulle." Kuid kui sõnumitooja tuli temale [Joseph] ütles: "tagasi oma master ja küsida temalt, mis on nii naised, kes lõigatud käsi. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on teades nende plaan."

trans-unit.source: Said [the king to the women], "What was your condition when you sought to seduce Joseph?" They said, "Perfect is Allah! We know about him no evil." The wife of al-'Azeez said, "Now the truth has become evident. It was I who sought to seduce him, and indeed, he is of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: [King naised], ütles "Mis oli teie seisund, kui sa püüdsid võrgutada Joseph?" Nad ütlesid: "täiuslik on Jumal! Me teame tema kohta ei ole paha." Naine al-'Azeez ütles: "nüüd tõde on selgunud. See olin mina, kes otsis meelitama teda ja ta on tõepoolest kohta on tõesed.

trans-unit.source: That is so al-'Azeez will know that I did not betray him in [his] absence and that Allah does not guide the plan of betrayers.
trans-unit.target: See tähendab nii al-'Azeez tead, et ma ei reeda talle [tema] puudumisel ja et Jumal juhend äraandjaiks plaani.

trans-unit.source: And I do not acquit myself. Indeed, the soul is a persistent enjoiner of evil, except those upon which my Lord has mercy. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Ja ma täitmiseks endale aega. Tõepoolest, hing on püsivate enjoiner paha, välja arvatud need, mille Issand on halastusest. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on Forgiving ja Merciful."

trans-unit.source: And the king said, "Bring him to me; I will appoint him exclusively for myself." And when he spoke to him, he said, "Indeed, you are today established [in position] and trusted."
trans-unit.target: Ja kuningas ütles: "Tooge ta mulle; I nimetab teda ainult enda eest." Ja kui ta rääkis talle, ta ütles: "Tõepoolest, olete täna asutatud [asukoht] ja usaldusväärsed."

trans-unit.source: [Joseph] said, "Appoint me over the storehouses of the land. Indeed, I will be a knowing guardian."
trans-unit.target: [Joseph] ütles: "mind üle maa väljakuulutamisel nimetada. Tõepoolest, räägin teades eestkostja."

trans-unit.source: And thus We established Joseph in the land to settle therein wherever he willed. We touch with Our mercy whom We will, and We do not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.
trans-unit.target: Ja seega me loodud Joseph maal elama seal, kus iganes ta kombeks. Me ühendust meie halastust, kellega meil on ja me ei luba kaduma need, kes seda hea palk.

trans-unit.source: And the reward of the Hereafter is better for those who believed and were fearing Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ja edaspidi soodustus on parem neile, kes uskusid ja olid kartes Allah.

trans-unit.source: And the brothers of Joseph came [seeking food], and they entered upon him; and he recognized them, but he was to them unknown.
trans-unit.target: Ja vennad Joseph tuli [Keda toidu], ja nad sisenesid talle; ja ta tunnustatud neid, kuid ta oli neile tundmatu.

trans-unit.source: And when he had furnished them with their supplies, he said, "Bring me a brother of yours from your father. Do not you see that I give full measure and that I am the best of accommodators?
trans-unit.target: Ja kuna ta oli sisustatud neile nende tarnete, ütles ta, "tooge mulle sinu vend oma isalt. Kas sa ei näe et ma annan kogu meetme ja accommodators parim olen?

trans-unit.source: But if you do not bring him to me, no measure will there be [hereafter] for you from me, nor will you approach me."
trans-unit.target: Kuid kui te tuua ta mulle, ei saa kohaldada kas tuleb [edaspidi] teile minult, ega te lähenemine mind."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We will attempt to dissuade his father from [keeping] him, and indeed, we will do [it]."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "me püüab veenda oma isa: [pidamine] teda, ja tõepoolest, me teeme [ta]."

trans-unit.source: And [Joseph] said to his servants, "Put their merchandise into their saddlebags so they might recognize it when they have gone back to their people that perhaps they will [again] return."
trans-unit.target: Ja [Joseph] ütles oma sulased "Pane oma raha nende sadulakotid nii, et nad võivad tunda, kui nad on läinud tagasi oma inimesed, et ehk nad [uuesti] tagasi."

trans-unit.source: So when they returned to their father, they said, "O our father, [further] measure has been denied to us, so send with us our brother [that] we will be given measure. And indeed, we will be his guardians."
trans-unit.target: Nii nad tagasi nende isa nad ütlesid: "O meie isa [veel] meede keelduti meile, nii et saatke meile meie vend, [et] me antud meede. Ja tõepoolest, me tema hooldajatega."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Should I entrust you with him except [under coercion] as I entrusted you with his brother before? But Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "ma annaks teile temaga välja arvatud [sundimise] olen volitatud teile vennaga enne? Kuid Jumal on parim eestkostja, ja ta on armollinen ning armulised."

trans-unit.source: And when they opened their baggage, they found their merchandise returned to them. They said, "O our father, what [more] could we desire? This is our merchandise returned to us. And we will obtain supplies for our family and protect our brother and obtain an increase of a camel's load; that is an easy measurement."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad avasid oma pagas, leidsid nad oma raha tagastamine. Nad ütlesid: "O meie isa, mida [more] võiks me soovime? See on meie kauba meile tagasi. Ja me saada tarneid meie perele ja kaitsta meie vend ja saada kasvu kaameli koormusest; See on lihtne mõõtmine."

trans-unit.source: [Jacob] said, "Never will I send him with you until you give me a promise by Allah that you will bring him [back] to me, unless you should be surrounded by enemies." And when they had given their promise, he said, "Allah, over what we say, is Witness."
trans-unit.target: [Jacob] ütles: "Kunagi ma saadan talle teiega enne, kui sa annad mulle lubadus, mida Jumal, siis toob see [tagasi] mulle, kui sa peaksid ümbritsetud vaenlased." Kui nad olid andnud oma lubadus, ütles ta, "Allahi üle, mida me öelda, kas tunnistaja."

trans-unit.source: And he said, "O my sons, do not enter from one gate but enter from different gates; and I cannot avail you against [the decree of] Allah at all. The decision is only for Allah; upon Him I have relied, and upon Him let those who would rely [indeed] rely."
trans-unit.target: Ja ta ütles: "O minu poega ei satu ühe värava: kui sisestada eri väravad; ning ma ei saa kasutada teie vastu [kinnitatud] üldse Jumal. Otsus on ainult Allah; talle olen tugines ja ta lasknud neil, kes tugineks [tõepoolest] usaldada. "

trans-unit.source: And when they entered from where their father had ordered them, it did not avail them against Allah at all except [it was] a need within the soul of Jacob, which he satisfied. And indeed, he was a possessor of knowledge because of what We had taught him, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad sisenesid, kus nende isa neid tellinud, see ei kasuta neid Allah vastu üldse välja arvatud [oli] jooksul hing Jacob, mida ta täita vaja. Ja tõepoolest, ta oli teadmiste valdaja, sest mis meil oli õpetanud teda, kuid enamik inimesi ei tea.

trans-unit.source: And when they entered upon Joseph, he took his brother to himself; he said, "Indeed, I am your brother, so do not despair over what they used to do [to me]."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad memorandumi Joseph, ta võttis tema vend ise; ta ütles: "Tõepoolest, ma olen su vend, nii et ärge heitke meelt üle, mida nad teha [mind]."

trans-unit.source: So when he had furnished them with their supplies, he put the [gold measuring] bowl into the bag of his brother. Then an announcer called out, "O caravan, indeed you are thieves."
trans-unit.target: Nii et kui ta oli sisustatud neid oma tarned, panna ta [gold mõõtmise] kausi tema vend kotti. Siis hõikas, teadustaja "O caravan, tõepoolest on vargad."

trans-unit.source: They said while approaching them, "What is it you are missing?"
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid, samas läheneb neile, "mis see on sa oled kadunud?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We are missing the measure of the king. And for he who produces it is [the reward of] a camel's load, and I am responsible for it."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "oleme kadunud kuninga mõõt. Ja kes toodab see on [palk] kaameli koormus, ja ma olen vastutav selle eest. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, you have certainly known that we did not come to cause corruption in the land, and we have not been thieves."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Allahi poolt teile on kindlasti teada, et me ei tulnud põhjustada korruptsioonivastases liidumaa, me ei ole vargad."

trans-unit.source: The accusers said, "Then what would be its recompense if you should be liars?"
trans-unit.target: Selle accusers ütles, "siis mis oleks selle registreerimiskohas kui saab valetas?"

trans-unit.source: [The brothers] said, "Its recompense is that he in whose bag it is found - he [himself] will be its recompense. Thus do we recompense the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: [Vennad] ütles: "selle registreerimiskohas on et ta, kelle kotis leitakse - ta [ise] olema oma registreerimiskohas. Seega ei me palk selle tekitaja."

trans-unit.source: So he began [the search] with their bags before the bag of his brother; then he extracted it from the bag of his brother. Thus did We plan for Joseph. He could not have taken his brother within the religion of the king except that Allah willed. We raise in degrees whom We will, but over every possessor of knowledge is one [more] knowing.
trans-unit.target: Nii hakkas ta [Otsing] koos oma kotid enne kotti vennaga; siis ta ekstraheeritud see kott tema vend. Seega me ei plaani Joseph. Ta võiks ei oleks teinud tema vend jooksul religioon king välja, et Allah kombeks. Kasvatame kraadides keda meil näidatakse, kuid üle iga teadmiste valdaja on üks [veel] teadmine.

trans-unit.source: They said, "If he steals - a brother of his has stolen before." But Joseph kept it within himself and did not reveal it to them. He said, "You are worse in position, and Allah is most knowing of what you describe."
