trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Kui ta varastab - tema vend on varastatud enne." Aga Joosep hoitakse seda ise ja ei ilmnenud see neile. Ta ütles: "sa oled hullem asendis ja Allah on enamik teades, mida te kirjeldaksite."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O 'Azeez, indeed he has a father [who is] an old man, so take one of us in place of him. Indeed, we see you as a doer of good."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "O" Azeez, ta on tõepoolest [kes ei] isa Vanamees, nii et võtke üks meist asemel teda. Tõepoolest, me näeme nagu hea inimeseks."

trans-unit.source: He said, "[I seek] the refuge of Allah [to prevent] that we take except him with whom we found our possession. Indeed, we would then be unjust."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "[ma otsima] varjupaika Jumal [vältimiseks] et astuda välja arvatud tema, kellega oleme leidnud meie käes. Tõepoolest, siis oleksime alusetu."

trans-unit.source: So when they had despaired of him, they secluded themselves in private consultation. The eldest of them said, "Do you not know that your father has taken upon you an oath by Allah and [that] before you failed in [your duty to] Joseph? So I will never leave [this] land until my father permits me or Allah decides for me, and He is the best of judges.
trans-unit.target: Nii et kui nad olid despaired teda, nad üksildane ise erasektori konsultatsiooni. Vanim neist ütles: "Kas sa ei tea, et sinu isa on vandunud teid Allah ja [see] enne, kui sa ei [sinu kohustus] Joseph? Nii et ma ei jäta kunagi [selle] maa kuni mu isa lubab mul või Allah näeb mind raames ja ta on parim kohtunikust.

trans-unit.source: Return to your father and say, "O our father, indeed your son has stolen, and we did not testify except to what we knew. And we were not witnesses of the unseen,
trans-unit.target: Tagasi oma isa ja öelda, "meie isa, tõepoolest teie poeg on varastatud, ja me ei käsitle peale mida me teadsime O. Ja me ei olnud nähtamatu, tunnistajate

trans-unit.source: And ask the city in which we were and the caravan in which we came - and indeed, we are truthful,"
trans-unit.target: Ja linn, kus me olime ja caravan, kus meil tuli - ja tõepoolest, me oleme tõesed, palun"

trans-unit.source: [Jacob] said, "Rather, your souls have enticed you to something, so patience is most fitting. Perhaps Allah will bring them to me all together. Indeed it is He who is the Knowing, the Wise."
trans-unit.target: [Jacob] ütles: "pigem oma hinge on ahvatletakse teid midagi, nii et kannatust on kõige paigaldamise. Võibolla Jumal toob nad mulle kõik koos. Tõepoolest on see, kes on teades, tark."

trans-unit.source: And he turned away from them and said, "Oh, my sorrow over Joseph," and his eyes became white from grief, for he was [of that] a suppressor.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta pöördus eemale neid ja ütles: "Oh, mu kurbus üle Joseph," ja tema silmad sai valge leina, ta oli [see] suppressor.

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, you will not cease remembering Joseph until you become fatally ill or become of those who perish."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Jumal, mida sa ei ole enam meenutades Joseph kuni surmavalt haigestunud või saanud, kes hukkuvad."

trans-unit.source: He said, "I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "ma ainult kurdavad minu kannatuste ja minu leina Allah ja tean Jumal see, mida sa ei tea.

trans-unit.source: O my sons, go and find out about Joseph and his brother and despair not of relief from Allah. Indeed, no one despairs of relief from Allah except the disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: O minu poega minna ja Uuri Joseph ja tema vend ja meeleheidet mitte leevendust Jumalalt. Tõepoolest, keegi despairs vabastamisega Allah välja arvatud olid inimesed."

trans-unit.source: So when they entered upon Joseph, they said, "O 'Azeez, adversity has touched us and our family, and we have come with goods poor in quality, but give us full measure and be charitable to us. Indeed, Allah rewards the charitable."
trans-unit.target: Nii et kui nad memorandumi Joseph, ütlesid nad, "O" Azeez, ebaõnne on puudutanud meid ja meie pere ja kaubaga halva kvaliteediga, jõudnud aga anname meile täieliku meetme ja lubada heategevust meile. Tõepoolest, Allah premeerib selle heategevusliku."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Do you know what you did with Joseph and his brother when you were ignorant?"
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Kas sa tead, mida sa tegid Joseph ja tema vend, kui sa olid asjatundmatu?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Are you indeed Joseph?" He said "I am Joseph, and this is my brother. Allah has certainly favored us. Indeed, he who fears Allah and is patient, then indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Kas tõepoolest Joseph?" Ta ütles: "ma olen Joseph, ja see on minu vend. Jumal on kindlasti soosib meid. Tõepoolest, kes kardab Jumalat ja on patsient, siis tõepoolest, Allah ei luba kaduma need, kes seda hea palk."

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, certainly has Allah preferred you over us, and indeed, we have been sinners."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Allahi poolt kindlasti on Jumal eelistas te meie üle, ja tõepoolest, oleme patused."

trans-unit.source: He said, "No blame will there be upon you today. Allah will forgive you; and He is the most merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "No süü näidatakse seal olgu teile täna. Jumal andestab teile; ja ta on armollinen ning armulised."

trans-unit.source: Take this, my shirt, and cast it over the face of my father; he will become seeing. And bring me your family, all together."
trans-unit.target: Võtke seda mu särk ja vaadake üle oma isa nägu tema nähes näol. Ja tooge mulle teie pere kõik koos."

trans-unit.source: And when the caravan departed [from Egypt], their father said, "Indeed, I find the smell of Joseph [and would say that he was alive] if you did not think me weakened in mind."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui karavani väljusid [Egiptuse] oma isa ütles: "tõepoolest, ma leida Joseph lõhn [ja ütleks, et ta oli elus] kui sa ei usu mind meeles nõrgenenud."

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, indeed you are in your [same] old error."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Jumal, mida tõepoolest olete teie [sama] vana viga."

trans-unit.source: And when the bearer of good tidings arrived, he cast it over his face, and he returned [once again] seeing. He said, "Did I not tell you that I know from Allah that which you do not know?"
trans-unit.target: Ja kui rõõmusõnumit kandjaks jõudis, viskas ta üle tema näo, ja ta tagasi [veel kord] nähes. Ta ütles: "ei ma ei öelda, et ma tean, Jumal, mida sa ei tea?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "O our father, ask for us forgiveness of our sins; indeed, we have been sinners."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "meie isa, O küsida meile andeks meie patud; Tõepoolest, oleme patused."

trans-unit.source: He said, "I will ask forgiveness for you from my Lord. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Ma küsin andestust teile, mu Issand. Ongi tema, kes on Forgiving, on Merciful."

trans-unit.source: And when they entered upon Joseph, he took his parents to himself and said, "Enter Egypt, Allah willing, safe [and secure]."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad memorandumi Joseph, ta võttis tema vanemad ise ja ütles: "Enter Egiptus, Jumal valmis, ohutu [ja turvaline]."

trans-unit.source: And he raised his parents upon the throne, and they bowed to him in prostration. And he said, "O my father, this is the explanation of my vision of before. My Lord has made it reality. And He was certainly good to me when He took me out of prison and brought you [here] from bedouin life after Satan had induced [estrangement] between me and my brothers. Indeed, my Lord is Subtle in what He wills. Indeed, it is He who is the Knowing, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Ta tõstis trooni pärast tema vanemad ja nad kummardasid teda täielik kurnatus. Ja ta ütles: "O minu isa, see on minu nägemus enne selgitamine. Issand on teinud tegelikkust. Ja ta oli kindlasti hea mulle, kui ta võttis mind vanglast välja ja tõin teile [siin] beduiini elu pärast seda, kui Saatan oli tingitud [võõrandumisele] vahel mina ja mu vennad. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on Vaevumärgatav mida ta tahab. Tegelikult on see, kes on teades, tark.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, You have given me [something] of sovereignty and taught me of the interpretation of dreams. Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Mu Issand, olete andnud mulle [midagi] suveräänsuse ja õpetas mulle tõlgendamisel unistused. Looja taevas ja maa, sa oled mu kaitsja selles maailmas ja edaspidi. Põhjusta mulle die moslem ja minuga õige."

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal, [O Muhammad], to you. And you were not with them when they put together their plan while they conspired.
trans-unit.target: Mis on nähtamatu, mis me esile [O Muhammad], uudis teile. Ja sa ei olnud nendega, kui nad panna kokku nende plaan, kuigi nad conspired.

trans-unit.source: And most of the people, although you strive [for it], are not believers.
trans-unit.target: Ja enamik inimesi, kuigi sa püüdma [ta], ei ole usklikud.

trans-unit.source: And you do not ask of them for it any payment. It is not except a reminder to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Ja sa ei küsi nad seda piletiga. Välja arvatud meeldetuletuse maailmad ei ole.

trans-unit.source: And how many a sign within the heavens and earth do they pass over while they, therefrom, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui palju märk taevas ja maa do nad mööda nad, kuigi sellest on keerates ära.

trans-unit.source: And most of them believe not in Allah except while they associate others with Him.
trans-unit.target: Ja enamik neist usuvad pole Jumalat peale kuigi nad seostavad teised teda.

trans-unit.source: Then do they feel secure that there will not come to them an overwhelming [aspect] of the punishment of Allah or that the Hour will not come upon them suddenly while they do not perceive?
trans-unit.target: Siis nad arvavad turvaline, et seal ei tule neile on valdav [osa] karistuse Allah või tunnis ei tule neile äkki samal ajal, kui nad tajuvad?

trans-unit.source: Say, "This is my way; I invite to Allah with insight, I and those who follow me. And exalted is Allah; and I am not of those who associate others with Him."
trans-unit.target: Öelda: "see on minu viis; Kutsun Allah insight, ma ja need, kes jälgib mind. Ja ülendatud on Jumal; ja ma ei kes teised seostavad teda."

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you [as messengers] except men to whom We revealed from among the people of cities. So have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? And the home of the Hereafter is best for those who fear Allah; then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: Ja saatsime enne teie [kui käskjalad] välja arvatud mehed kellega me näitas inimest, linnade hulgast. Niisiis on nad ei reisinud läbi maa ja jälgida, kuidas oli lõpuks need enne neid? Ja edaspidi koju sobib kõige paremini neile, kes kardavad Jumalat; siis näidatakse teile mitte põhjus?

trans-unit.source: [They continued] until, when the messengers despaired and were certain that they had been denied, there came to them Our victory, and whoever We willed was saved. And Our punishment cannot be repelled from the people who are criminals.
trans-unit.target: [Nad jätkasid] kuni, kui inglid despaired ja olid, et neil oli keeldutud, tuli neile meie võit, ja kes iganes meil kombeks, salvestati. Ja meie karistust ei saa tõrjutakse inimestelt, kes on kurjategijad.

trans-unit.source: There was certainly in their stories a lesson for those of understanding. Never was the Qur'an a narration invented, but a confirmation of what was before it and a detailed explanation of all things and guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Seal oli kindlasti nende lood õppetund neile mõistmist. Kunagi oli Koraani jutustuse leiutatud, kuid taotluse kohta, mis oli enne seda ja inimesed, kes usuvad kõik asjad ja arendus-ja halastust üksikasjaliku selgituse.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem, Ra. These are the verses of the Book; and what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Hotell Alif, Lam, Meem, Ra. Need on salmid raamat; ja mida on avastatud teile: teie Issand on tõde, kuid enamik inimesi ei usu.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who erected the heavens without pillars that you [can] see; then He established Himself above the Throne and made subject the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. He arranges [each] matter; He details the signs that you may, of the meeting with your Lord, be certain.
trans-unit.target: See on Jumal, kes püstitati taevas ilma sammast [] näete; siis ta ise troonile eespool kehtestatud ja kohaldada, päike ja kuu, iga töötab [täisringist] tähtajaliselt. Ta korraldab [iga] küsimuses; Ta andmed, et te oma Issanda kohtumine võib teatud märke.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who spread the earth and placed therein firmly set mountains and rivers; and from all of the fruits He made therein two mates; He causes the night to cover the day. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Ja see on talle, kes levitasid maa ja panna seal kindlalt seatud mäed ja jõed; ja kõik puuviljad tegi ta seal kaks semud; Ta põhjustab öösel päeval katmiseks. Tõepoolest, et on märke inimestega, kes on mõelnud.

trans-unit.source: And within the land are neighboring plots and gardens of grapevines and crops and palm trees, [growing] several from a root or otherwise, watered with one water; but We make some of them exceed others in [quality of] fruit. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: Ja jooksul maa on naabruses krundid ja aiad viinapuude ja taimed ja palmipuud, [kasvav] mitu on tüvest või muidu joota ühe veega; Aga me teeme mõned neist ületada teised [kvaliteet] puu. Tõepoolest, et on märke inimestele, kes põhjus.

trans-unit.source: And if you are astonished, [O Muhammad] - then astonishing is their saying, "When we are dust, will we indeed be [brought] into a new creation?" Those are the ones who have disbelieved in their Lord, and those will have shackles upon their necks, and those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui te olete üllatunud, [O Muhammad] - siis üllatav on nende ütlus "kui me tolmu, me antakse tõesti [toodud] uus loodu?" Need on need, kes on disbelieved nende Issand ja need on seeklid oma kaela üles ja need on kaaslased tulekahju; nad järgivad seal igavesti.

trans-unit.source: They impatiently urge you to bring about evil before good, while there has already occurred before them similar punishments [to what they demand]. And indeed, your Lord is full of forgiveness for the people despite their wrongdoing, and indeed, your Lord is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Nad kannatamatult kutsun teid üles tuua paha enne hea, kuigi seal on juba toimunud enne neid samalaadsed karistused [et nad nõuavad]. Ja tõepoolest, teie Issand on täis andestust inimestele, hoolimata nende valesti ja teie Issand on tõepoolest raske karistus.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" You are only a warner, and for every people is a guide.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes disbelieved öelda: "Miks märk pole saadetud talle tema Lord?" Teil on ainult warner iga inimestele on juhend.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what every female carries and what the wombs lose [prematurely] or exceed. And everything with Him is by due measure.
trans-unit.target: Jumal teab iga naine tegeleb ja on emaka kaotada [enneaegselt] või ületada. Ja kõik temaga on nõuetekohaselt meede.

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted.
trans-unit.target: [On] Teab selle nähtamatu ja on jälginud, Grand, on ülendatud.

trans-unit.source: It is the same [to Him] concerning you whether one conceals [his] speech or one publicizes it and whether one is hidden by night or conspicuous [among others] by day.
trans-unit.target: See on sama [talle] kohta, kas üks varjab [tema] kõne või üks publicizes ja kas üks on öösel peidetud või nähtav [muu hulgas] päevade kaupa.

trans-unit.source: For each one are successive [angels] before and behind him who protect him by the decree of Allah. Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves. And when Allah intends for a people ill, there is no repelling it. And there is not for them besides Him any patron.
trans-unit.target: Iga üks on järjestikuste [inglid] enne ja selja taga, kes kaitsevad teda Allah dekreet. Tõepoolest, Allah ei muutu tingimus on inimesi kuni nad muutuvad, mis on iseenesest. Ning kui Allah on kavas haigete inimestega, ei ole tõrjuv. Ja pole neid talle peale iga patroon.

trans-unit.source: It is He who shows you lightening, [causing] fear and aspiration, and generates the heavy clouds.
trans-unit.target: See on see, kes näitab teile, kergendada, [põhjustab] hirm ja elumõtte ja tekitab suuri pilvi.

trans-unit.source: And the thunder exalts [Allah] with praise of Him - and the angels [as well] from fear of Him - and He sends thunderbolts and strikes therewith whom He wills while they dispute about Allah; and He is severe in assault.
trans-unit.target: Ja äikest exalts [Jumalat] kiitusega temast - ja inglid [ning] hirm teda - ja ta saadab thunderbolts ja lööb sellega kellega ta testamentide, kuigi nad vaidlustavad umbes Jumal; ja ta on tõsine rünnak.

trans-unit.source: To Him [alone] is the supplication of truth. And those they call upon besides Him do not respond to them with a thing, except as one who stretches his hands toward water [from afar, calling it] to reach his mouth, but it will not reach it [thus]. And the supplication of the disbelievers is not but in error [i.e. futility].
trans-unit.target: Talle [üksinda] on tõde supplication. Ja need, mida nad kutsuvad teda peale ei allu neile asja, välja arvatud üks, kes venitab oma käed poole [veest afar, nimetades seda] jõuda oma suu, kuid ta ei jõua seda [seega]. Ja selle uskottomille supplication ei ole aga viga [st Turhuus].

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whoever is within the heavens and the earth, willingly or by compulsion, and their shadows [as well] in the mornings and the afternoons.
trans-unit.target: Ja Jumala prostrates, kes on taevas ja maa, vabatahtlikult või sund ja nende varjud [ning] poolt hommikuti ja pärastlõunati.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the heavens and earth?" Say, "Allah." Say, "Have you then taken besides Him allies not possessing [even] for themselves any benefit or any harm?" Say, "Is the blind equivalent to the seeing? Or is darkness equivalent to light? Or have they attributed to Allah partners who created like His creation so that the creation [of each] seemed similar to them?" Say, "Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the One, the Prevailing."
trans-unit.target: Öelda: "Kes on Issand taeva ja maa?" Öelda: "Jumal." Öelda: "te siis võtnud teda lisaks liitlased mitte omades [isegi] ise mingit kasu või kahju?" Öelda "on samaväärne ei näe Pimedate? Või vastab pimedusse valgust? Või on nad seostada Jumala partnerid, loonud nagu tema loomist, et loomine [iga] tundus sarnane nendega?" Öelda: "Allah on k⌡igi asjade looja ja ta on üks, et Prevailing."

trans-unit.source: He sends down from the sky, rain, and valleys flow according to their capacity, and the torrent carries a rising foam. And from that [ore] which they heat in the fire, desiring adornments and utensils, is a foam like it. Thus Allah presents [the example of] truth and falsehood. As for the foam, it vanishes, [being] cast off; but as for that which benefits the people, it remains on the earth. Thus does Allah present examples.
trans-unit.target: Ta saadab sätestatakse taevas, vihma ja orud voolu vastavalt oma maksevõimele ja torrent viib tõusev vaht. Ja et Ore mis Kuumuta tulekahju, soovides oodata olevale ajale ja riistad, on nagu see vaht. Seega Allah esitleb [Näide] tõde ja valetamine. Mis puudutab vaht, see kaob, [on] valatud välja; Aga mis puudutab seda, mis on kasulik inimestele, see jääb maa peal. Seega Allah esitada näiteid.

trans-unit.source: For those who have responded to their Lord is the best [reward], but those who did not respond to Him - if they had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby. Those will have the worst account, and their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Neile, kes ei vastanud nende Issand on parim [tasu], kuid need, kes ei andnud talle - kui nad kõik on maa peal täiesti jms seda see, nad [püüdke] lunaraha ise sellega. Need on halvim konto pelgupaiga on Hell ja armetu on puhkavad.

trans-unit.source: Then is he who knows that what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth like one who is blind? They will only be reminded who are people of understanding -
trans-unit.target: Siis on see, kes teab, et mida on avastatud teile: teie Issand on tõde nagu üks, kes on pime? Nad ainult meelde, kes inimest mõistmise-

trans-unit.source: Those who fulfill the covenant of Allah and do not break the contract,
trans-unit.target: Need, kes täita pakti Allah ja puruneda lepingu,

trans-unit.source: And those who join that which Allah has ordered to be joined and fear their Lord and are afraid of the evil of [their] account,
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes liituvad, mida Jumal andis võimaluse ühendada ja hirm nende Issand ja kardavad paha [nende] konto

trans-unit.source: And those who are patient, seeking the countenance of their Lord, and establish prayer and spend from what We have provided for them secretly and publicly and prevent evil with good - those will have the good consequence of [this] home -
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes on patsient, keda nende Issand Pale ja palve ja veeta, mida oleme pakkunud neile salaja ja avalikult ja vältida kurja hea - need on head tagajärjed [see] kodu-

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence; they will enter them with whoever were righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their descendants. And the angels will enter upon them from every gate, [saying],
trans-unit.target: Aiad perpetual elukoht; nad kannavad neid koos, kes olid oma isade, nende abikaasade ja nende järeltulijate seas õige. Ja inglid sisestab neile iga gate [öelda]

trans-unit.source: "Peace be upon you for what you patiently endured. And excellent is the final home."
trans-unit.target: "Rahu olgu teile jaoks te kannatlikult kannatasin. Ja väga hea on lõplik kodu."

trans-unit.source: But those who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined and spread corruption on earth - for them is the curse, and they will have the worst home.
trans-unit.target: Kuid kes murda Allah pakti pärast seda ja sever, mida Jumal andis võimaluse ühendada ja levinud korruptsioon maa - neil on needus ja neil on halvim kodu.

trans-unit.source: Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. And they rejoice in the worldly life, while the worldly life is not, compared to the Hereafter, except [brief] enjoyment.
trans-unit.target: Allah laiendab sätet, kellele ta tahab ja piirab [ta]. Ja nad rõõmustavad maise elu ajal maise elu ei ole, võrreldes edaspidi, välja arvatud [lühike] nautimine.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] -
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes disbelieved öelda: "Miks märk pole saadetud talle tema Lord?" Öelda, [O Muhammad], "tõepoolest, Allah jätab eksinud kellele He wills ja ise, kes pöördub tagasi [talle] - juhendid

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah. Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured."
trans-unit.target: Need, kes on uskunud ja kelle süda on kindel Allah mälestuseks. Kahtlemata poolt mälestuseks Jumal südamed kindel."

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and done righteous deeds - a good state is theirs and a good return.
trans-unit.target: Need, kes on uskunud ja teinud õiged teod - heas, on nemad ja selle investeeringutasuvus.

trans-unit.source: Thus have We sent you to a community before which [other] communities have passed on so you might recite to them that which We revealed to you, while they disbelieve in the Most Merciful. Say, "He is my Lord; there is no deity except Him. Upon Him I rely, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: Seega me teile saadetud ühendusse enne mida [other] ühenduste möödunud aasta nii võib etlema neile seda, mis meil näitas sulle, kuigi nad usu. linnas kõige armuline. Öelda: "ta on mu isand; ei ole jumalus, välja arvatud tema. Talle ma usaldada ja temaga on minu tagasi."

trans-unit.source: And if there was any qur'an by which the mountains would be removed or the earth would be broken apart or the dead would be made to speak, [it would be this Qur'an], but to Allah belongs the affair entirely. Then have those who believed not accepted that had Allah willed, He would have guided the people, all of them? And those who disbelieve do not cease to be struck, for what they have done, by calamity - or it will descend near their home - until there comes the promise of Allah. Indeed, Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui ei olnud ühtegi Koraan, millega jäetaks mägedes või maa peal oleks katki peale või surnud tehakse rääkida, [oleks see Koraan], kuid et Jumal kuulub asi täiesti. Siis need, kes uskusid ei aktsepteerinud et oli Jumal kombeks, ta on juhindutud inimesi, neid kõiki? Ja need, kes usu lakka tabas, mida nad teinud, mida õnnetus - või see laskuvad lähedal oma kodus - kuni tuleb Jumala tõotus. Tõepoolest, Allah ei [tema] lubadus.

trans-unit.source: And already were [other] messengers ridiculed before you, and I extended the time of those who disbelieved; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.
trans-unit.target: Juba olid [muu] Inglid teleekraanil enne teid ja ma laiendatud ajal, kes disbelieved; siis ma kinni neid ja kuidas [kohutav] oli minu karistus.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who is a maintainer of every soul, [knowing] what it has earned, [like any other]? But to Allah they have attributed partners. Say, "Name them. Or do you inform Him of that which He knows not upon the earth or of what is apparent of speech?" Rather, their [own] plan has been made attractive to those who disbelieve, and they have been averted from the way. And whomever Allah leaves astray - there will be for him no guide.
trans-unit.target: Siis on ta, kes on hooldaja iga hing [tea] mis ta on teeninud, [nagu iga teine]? Kuid Jumal nad on tuvastatav partnerid. Öelda: "Nimeta neid. Või kas te teatama talle, mida ta teab, ei maa peal või mis on ilmne kõnes?" Pigem [oma] kava on tehtud neile, kes usu. atraktiivne ja nad on möödas sellest, kuidas. Ja keda iganes Jumal jätab eksinud - leidub teda ole giid.

trans-unit.source: For them will be punishment in the life of [this] world, and the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe. And they will not have from Allah any protector.
trans-unit.target: Neid saab karistuse [selle] maailma elus ja edaspidi karistus on raskemad. Ja nad ei on Jumalalt mingit protector.

trans-unit.source: The example of Paradise, which the righteous have been promised, is [that] beneath it rivers flow. Its fruit is lasting, and its shade. That is the consequence for the righteous, and the consequence for the disbelievers is the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Näide paradiis, mis õige on lubatud, [mis] on selle all jõgede voolu. Selle puu intensiivsemaid ja oma varju. Mis on õigemeelsed tagajärg ja tagajärg on uskottomille on tulekahju.

trans-unit.source: And [the believers among] those to whom We have given the [previous] Scripture rejoice at what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], but among the [opposing] factions are those who deny part of it. Say, "I have only been commanded to worship Allah and not associate [anything] with Him. To Him I invite, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: Ja [usklike seas] need, kellele me oleme andnud [eelmine] pühakirja Rõõmusta mis näitas teile [O Muhammad], kuid [vastulause] fraktsioonide seas on need, kes eitavad osa sellest. Öelda: "Mul on ainult kästud teenida Jumalat, ei seosta [midagi] teda. Talle Kutsun ja tema on minu tagasi."

trans-unit.source: And thus We have revealed it as an Arabic legislation. And if you should follow their inclinations after what has come to you of knowledge, you would not have against Allah any ally or any protector.
trans-unit.target: Ja seega me on näidanud seda nagu Araabia õigusaktid. Ja kui peaks järgima oma kalduvustele, pärast mida on tulnud teile teadmised, sa ei oleks vastu Allah piisavate sõjajõudude või mis tahes protector.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you and assigned to them wives and descendants. And it was not for a messenger to come with a sign except by permission of Allah. For every term is a decree.
trans-unit.target: Ja me juba saatnud kullerid enne sind ja neile naised ja järeltulijad. Ja see ei olnud Messengeri tulla kirjutama, välja arvatud loa alusel Allah. Iga sõna on otsuse tegemisel.

trans-unit.source: Allah eliminates what He wills or confirms, and with Him is the Mother of the Book.
trans-unit.target: Allah kõrvaldab, mida ta tahab või kinnitab ja temaga on raamat ema.

trans-unit.source: And whether We show you part of what We promise them or take you in death, upon you is only the [duty of] notification, and upon Us is the account.
trans-unit.target: Ja kas teie osa me lubadus neid või võtta sind surma teie peale on ainult [όlesanne] teatise ja meid on konto.

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? And Allah decides; there is no adjuster of His decision. And He is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Kas nad ei näinud, et me seame upon maa, kärpides seda praeguselt oma piire? Ja Jumal otsustab; ei mingit regulaatorina oma otsusest. Ja ta on swift kontol.

trans-unit.source: And those before them had plotted, but to Allah belongs the plan entirely. He knows what every soul earns, and the disbelievers will know for whom is the final home.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, mis on enne neid oli joonistatakse, kuid Jumal kuulub plaani täielikult. Ta teab, et iga hing teenib ja selle uskottomille tead kellele on lõplik kodu.

trans-unit.source: And those who have disbelieved say, "You are not a messenger." Say, [O Muhammad], "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you, and [the witness of] whoever has knowledge of the Scripture."
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes on disbelieved öelda: "Sa ei ole messenger." Ütlen, [O Muhammad], "piisavalt on Jumal nagu tunnistaja vahel mina ja sina ja [tunnistaja] kes on pühakirja teadmised."

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that you might bring mankind out of darknesses into the light by permission of their Lord - to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy -
trans-unit.target: Hotell Alif, Lam, Ra. [on] raamat, milles teatati me teile [O Muhammad], et võiks tuua inimkonnale välja darknesses valgusesse loal nende Issand - teele ülendatud Might, Praiseworthy -

trans-unit.source: Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And woe to the disbelievers from a severe punishment
trans-unit.target: Jumal, kellele kuulub iganes on taevas ja mis on maa peal. Ja häda on uskottomille karm karistus

trans-unit.source: The ones who prefer the worldly life over the Hereafter and avert [people] from the way of Allah, seeking to make it (seem) deviant. Those are in extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Need, kes eelistavad maiste elu edaspidi üle ja vältida [inimesed] sellest, kuidas Jumal, keda oleks (ilmselt) hälbiv. Need on äärmiselt viga.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send any messenger except [speaking] in the language of his people to state clearly for them, and Allah sends astray [thereby] whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Me ei saatnud kõik Messengeri v.a [kõneldes] oma rahva keeles riigile selgelt neid ja Jumal saadab astray [seega] keda ta tahab ja juhendid, keda ta tahab. Ja ta on ülendatud Might, tark.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent Moses with Our signs, [saying], "Bring out your people from darknesses into the light and remind them of the days of Allah." Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ja me kindlasti saadetakse Moses meie märke [öelda], "Too välja oma inimesi darknesses valgusesse ning tuletada meelde Jumalat päeva." Tõepoolest, et on märke kõigile patsientide ja tänulik.

trans-unit.source: And [recall, O Children of Israel], when Moses said to His people, "Remember the favor of Allah upon you when He saved you from the people of Pharaoh, who were afflicting you with the worst torment and were slaughtering your [newborn] sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord.
trans-unit.target: Ja [Meenuta, Iisraeli laste O], kui Moses ütles oma rahvale, "mäletan Allah kasuks teie peale, kui ta päästetud vaarao, inimesed, kes olid vaevab teie halvim piin ja olid tapmine [vastsündinud] poega ja oma emast jäädvustamises. Ja mis oli suur kohtuprotsess alates teie Issand.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe.' "
trans-unit.target: [Mäleta] Kuna teie Issand kuulutas, "kui sa oled tänulik, ma kindlasti suurendab sa [on favor]; Aga kui sa eita, tõepoolest, minu karistus on raske. " "

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "If you should disbelieve, you and whoever is on the earth entirely - indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy."
trans-unit.target: Ja Moses ütles: "kui sa peaksid usu. te ja kes on maal täiesti - tõepoolest, Allah on vaja vaba ja Praiseworthy."

trans-unit.source: Has there not reached you the news of those before you - the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud and those after them? No one knows them but Allah. Their messengers brought them clear proofs, but they returned their hands to their mouths and said, "Indeed, we disbelieve in that with which you have been sent, and indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
trans-unit.target: Seal pole jõudnud teile Uudised sinu - Noah inimesed ja "Aad ja Thamud ja need, mis on pärast neid? Teate neid ainult Jumal. Nende inglid tõid neile selged tõendid, kuid nad tagasi oma käed oma suud ja ütles: "Tõepoolest, me usu et kellega olete saatnud ja tõepoolest oleme, sellest kuhu saadate meile, disquieting kaheldav."

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said, "Can there be doubt about Allah, Creator of the heavens and earth? He invites you that He may forgive you of your sins, and He delays your death for a specified term." They said, "You are not but men like us who wish to avert us from what our fathers were worshipping. So bring us a clear authority."
trans-unit.target: Nende kullerid ütles, "saab olla kahtlust Jumala, taeva ja maa looja? Ta kutsub sind, et ta võib teile oma patud andeks, ja ta viivitab oma surma tδhtajaliselt." Nad ütlesid: "sa ei ole aga mehed nagu meie, kes soovivad vältida meile alates meie isad olid jumalateenistustel. Nii toovad meile selge asutus."

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said to them, "We are only men like you, but Allah confers favor upon whom He wills of His servants. It has never been for us to bring you evidence except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Nende kullerid ütles neile "oleme ainus mehed nagu sina, aga Jumal annab pärast kellega ta tahab tema teenistujate kasuks. See pole kunagi olnud meile tuua teile tõendeid, välja arvatud Jumala loal. Ja Allah olgu korral tugineda usklikud.

trans-unit.source: And why should we not rely upon Allah while He has guided us to our [good] ways. And we will surely be patient against whatever harm you should cause us. And upon Allah let those who would rely [indeed] rely."
trans-unit.target: Ja miks peaks me ei kasuta Jumal kui ta on juhindunud meile meie [head] võimalusi. Ja me kindlasti saab patsient sõltumata kahju tuleks panna meid vastu. Ja pärast Allah olgu kes tugineks [tõepoolest]."

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved said to their messengers, "We will surely drive you out of our land, or you must return to our religion." So their Lord inspired to them, "We will surely destroy the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes disbelieved öelnud, et käskjalad, "me kindlasti juhtida teid läbi meie maa, või peab tagastama meie religioon." Nii saavad Issanda inspiratsiooni neile, "me kindlasti hävitab selle tekitaja.

trans-unit.source: And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position and fears My threat."
trans-unit.target: Ja me kindlasti põhjustada teie elate maa pärast neid. See on kes kardab oma seisukohta ja arvab minu ohtu."

trans-unit.source: And they requested victory from Allah, and disappointed, [therefore], was every obstinate tyrant.
trans-unit.target: Nad taotlesid võidu Jumalalt ja pettunud, [seega] oli iga jonnakas türann.

trans-unit.source: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.
trans-unit.target: Enne teda on Hell ja ta antakse juua mädaste vett.

trans-unit.source: He will gulp it but will hardly [be able to] swallow it. And death will come to him from everywhere, but he is not to die. And before him is a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ta lürpima see aga üldse mitte [oleks võimalik] neelama. Ja surma tulevad teda kõikjal, kuid ta ei ole surra. Ja enne teda on massiivne karistus.

trans-unit.source: The example of those who disbelieve in their Lord is [that] their deeds are like ashes which the wind blows forcefully on a stormy day; they are unable [to keep] from what they earned a [single] thing. That is what is extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Näiteks need, kes usu nende Issand on [see] nende teod on nagu tuhka, kus tuul puhub jõuliselt tormisel päeval; nad ei suuda [pidama]: mida nad teenitud [ühe] asja. Seda on äärmiselt viga.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen that Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth? If He wills, He can do away with you and produce a new creation.
trans-unit.target: Kas sa ei näinud, et Jumal on loonud taeva ja maa tõsi? Kui ta tahab, ta sul kaotada ja toota uut loomist.

trans-unit.source: And that is not difficult for Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ja see pole raske Allah.

trans-unit.source: And they will come out [for judgement] before Allah all together, and the weak will say to those who were arrogant, "Indeed, we were your followers, so can you avail us anything against the punishment of Allah?" They will say, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is all the same for us whether we show intolerance or are patient: there is for us no place of escape."
trans-unit.target: Nad tulevad välja [andmisel] enne Jumal kõik koos ja nõrk ütlevad mingeid ülbe, "tõepoolest, olime oma järgijaid, nii saate te kasutada meile midagi Jumala karistuse vastu?" Nad ütlevad, "kui Jumal oli juhitud meile, me oleks juhinduti te. On ühesugused meile näidata sallimatuse või on patsient: meil pole kohta ning põgeneda on. "

trans-unit.source: And Satan will say when the matter has been concluded, "Indeed, Allah had promised you the promise of truth. And I promised you, but I betrayed you. But I had no authority over you except that I invited you, and you responded to me. So do not blame me; but blame yourselves. I cannot be called to your aid, nor can you be called to my aid. Indeed, I deny your association of me [with Allah] before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Ja Saatan ütleb, millal sõlmiti asja, "tõepoolest, Allah lubas sa lubadus tõde. Ja ma lubasin teile, kuid ma reetis. Aga mul oli ükski asutus teie üle, et ma kutsusin teid, ja sa vastasid mulle. Nii ei süüdista mind; vaid iseendid süüdistada. Ma ei saa kutsuda oma abi, samuti on võimalik teid kutsuda minu abi. Tõepoolest, ma eitada oma seotusest mulle [Jumalat] enne. Tõepoolest, mille tekitaja on valus karistuse."

trans-unit.source: And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, "Peace!"
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes uskusid ja tegin head teod on lubatud aiad all mis jõed tõusevad ainuüksi igavesti sealsamas loa alusel nende Issand; ja nende tervitus seal hakatakse "Rahu!"

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, [making] a good word like a good tree, whose root is firmly fixed and its branches [high] in the sky?
trans-unit.target: Kas sa ei mõelnud, kuidas Jumal esitab näiteks, [tegemise] hea sõna nagu hea puu, mille juur on tugevalt kinnitatud ja selle filiaalid [high] taevas?

trans-unit.source: It produces its fruit all the time, by permission of its Lord. And Allah presents examples for the people that perhaps they will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Ta toodab selle vili on alati oma Issanda loal. Ja Allah esitleb näiteid inimestele, et võibolla nad meelde.

trans-unit.source: And the example of a bad word is like a bad tree, uprooted from the surface of the earth, not having any stability.
trans-unit.target: Ja paha sõna näide on nagu halb puu, maa pinnalt lahkuma ei ole mingit stabiilsust.

trans-unit.source: Allah keeps firm those who believe, with the firm word, in worldly life and in the Hereafter. And Allah sends astray the wrongdoers. And Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Jumal hoiab kindlalt, kes usuvad kindla sõnaga, maise elu ja edaspidi. Ja Jumal saadab astray selle tekitaja. Ja Allah ei, mida ta tahab.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allah for disbelief and settled their people [in] the home of ruin?
trans-unit.target: Kas oled ei mõelnud, kes vahetasid uskumatus Allah kasuks ja elama saavad inimesed [] häving kodu?

trans-unit.source: [It is] Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the settlement.
trans-unit.target: [On] Põrgu, mis neil näidatakse [enter] kirjutamist ja armetu on tasakaalustus.

trans-unit.source: And they have attributed to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for indeed, your destination is the Fire."
trans-unit.target: Ja nad on omistatud Jumal võrdub eksitada [inimesed] oma teed. Öelda: "Naudi ennast, tõepoolest, teie sihtpunkt on tulekahju."

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], tell My servants who have believed to establish prayer and spend from what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, before a Day comes in which there will be no exchange, nor any friendships.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], öelda minu sulased, kes oleks uskunud palve ja veeta, mida oleme pakkunud neile, salaja ja avalikult, enne tuleb päev kus tekib ei vaheta, ega mis tahes sõprussuhteid.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and sent down rain from the sky and produced thereby some fruits as provision for you and subjected for you the ships to sail through the sea by His command and subjected for you the rivers.
trans-unit.target: See on Jumal, kes lõi taeva ja maa ja saatnud oma taevast vihma ja toodetud seeläbi mõned viljad on näha teile ja läbinud teid sõita läbi mere poolt temale alluvad laevade ja läbinud teile jõed.

trans-unit.source: And He subjected for you the sun and the moon, continuous [in orbit], and subjected for you the night and the day.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta päikese ja kuu, pidev [orbiidil], millest teile ja läbinud sinule, öö ja päev.

trans-unit.source: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, mankind is [generally] most unjust and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta andis teile üle kogu palusin teda. Ja kui loete teene Jumal, te võiks loetleda neid. Tõepoolest, inimkonna üldjuhul [] ebaõiglane ja tänamatu.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this city [Makkah] secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols.
trans-unit.target: [Märkus, O Muhammad], kui Aabraham ütles: "Issand, see linn [Makkah] turvalisemaks muuta ja hoida mind ja minu pojad eemal kummardas ebajumalaid.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are [yet] Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Mu Issand, tõepoolest nad on sunnitud eksinud paljude inimeste seas. Nii et kes järgneb mulle -, siis on minust; ja kes iganes mind - disobeys, sa pole isegi [] Forgiving ja Merciful.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, I have settled some of my descendants in an uncultivated valley near Your sacred House, our Lord, that they may establish prayer. So make hearts among the people incline toward them and provide for them from the fruits that they might be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Meie Issand, mul on lahendatud mõned minu järeltulijad harimata Valley sacred House, meie Issand, et nad võivad asutada palve. Nii südamed seas suunas neid inimesi kallak ja esitama neile puuviljadele et nad võiksid olla tänulik.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, indeed You know what we conceal and what we declare, and nothing is hidden from Allah on the earth or in the heaven.
trans-unit.target: Meie Issand tõepoolest sa tead mida me varjata ja me kuulutame ja midagi on peidetud Jumal maa peal või on taevas.

trans-unit.source: Praise to Allah, who has granted to me in old age Ishmael and Isaac. Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.
trans-unit.target: Kiitke Jumalat, kes on andnud mulle vanemas eas Ismael ja Iisak. Tõepoolest, minu Issand on Hearer supplication.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
trans-unit.target: Issand, tee mind andmekogu palve ja [paljud] minu järeltulijad. Meie Issanda ja Aktsepteeri minu supplication.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established."
trans-unit.target: Meie Issanda andesta mulle ja mu vanemad ja usklikud konto on loodud päev."

trans-unit.source: And never think that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them for a Day when eyes will stare [in horror].
trans-unit.target: Ja ei usu, et Jumal ei tea mida selle tekitaja teha. Ta ainult viivitusi nende päev, millal silmi vahtima [in horror].

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void.
trans-unit.target: Sportistmed ees, oma pead üles äratanud, oma pilgu tulevad tagasi neile ja nende süda on tühine.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], warn the people of a Day when the punishment will come to them and those who did wrong will say, "Our Lord, delay us for a short term; we will answer Your call and follow the messengers." [But it will be said], "Had you not sworn, before, that for you there would be no cessation?
trans-unit.target: Ja [O Muhammad], hoiatada inimesi päevas, kuna karistus ei tulnud neile ja need, kes tegid valesti tahtmist öelda, "meie Issanda viivitada meile lühikeseks ajaks; me teie kõnele ja järgige kullerid." [Aga see ütles], "olid sa ei vandetõlgi, varem, et teil ei oleks mingit lõpetamist?

trans-unit.source: And you lived among the dwellings of those who wronged themselves, and it had become clear to you how We dealt with them. And We presented for you [many] examples."
trans-unit.target: Seas, kes ülekohtu ise eluruumide elanud ja see oli saanud selgeks teile kuidas nendega tegeleti. Ja me esitada teile [palju] näited."

trans-unit.source: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is [recorded] their plan, even if their plan had been [sufficient] to do away with the mountains.
trans-unit.target: Ja neil oli planeeritud nende plaan aga Jumalat [registreeritud] nende plaan, isegi kui nende plaan oli olnud [piisav] kaotada mis mägedes.

trans-unit.source: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.
trans-unit.target: Nii et ei usu, et Jumal ei õnnestu oma lubaduse tema inglid. Tõepoolest, Allah on ülendatud Might ja kättemaksu omanik.

trans-unit.source: [It will be] on the Day the earth will be replaced by another earth, and the heavens [as well], and all creatures will come out before Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: [Seda] päeval maa asendatakse teise maa ja taevas [ning] ja kõik olendid välja tulema enne Jumal, üks, et Prevailing.

trans-unit.source: And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles,
trans-unit.target: Ja näed päev ühendatud kas mis tõsterõngad, kurjategijad

trans-unit.source: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Nende rõivad, vedel pigi ja nende näod kaetud tulekahju.

trans-unit.source: So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Nii et Jumal näidatakse palk iga hing mis ta teeninud. Tõepoolest, Allah on swift kontol.

trans-unit.source: This [Qur'an] is notification for the people that they may be warned thereby and that they may know that He is but one God and that those of understanding will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: See Koraan on taotluste inimestele, et nad hoiatas sellega ja et nad võivad teada on ainult üks Jumal ja need, mis on mõistmise meelde.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Hotell Alif, Lam, Ra. Need on raamat ja selge Koraani värsse.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
trans-unit.target: Ehk need, kes usu tahe soovin, et moslemid osutunud.

trans-unit.source: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Lase neil süüa ja nautida ja levitada [vale] lootus, sest nad ei tea.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
trans-unit.target: Ja me ei muutnud linnas, kuid et ta oli tuntud dekreedi.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
trans-unit.target: No rahvas eelneb selle mõiste, ega nad jäävad pärast seda.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad ütlevad, "O kelle sõnum saadetud alla, tõepoolest te olete hullu.

trans-unit.source: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Miks te ei too meile inglid, kui sa peaksid olema seas on tõesed?"

trans-unit.source: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Me ei saada alla inglid välja arvatud koos tõde; ja ole siis oleks selle uskottomille reprieved.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
trans-unit.target: Tegelikult on meil, kes saatis selle Koraani ja tõepoolest, me olla tema eestkostja.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Ja me kindlasti oli saatnud [kullerid] enne sind [O Muhammad], sektid endine rahvaste seas.

trans-unit.source: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
trans-unit.target: Ja no messenger tulevad neile välja, et nad teda teleekraanil.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Seega me sisestage eitamise oma südamed kurjategijad.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Nad ei usu seda, kuigi on juba toimunud endise Rahvaste pretsedent.

trans-unit.source: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
trans-unit.target: Ja [isegi], kui me neile värava kaudu avatud taevas ja nad jätkasid seal tõusta,

trans-unit.source: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütleks, "meie silmad on ainult olnud dazzled. Pigem oleme mõjutatud magic inimesed."

trans-unit.source: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
trans-unit.target: Ja meil on paigutatud taevas suurt tähte ja on kaunistab vaatlejatele.

trans-unit.source: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
trans-unit.target: Ja me selle kaitsta iga heidetud [halastuse Jumal] devil:

trans-unit.source: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
trans-unit.target: Peale ühe, kes varastab ärakuulamist ja taotletava selge põleva leegi.

trans-unit.source: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
trans-unit.target: Ja maa - meil on levinud see ja enamus seal kindlalt seatud mäed ja tekitanud neis kasvab [midagi] iga tasakaalustatud asi.

trans-unit.source: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
trans-unit.target: Ja oleme teinud sinule neis elu ja [jaoks] need, kellele te ei ole pakkujad.

trans-unit.source: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
trans-unit.target: Ei ole asi aga et siin on oma hoiukohaks ja me ei saada see välja arvatud vastavalt tuntud meede.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
trans-unit.target: Ja me saatnud viljastanud tuuled ja seda saatnud oma taevast ja arvestades sa juua vett. Ja sa ei ole oma fiksaatorites.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, see on me, kes annavad elu ja põhjustada surma ja oleme pärijale.

trans-unit.source: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
trans-unit.target: Meil juba teada eelmise [põlvkondade] teie seas ja me oleme juba teada hiljem [need tulevad].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, teie Issandat kogunevad Tõepoolest, ta on tark ja teades.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: Ja me ei kindlasti loonud mees savist muutunud must muda.

trans-unit.source: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
trans-unit.target: Ja me loodud enne kõrvetav dzinni tulekahju.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: [Märkus, O Muhammad], kuna teie Issand ütles, et inglid, "Loon inimene savist alates muutunud must muda.

trans-unit.source: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: Ja kuna ma proportioned teda ja teda minu [loodud] hinge sisse puhus siis langed talle ja masenduse eest."

trans-unit.source: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
trans-unit.target: Nii et inglid prostrated - kõik nad täielikult,

trans-unit.source: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud Iblees, ta keeldus nendega, kes prostrated.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
trans-unit.target: [Jumalat] ütles: O Iblees, mis on [asja] koos sinuga, et sa ei ole nendega, kes polvistuvan?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Kunagi oleks ma polvistuvan inimesele, kelle loodud savist muutunud must muda."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
trans-unit.target: [Jumalat] ütles: "siis saan sellest välja, sest tõepoolest on välja saadetud.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, teie peale on needus kuni päeva palk. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Issand, siis reprieve mind päevani, nad on ülestõusnud."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
trans-unit.target: [Jumalat] ütles: "Niisiis, oled nendest reprieved

trans-unit.source: Until the Day of the time well-known."
trans-unit.target: Alles päeval kell, mis on hästi tuntud."

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] ütles: "Issand, sest on pannud mind viga, mul on kindlasti teha [allumatus] atraktiivne neile maa peal, ja I eksita neid kõiki

trans-unit.source: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
trans-unit.target: Peale, nende seas teie valitud teenistujate."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
trans-unit.target: [Jumalat] ütles: "see on mulle [see] [tagasi] tee sirge.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, minu sulaseid - puuduvad volitused näidatakse teile on nende üle, välja arvatud need, kes te selle deviators.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, põrgu on lubatud koht neid kõiki.

trans-unit.source: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
trans-unit.target: Tal on seitse väravad; iga värav on neile määratud osa."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, õigemeelsed hakkab paiknema aiad ja vedrud.

trans-unit.source: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
trans-unit.target: [Olles rääkinud], "sisestada rahu, ohutu [ja turvaline]."

trans-unit.source: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
trans-unit.target: Ja me eemaldame, mis iganes on pahameelt, rindades [nii neid] vennad vastakuti troonid.

trans-unit.source: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
trans-unit.target: Mingit väsimuse puudutage neid seal, ega sealt nad [kunagi] eemaldatakse.

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], teavitama minu sulased on mul, kes ma Forgiving, et Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ja et see on minu karistamine, mis on valulik karistuse.

trans-unit.source: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: Informeerida Abraham, külalistele

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
trans-unit.target: Millal nad talle sisestatud ja ütlesid: "Rahu." [Abraham] ütles: "Tõepoolest, me oleme kardavad sind."

trans-unit.source: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
trans-unit.target: [Inglid] ütles: "Ära karda. Tõepoolest, me teile rõõmusõnumit õpitud poiss."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "sa andsid mulle rõõmusõnumit kuigi vanemas eas on tulnud mu peale? Milline ime teete te siis sellest? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "Oleme andnud teile rõõmusõnumit tõsi, nii ei ole ka Meeleheitel."

trans-unit.source: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles "ja kes despairs halastust ta isand, välja arvatud need eksinud?"

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] ütles: "siis mis on teie äri [siin], O kullerid?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "tõepoolest, meil on saadetud kurjategijad, inimesed

trans-unit.source: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud pere palju; Tõepoolest, me päästab neid kõiki

trans-unit.source: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
trans-unit.target: Peale tema naisele." Allah on otsustatud, et ta on, kes maha jäävad.

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
trans-unit.target: Ja kui inglid tuli palju, pere

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
trans-unit.target: Ta ütles: "Tõepoolest, te olete inimesed teadmata."

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid, "kuid me tuleme teile selle kohta, millised nad olid masinale vastavuseeldust,

trans-unit.source: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
trans-unit.target: Meil on tulnud teie tõde ja tõepoolest, me on tõesed.

trans-unit.source: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
trans-unit.target: Nii esitatud koos perega öö tolliinspektuur ajal ja järgige nende taga ja lase mitte keegi teie seast tagasi vaadata ja kus te käskis siis jätkake."

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
trans-unit.target: Ja me edastada talle [dekreedi] kõnealuse juhtumi kohta: mis need patused kõrvaldaks varahommikul.

trans-unit.source: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Ja linna inimesed tulid pidutsemine.

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
trans-unit.target: [Partii] ütles: "tõepoolest, need on mu Külalised, nii et häbi mulle.

trans-unit.source: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
trans-unit.target: Ja Jumal hirmu ja häbi mulle."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlesid: "on meil ei keelatud sa alates [kaitstes] inimesed?"

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
trans-unit.target: [Partii] ütles: "Need on mu tütart - kui sa oleks Kurjategijaist [kohta seadusliku abielu]."

trans-unit.source: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: Teie Life [O Muhammad], tõepoolest nad olid, oma intoksikatsiooni linnas ekslemine pimesi.

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Nii et kriiskamine arestitud neid päikesetõusul.

trans-unit.source: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
trans-unit.target: Ja tegime [linn] kõrgeimas osas kõige madalam ja rained soovi neid kive kõva savi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, et on märgid neile, kes tajuda.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, need linnad [asuvad] kehtestatud maantee.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, et on märk usklikud.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Ja tihnik kaaslased olid [ka] tekitaja.

trans-unit.source: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
trans-unit.target: Seega võtsime neilt gustiku, ja tõepoolest, mõlemad linnad on selge maanteel.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Ja kindlasti Thamud kaaslased eitada kullerid.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
trans-unit.target: Ja andsime neile meie märke, kuid neid nad olid ära keerates.

trans-unit.source: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad kasutasid kitsenduse mägedest, majad, turvaline tunne.

trans-unit.source: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
trans-unit.target: Kuid selle kriiskamine arestitud neid varahommikul kell.

trans-unit.source: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Midagi kasutanud neid [alates] mida nad teenida.

trans-unit.source: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: Ja me pole loonud taeva ja maa ja et nende välja arvatud tõde. Ja tõepoolest, tunnis on tulemas; nii andeks armuline andestust.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, teie Issand - ta on looja, teades.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Ja me kindlasti annan teile, [O Muhammad] seitse sageli korduvate [salmid] ja suur Koraan.

trans-unit.source: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
trans-unit.target: Laiendada oma silmad, et millega me andnud nautimine [] liiki ning uskottomille ja kurvastada, nende üle poole. Ja madalam oma tiiva usklikud

trans-unit.source: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
trans-unit.target: Ja öelda: "Tõepoolest, ma olen selge warner"-

trans-unit.source: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
trans-unit.target: Nii nagu meil oli selgunud [pühakirja] eraldajad

trans-unit.source: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
trans-unit.target: Kes on teinud Koraan portsjoniteks.

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
trans-unit.target: Nii oma Issanda poolt me kindlasti küsivad need kõik

trans-unit.source: About what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Kohta, mida nad varem ei.

trans-unit.source: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
trans-unit.target: Seejärel tuvastada, mida käskis ja selle polytheists lahti.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, meil on piisav teid vastu on mockers

trans-unit.source: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Kes teeb [võrdse] Jumalat teine jumalus. Kuid nad ei kavatse teada.

trans-unit.source: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
trans-unit.target: Ja me teame juba, et teie rinna piirab nende poolt öeldu.

trans-unit.source: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Nii ülendab [Jumalat] oma Issanda kiituseks ja kes polvistuvan [temale] olema.

trans-unit.source: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
trans-unit.target: Ja teie Issandat kummardama, kuni tuleb sulle kindluse (surm).

trans-unit.source: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Jumala käsk on tulemas, nii ei tohi olla kannatamatu seda. Ülendatud on ta ja kohal nad seostavad teda.

trans-unit.source: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: Ta saadab inglid on temale alluvad inspireeritud maha saades kellega ta tahab tema teenistujate [neile öelnud] "Warn et seal on mingit jumalus peale minu; nii kardavad mind."

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Ta lõi taeva ja maa tõde. Kõrge on ta kohal nad seostavad teda.

trans-unit.source: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary.
trans-unit.target: Ta lõi inimese sperma tilk; siis korraga, on selge vastane.

trans-unit.source: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: Ja peetavat karja, ta on loonud sinu jaoks; neis on soojust ja [palju] kasu neist sa sööd.

trans-unit.source: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture].
trans-unit.target: Ja sinu neist on [nautida] Ilu kui tuua neid [jaoks õhtul] ja millal teil saata neid [karjamaale].

trans-unit.source: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad oled võiks ei jõudnud välja arvatud raskustega enda maa oma metsatöödel. Tõepoolest, teie Issand on lahke ja Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and [as] adornment. And He creates that which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ja [ta lõi] hobuseid, muulasid ja eesleid, kus saab sõita ja [nagu] kaunistusteks. Ja ta loob see, mida sa ei tea.

trans-unit.source: And upon Allah is the direction of the [right] way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all.
trans-unit.target: Ja Jumal on suund [õigesti] ning mitmesugustest teed seas on need miinimumsuurusest. Ja kui ta kombeks, ta võiks juhendava teile kõigile.

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture [animals].
trans-unit.target: See on tema, kes saadab sätestatakse vihma taevast; alates jook on ja see on kus te rohumaale [loomi] lehestik.

trans-unit.source: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Ta tekitab seeläbi kultuuride, oliivid, teile kasvatamiseks palm puud, viinapuude, ja kõik puuviljadest. Tõepoolest, et on märk inimestele, kes anna mõtlema.

trans-unit.source: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: Ta on läbinud sinule, öö ja päev ja päike ja kuu ja tähed läbivad tema käsk. Tõepoolest, et on märke inimestele, kes põhjus.

trans-unit.source: And [He has subjected] whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember.
trans-unit.target: Ja [ta on läbinud] mida iganes ta korrutatud teile erinevaid värve maa peal. Tõepoolest, et on märk inimesi, kes mäletavad.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and [He subjected it] that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ja see on ta, kelle suhtes merele, kus saab süüa seda välja liha ja kaunistused väljavõte see, mida te kannate. Näed seda läbi kündmine laevade ja [ta läbinud seda] et võib taotleda tema halastus; ja võibolla teile tänulik.

trans-unit.source: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided,
trans-unit.target: Ja ta on enamus maasse kindlalt seatud mäed, muidu ta nihku ja [tehtud] jõgedest ja teed, et sa võib juhinduda,

trans-unit.source: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided.
trans-unit.target: Ja Maamärgid. Ja poolt tähed nad [ka] giidiga.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Siis on see, kes loob nagu üks, kes ei looda? Nii et sa ei meelde?

trans-unit.source: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui loete Jumal soosib, te võiks loetleda neid. Tõepoolest, Allah on Forgiving ja Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
trans-unit.target: Ja Jumal teab mida varjata ja mida te kuulutada.

trans-unit.source: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created.
trans-unit.target: Ja need nad tugineda, välja arvatud Jumal luua midagi ja nad [ise] luuakse.

trans-unit.source: They are, [in fact], dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Nad on, [tegelikult], surnud, ei ole elus, nad tajuvad, millal nad äratatakse.

trans-unit.source: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Teie Jumal on üks Jumal. Kuid need, kes ei usu edaspidi - nende südamed pahakspanev ja nad on ülbe.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Totisesti, Jumal teab mida nad varjata ja mida nad deklareerida. Tõepoolest, ta ei meeldi ülbe.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
trans-unit.target: Ja kui neile on öeldud, "Millised on teie Issand saatnud oma?" Nad ütlevad, "Endine Rahvaste legende"

trans-unit.source: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear.
trans-unit.target: Et nad võivad kanda oma koormust täielikult ülestõusmise päeval ja mõned maksukoormust, keda nad misguide teadmata. Vaieldamatult, kurjus on see, mis nendel on.

trans-unit.source: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Enne neid oli juba joonistatakse, kuid Jumal tuli kell oma hoone vundamendid, nii katus tungisid neile neid ülevalt ja karistuse tuli neile, kui nad ei taju.

trans-unit.source: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose [the believers]?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers" -
trans-unit.target: Seejärel linna Day of ülestõusmine He näidatakse häbi neile ja ütlevad: "Kus on minu partnerid kelle kasutatud [usklikud] seista?" Need, kes anti teadmisi ütlen, "Tõepoolest häbiplekk, see päev ja paha on pärast selle uskottomille"-

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death [while] wronging themselves, and [who] then offer submission, [saying], "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Need, keda inglid võtta surmaga [kuigi] wronging enda, ja [kes] seejärel pakkuda sõnul [öelda], "Me pole sel mingeid paha." Kuid jah! Tõepoolest, Allah on teades mida sa kasutada seda teha.

trans-unit.source: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Nii sisestage väravad põrgu pidada kinni igavesti seal ja kuidas armetu on ülbe elukoht.

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "[That which is] good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous -
trans-unit.target: Ja ta ütles neile, kes kartsid Jumalat, "Mida tegin oma Issanda saada?" Nad ütlevad, "[see, mis on] hea." Neile, kes teevad hea siin maailmas on hea; ja edaspidi kodus on parem. Ja kui suurepärane on õigustatud - kodu

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous -
trans-unit.target: Aiad perpetual elukoht, kus nad alustavad millist jõgede voolu all. Nad peavad seal iganes nad soovivad. Seega Jumal premeerimiseks õigustatud -

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death, [being] good and pure; [the angels] will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Need, keda inglid võtta surmaga [on] hea ja puhas; [inglid] öeldakse "rahu olgu teile. Sisestage paradiisi mida sa kasutada seda teha."

trans-unit.source: Do the disbelievers await [anything] except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Kas selle uskottomille ootavad [midagi] välja, et inglid peaks tulema neile või sealt tuleb oma Issanda käsku? Seega need teha enne neid. Ja Allah ülekohtu neid ei ole, kuid nad olid wronging ise.

trans-unit.source: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Nii et nad olid kannatanud kurjad tagajärjed mis nad tegid ja on ümbrisega poolt mida nad naeruvääristama.

trans-unit.source: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except [the duty of] clear notification?
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes seostavad teised Jumal öelda, "kui Jumal oli kombeks, me oleks mitte on kummardasid teda, ole meie ega meie isad ega oleks meil on keelatud midagi läbi teda peale." Seega need teha enne neid. Nii on seal upon kullerid, välja arvatud [kohust] selge teate?

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, [saying], "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut."
