trans-unit.target: Päeval nende vabandus on kasulik tekitaja, neil needus ning neil on halvim kodu.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture
trans-unit.target: Me kindlasti andis Moses Arendus ja me põhjustanud Iisraeli laste pühakiri pärimiseks

trans-unit.source: As guidance and a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Arendus ja meeldetuletus neile mõistmist.

trans-unit.source: So be patient, [O Muhammad]. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And ask forgiveness for your sin and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord in the evening and the morning.
trans-unit.target: Nii kannatlik, [O Muhammad]. Tõepoolest, Allah lubadus on tõde. Ja paluda andestust oma pattu ja ülendab [Jumalat] oma Issanda kiituseks, õhtul ja hommikul.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without [any] authority having come to them - there is not within their breasts except pride, [the extent of] which they cannot reach. So seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes vaidlevad riknemistunnuste Jumal [mis tahes] loata tulles neile - pole piires nende rinnad välja arvatud uhkus, [ulatuses] mis nad ei jõua. Nii otsivad Jumalat. Tegelikult on see, kes on kuulmine, ning nähes.

trans-unit.source: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: On suurem kui inimkonna loomine loomine taevas ja maa, kuid enamik inimesi ei tea.

trans-unit.source: And not equal are the blind and the seeing, nor are those who believe and do righteous deeds and the evildoer. Little do you remember.
trans-unit.target: Ja võrdu on pime ja ei näe, samuti on need, kes usuvad ja teha õiged teod ja nende evildoer. Vähe sa mäletad.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, tunnis on tulemas - kahtlemata seda - kuid enamik inimesi ei usu.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord says, "Call upon Me; I will respond to you." Indeed, those who disdain My worship will enter Hell [rendered] contemptible.
trans-unit.target: Teie Issand ütleb: "kutsuvad mind; Ma vastata teile." Tõepoolest, need, kes minu Jumalateenistus põlgama sisestab Hell [muudetud] contemptible.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the night that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people are not grateful.
trans-unit.target: See on Jumal, kes on teinud teile võib puhata seal öö ja päev, andes vaatepilt. Tõepoolest, Allah on täis halastus rahvale, kuid enamik inimesi ei ole tänulik.

trans-unit.source: That is Allah, your Lord, Creator of all things; there is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?
trans-unit.target: Thats Allahi oma Issanda Creator kõike; ei ole jumalus, välja arvatud tema, siis kuidas on teid eksitada?

trans-unit.source: Thus were those [before you] deluded who were rejecting the signs of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Seega olid need [te] enne pöörduvad kes olid tagasilükkamise Jumal märke.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a ceiling and formed you and perfected your forms and provided you with good things. That is Allah, your Lord; then blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: See on Jumal, kes tegi teile maa koht lahendamise ja taevas ülemmäära ja moodustunud teile ja täiuslikuks vormide ja andnud teile head asjad. Thats Allahi oma Issanda; seejärel õnnistatud on Jumal, Issand Maailmade.

trans-unit.source: He is the Ever-Living; there is no deity except Him, so call upon Him, [being] sincere to Him in religion. [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Ta on Ever-elu; ei ole jumalus, välja arvatud tema, nii kutsuvad teda [on] siiras talle religioon. [Kõik] kiitust tuleneb [] Allahi Maailmade isand.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you call upon besides Allah once the clear proofs have come to me from my Lord, and I have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Öelda, [O Muhammad], "tõepoolest, ma keelatud kummardama teid kutsuda peale Jumal kui selged tõendid tuleb mulle minu Issand ja mind on kästud alluma Maailmade isand."

trans-unit.source: It is He who created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.
trans-unit.target: On ta loonud alates tolm, siis sperma-tilk, siis alates Nakkuvat tromb; siis ta toob sulle nagu laps; seejärel [ta arendab te] [aeg] suureks, siis [veel] Hakka Vanematekogu. Ja teie seas on ta, kes on võtnud [see], enne surma, et jõuad tähtajaline; ja võib-olla kasutate põhjus.

trans-unit.source: He it is who gives life and causes death; and when He decrees a matter, He but says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Ta on kes annab elu ja surm; ja kui ta otsustab asja, aga ütleb ta, "Tuleb" ja see on.

trans-unit.source: Do you not consider those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah - how are they averted?
trans-unit.target: Te ei pea neid, kes vaidlevad kohta Jumal - märgid, kuidas nad on hoidnud?

trans-unit.source: Those who deny the Book and that with which We sent Our messengers - they are going to know,
trans-unit.target: Need, kes eitavad raamat ja mis millega saatsime meie inglid - nad hakkavad tea,

trans-unit.source: When the shackles are around their necks and the chains; they will be dragged
trans-unit.target: Kuna seeklid asuvad ümber oma kaela ketid; nad vedasid

trans-unit.source: In boiling water; then in the Fire they will be filled [with flame].
trans-unit.target: Keevas vees; seejärel tulekahju nad on täis [leek].

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said to them, "Where is that which you used to associate [with Him in worship]
trans-unit.target: Siis ta ütles neile: "kus on mida sa kasutasid siduda [koos teda kummardama]

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah?" They will say, "They have departed from us; rather, we did not used to invoke previously anything." Thus does Allah put astray the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud Jumal?" Nad ütlevad, "nad on kaldunud meiega; pigem me ei kasutanud tugineda varem midagi." Seega ei Jumal panna eksinud ning uskottomille.

trans-unit.source: [The angels will say], "That was because you used to exult upon the earth without right and you used to behave insolently.
trans-unit.target: [Inglid ütlevad], "mis oli, sest sa harjunud exult kellel ei maa peal ja sa harjunud käituma insolently.

trans-unit.source: Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."
trans-unit.target: Sisestage pidada kinni igavesti sealsamas surmavalla väravad ja armetu on ülbe elukoht."

trans-unit.source: So be patient, [O Muhammad]; indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And whether We show you some of what We have promised them or We take you in death, it is to Us they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Nii kannatlik, [O Muhammad]; Tõepoolest, Allah lubadus on tõde. Ja kas me näitan sulle mõned mida lubame neil või me teid surmaga, on meile juhul tagastatakse.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you. Among them are those [whose stories] We have related to you, and among them are those [whose stories] We have not related to you. And it was not for any messenger to bring a sign [or verse] except by permission of Allah. So when the command of Allah comes, it will be concluded in truth, and the falsifiers will thereupon lose [all].
trans-unit.target: Ja me juba saadetud käskjalad enne sind. Nende seas on need [kelle lood] meil on teiega seotud ja nende seas on need [kelle lood] me on seotud teile. Ja see ei olnud kõik Messengeri tuua märk [või salm] välja arvatud Jumala loal. Nii et kui Jumala käsk tuleb, jõutakse järeldusele, tõsi ja selle falsifiers puudutavate kaotada [kõik].

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat.
trans-unit.target: See on Jumal, kes tegi teile loomade karjatamiseks, millele te sõita, ja mõned neist sa sööd.

trans-unit.source: And for you therein are [other] benefits and that you may realize upon them a need which is in your breasts; and upon them and upon ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: Ja seal on [muu] kasu ja et võib realiseerida neile vaja, mis on teie rinnad; ja neid ja laevad on läbi.

trans-unit.source: And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allah do you deny?
trans-unit.target: Ja ta näitab oma märgid. Mis Jumal märke ei eita?

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? They were more numerous than themselves and greater in strength and in impression on the land, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: On nad ei sõitnud läbi maa ja jälgida, kuidas oli lõpuks need enne neid? Nad olid arvukamalt kui ennast ja suurema tugevuse ja mulje maal, kuid nad olid kasutanud poolt mida nad teenida.

trans-unit.source: And when their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they [merely] rejoiced in what they had of knowledge, but they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nende käskjalad tulid neile selged tõendid, nad [ainult] rõõmustasime ja neil oli teadmiste, kuid nad olid ümbrisega poolt mida nad naeruvääristama.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw Our punishment, they said," We believe in Allah alone and disbelieve in that which we used to associate with Him."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad nägid meie karistuse nad ütlesid:"me usume Jumal üksi ja mida me kasutasid seostavad teda linnas usu.."

trans-unit.source: But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment. [It is] the established way of Allah which has preceded among His servants. And the disbelievers thereupon lost [all].
trans-unit.target: Aga kunagi tegin oma usku kasu, kui nad nägid meie karistuse. [On] Allah, mis on enne tema teenistujate vahel väljakujunenud viisil. Ja selle uskottomille puudutavate kaotas [kõik].

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ha, Meem.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a revelation from the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful -
trans-unit.target: [On] a Ilmutuse täielikult armulised, eriti armuline -

trans-unit.source: A Book whose verses have been detailed, an Arabic Qur'an for a people who know,
trans-unit.target: Araabia Koraani inimestele, kes teavad, kelle salmid on üksikasjalik, raamat

trans-unit.source: As a giver of good tidings and a warner; but most of them turn away, so they do not hear.
trans-unit.target: Kui tööandja rõõmusõnumit ja warner; kuid enamik neist tõlgivad, et nad ei kuule.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Our hearts are within coverings from that to which you invite us, and in our ears is deafness, and between us and you is a partition, so work; indeed, we are working."
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlevad, "meie südamed jäävad katted, et kuhu sa kutsuda meid, meie kõrvad on kurtus ja meie ja teie on sektsioon, nii et tööd; Tõepoolest, me tegeleme."

trans-unit.source: Say, O [Muhammad], "I am only a man like you to whom it has been revealed that your god is but one God; so take a straight course to Him and seek His forgiveness." And woe to those who associate others with Allah -
trans-unit.target: Öelda, O [Nikolai], "ma olen ainult inimene nagu sina, kellele on avastatud, et teie Jumal on ainult üks Jumal; nii võtta otse loomulikult temaga ja otsima tema andestus." Ja häda neile, kes seostavad teised Allah-

trans-unit.source: Those who do not give zakah, and in the Hereafter they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Need, kes ei anna zakah, ja edaspidi on uskottomille.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes usuvad ja teha õiged teod - neid on katkematu tasu.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Do you indeed disbelieve in He who created the earth in two days and attribute to Him equals? That is the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Öelda: "Kas te tõepoolest usu. ta, kes lõi maa kahe päeva linnas ja atribuudivälja talle võrdub? Mis on Lord of the worlds."

trans-unit.source: And He placed on the earth firmly set mountains over its surface, and He blessed it and determined therein its [creatures'] sustenance in four days without distinction - for [the information] of those who ask.
trans-unit.target: Ja selle pinna kohale mδgede maa kindlalt seatud asetatud ja ta õnnistas seda ja määrata sealsamas oma [olendid] ülalpidamine neli päeva ilma vahet - [Info] jaoks, kes küsida.

trans-unit.source: Then He directed Himself to the heaven while it was smoke and said to it and to the earth, "Come [into being], willingly or by compulsion." They said, "We have come willingly."
trans-unit.target: Siis ta suunatud ise ka taevasse, kuigi see oli suitsu ja ütles, et seda ja maa, "Jõustuma [], vabatahtlikult või sunni." Nad ütlesid: "Me tulnud vabatahtlikult."

trans-unit.source: And He completed them as seven heavens within two days and inspired in each heaven its command. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and as protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta neid valmi seitse taevas kahe päeva jooksul ja inspireeritud iga taevas selle käsu. Ja me kaunistatud lähima taevas laternatega ja kaitse. Mis on ülendatud võiks, et teades kindlaksmääramine.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have warned you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt [that struck] 'Aad and Thamud.
trans-unit.target: Aga kui nad pöörduvad ära, siis öelda, "olen hoiatanud teid thunderbolt nagu selle thunderbolt [mis tabas] ' Aad ja Thamud.

trans-unit.source: [That occurred] when the messengers had come to them before them and after them, [saying], "Worship not except Allah." They said, "If our Lord had willed, He would have sent down the angels, so indeed we, in that with which you have been sent, are disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: [Mis toimus] Kuna inglid olid tulnud neile neid enne ja pärast neid [öelda], "Pole Jumalat peale kummardavad." Nad ütlesid: "kui meie Issand oli kombeks, ta oleks saadetud alla inglid, tõepoolest nii, et millega te olete saatnud, oleme uskottomille."

trans-unit.source: As for 'Aad, they were arrogant upon the earth without right and said, "Who is greater than us in strength?" Did they not consider that Allah who created them was greater than them in strength? But they were rejecting Our signs.
trans-unit.target: Mis puutub ' Aad, nad olid õiguseta rahvahulgal ülbe ja ütles: "Kes on suurem kui meie tugevus?" Nad ei pidanud Jumal, kes nad loonud oli suurem kui nende tugevust? Kuid nad olid tagasilükkamise meie märke.

trans-unit.source: So We sent upon them a screaming wind during days of misfortune to make them taste the punishment of disgrace in the worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter is more disgracing, and they will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: Nii et saatsime neile karjuvad Tuul päeva jooksul ebaõnne enesetäiendamise maitsta karistuse häbiplekk maise elu; aga edaspidi karistus on rohkem disgracing ja nad ei saa midagi.

trans-unit.source: And as for Thamud, We guided them, but they preferred blindness over guidance, so the thunderbolt of humiliating punishment seized them for what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Ja Thamud, nagu me juhendava neid, kuid nad eelistasid pimedus üle arendus, nii alandav karistuse thunderbolt taotleda neid mida nad teenida.

trans-unit.source: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ja me salvestada need, kes uskusid ja kasutanud hirmu Jumal.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day when the enemies of Allah will be gathered to the Fire while they are [driven] assembled in rows,
trans-unit.target: [Märkus, O Muhammad], kuna näidatakse vaenlased Jumal koguda tulekahju, kuni nad [veavad] kokku pandud ridadena, päev

trans-unit.source: Until, when they reach it, their hearing and their eyes and their skins will testify against them of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Kuni, jõudes oma kuulmist ja nende silmad ja nende nahad lõunapoolsele vastu neile, mida nad varem ei.

trans-unit.source: And they will say to their skins, "Why have you testified against us?" They will say, "We were made to speak by Allah, who has made everything speak; and He created you the first time, and to Him you are returned.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad ütlevad, et nende nahad "miks on teil tunnistas meie vastu?" Nad ütlevad, "meid pandi räägivad Jumal, kes on teinud kõike rääkida; Ta lõi esimest korda ja talle tagasi.

trans-unit.source: And you were not covering yourselves, lest your hearing testify against you or your sight or your skins, but you assumed that Allah does not know much of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Ja sa ei katnud ise, muidu oma kohtuistungil sa või nägemise või oma nahad, kuid te vastu tunnistada endale, et Jumal ei tea, palju sellest, mida.

trans-unit.source: And that was your assumption which you assumed about your Lord. It has brought you to ruin, and you have become among the losers."
trans-unit.target: Ja mis oli sinu eeldus, mis te endale umbes teie Issand. See on toonud sa rikud, ja kaotajad seas muutunud."

trans-unit.source: So [even] if they are patient, the Fire is a residence for them; and if they ask to appease [Allah], they will not be of those who are allowed to appease.
trans-unit.target: Nii [isegi] kui need on patsient, tulekahju on elukoht; ja kui nad küsivad appease [Jumalat], mitte neid, kes saavad appease.

trans-unit.source: And We appointed for them companions who made attractive to them what was before them and what was behind them [of sin], and the word has come into effect upon them among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers.
trans-unit.target: Me tööle nende kaaslased, kes tegi neile atraktiivseid, mida enne neid tehti ja milline oli nende [pattu], taga ning sõna on hakanud neile mõju vahel, kes lasi käsitlusega dzinni ja mehed. Nad [kõik] olid kaotajad.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur'an and speak noisily during [the recitation of] it that perhaps you will overcome."
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes usu öelda, "see Koraan kuulata ja rääkida kärarikkalt ajal [ettekandmine] it, mis ehk aitavad ületada."

trans-unit.source: But We will surely cause those who disbelieve to taste a severe punishment, and We will surely recompense them for the worst of what they had been doing.
trans-unit.target: Aga me kindlasti paneb need, kes usu maitsta karm karistus ja me kindlasti palk neile, mida nad olid teinud halvimaks.

trans-unit.source: That is the recompense of the enemies of Allah - the Fire. For them therein is the home of eternity as recompense for what they, of Our verses, were rejecting.
trans-unit.target: Mis on vaenlased Jumal - tulekahju registreerimiskohas. Neid seal on igavik, nagu nad meie värsside olid tagasilükkamiseks registreerimiskohas kodu.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved will [then] say, "Our Lord, show us those who misled us of the jinn and men [so] we may put them under our feet that they will be among the lowest."
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes disbelieved [siis] öelda, "Meie Issand, Näita meile kes eksitas meid dzinni ja meeste [nii] meil võib paneb meie jalad, et nad on ühed väikseimad all."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah " and then remained on a right course - the angels will descend upon them, [saying], "Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise, which you were promised.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes on öelnud: "Issand on Jumal" ja siis jäi õige muidugi - inglid laskuvad nende peale [öelda], "ei karda ja leinata aga saavad paradiisi, kes olid lubas rõõmusõnumit.

trans-unit.source: We [angels] were your allies in worldly life and [are so] in the Hereafter. And you will have therein whatever your souls desire, and you will have therein whatever you request [or wish]
trans-unit.target: [Inglid] olime oma liitlastega maise elu ja [olevad] edaspidi. Ja teil seal mida iganes oma hinge soov, ja sul on seal iganes olete taotlust [või soov]

trans-unit.source: As accommodation from a [Lord who is] Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Majutamiseks [Issand, kes on] Forgiving ja Merciful. "

trans-unit.source: And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Ja kes on kõnes parem kui üks, kes kutsub Allah ja ei õigluses ja ütleb: "Tõepoolest, ma olen ka moslemite."

trans-unit.source: And not equal are the good deed and the bad. Repel [evil] by that [deed] which is better; and thereupon the one whom between you and him is enmity [will become] as though he was a devoted friend.
trans-unit.target: Ja ei ole võrdne on selle heategu ja halb. Tõrjuma [kurja] [Heateo] kumb on parem; ja seejärel üks, kellele teie ja tema vahel on vaen [muutub] nii, nagu ta oli pühendatud sõber.

trans-unit.source: But none is granted it except those who are patient, and none is granted it except one having a great portion [of good].
trans-unit.target: Kuid ükski antakse välja arvatud need, kes on patsiendi ja ükski on antavate kasutusõiguste kellel suur osa [hea].

trans-unit.source: And if there comes to you from Satan an evil suggestion, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui seal tuleb teile Saatan paha ettepanek, siis otsima varjupaika Allah. Tõepoolest, ta on kuulmine, ning teades.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs are the night and day and the sun and moon. Do not prostrate to the sun or to the moon, but prostate to Allah, who created them, if it should be Him that you worship.
trans-unit.target: Ja tema märke on öö ja päev ja päike ja kuu. Polvistuvan päikese või moon, kuid eesnäärme Jumal, kes lõi neid, kui ta peaks olema, et te kummardama.

trans-unit.source: But if they are arrogant - then those who are near your Lord exalt Him by night and by day, and they do not become weary.
trans-unit.target: Aga kui nad on ülbe - siis need, kes on lähedal oma Issand ülendab teda öö ja päev, ja nad ei saanud väsinud.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that you see the earth stilled, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and grows. Indeed, He who has given it life is the Giver of Life to the dead. Indeed, He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Ja tema märke on näed stilled maa, et Millal me saadame ta vihma, see quivers ja kasvab. Tõepoolest, kes on teinud selle elu on elu andja surnud. Tõepoolest, ta on üle kõik asjad pädev.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who inject deviation into Our verses are not concealed from Us. So, is he who is cast into the Fire better or he who comes secure on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you will; indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, kes süstida kõrvalekalle arvesse meie salmid on varjanud meilt. Nii on ta, kes on Tulle paremini või kes on turvaline ülestõusmise päev? Tehke mida iganes te näidatakse; Tõepoolest, ta nägi mida teha.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve in the message after it has come to them... And indeed, it is a mighty Book.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes usu sõnum pärast seda, kui ta siseneb neid... Ja ongi vägev raamat.

trans-unit.source: Falsehood cannot approach it from before it or from behind it; [it is] a revelation from a [Lord who is] Wise and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Valetamine ei saa läheneme sellele: enne või taga [on]: [Issand, kes on] ilmutus tark ja Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Nothing is said to you, [O Muhammad], except what was already said to the messengers before you. Indeed, your Lord is a possessor of forgiveness and a possessor of painful penalty.
trans-unit.target: Täpsustamata teile [O Muhammad], välja arvatud, mida öeldi juba enne kullerid. Tõepoolest, teie Issand on valdaja andestust ja valdaja valus karistus.

trans-unit.source: And if We had made it a non-Arabic Qur'an, they would have said, "Why are its verses not explained in detail [in our language]? Is it a foreign [recitation] and an Arab [messenger]?" Say, "It is, for those who believe, a guidance and cure." And those who do not believe - in their ears is deafness, and it is upon them blindness. Those are being called from a distant place.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui olime teinud seda mitte - Araabia Koraan, nad oleks öelnud, "miks on tema värsse mitte üksikasjalikult selgitatud [meie keel]? On välisriigi [ettekandmine] ja Araabia [messenger]?" "On soovitav, neile, kes usuvad, arendus- ja ravi." Ja need, kes ei usu - neil kõrvus on kurtus ja neile on pimedus. Need kutsutakse kauge koht.

trans-unit.source: And We had already given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.
trans-unit.target: Ja meil oli juba andnud Moses pühakiri, kuid see allus lahkarvamused. Ja kui mitte jaoks sõna, mis eelnes teie Issand, see oleks sõlmitud nende vahel. Ja tõepoolest nad on, Koraan, disquieting kahtluse kohta.

trans-unit.source: Whoever does righteousness - it is for his [own] soul; and whoever does evil [does so] against it. And your Lord is not ever unjust to [His] servants.
trans-unit.target: Kes iganes ei õiglus - see on [oma] hinge; ja kes iganes teeb kurja [ei] selle vastu. Ja teie Issand ei ole kunagi alusetu [oma] sulased.

trans-unit.source: To him [alone] is attributed knowledge of the Hour. And fruits emerge not from their coverings nor does a female conceive or give birth except with His knowledge. And the Day He will call to them, "Where are My 'partners'?" they will say, "We announce to You that there is [no longer] among us any witness [to that]."
trans-unit.target: Talle [üksinda] on omistatud teadmiste tunnil. Ja puuviljad ei nende katete väljumas ega ei naiste nägemus või sünnitavad peale tema teadmisel. Ja päeval ta helistab neile, "Kus on minu partnerid?" nad ütlevad, "Me kuulutame teile et seal enam [] meie ühegi tunnistaja [selleks] seas."

trans-unit.source: And lost from them will be those they were invoking before, and they will be certain that they have no place of escape.
trans-unit.target: Ja neilt kaotas need nad olid tuginevale enne ning neil on teatavad, et nad ei ole koht evakuatsiooniteed.

trans-unit.source: Man is not weary of supplication for good [things], but if evil touches him, he is hopeless and despairing.
trans-unit.target: Mees ei ole väsinud supplication hea [asjad], kuid kui kurja puudutab teda, ta on lootusetu ja Meeleheitel.

trans-unit.source: And if We let him taste mercy from Us after an adversity which has touched him, he will surely say, "This is [due] to me, and I do not think the Hour will occur; and [even] if I should be returned to my Lord, indeed, for me there will be with Him the best." But We will surely inform those who disbelieved about what they did, and We will surely make them taste a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui me laseme tal maitsta halastust meilt pärast vastuoludega, mis on puudutanud teda, ta kindlasti öelda, "see tuleneb [] mulle ja ma ei usu, võivad ilmneda tunnis; ja [isegi] kui ma tuleks tagastada mu Issand, minule tekib temaga parim. " Aga me kindlasti teatada neile, kes disbelieved kohta, mida nad tegid, ja me kindlasti teeb nad maitse massilist karistuse.

trans-unit.source: And when We bestow favor upon man, he turns away and distances himself; but when evil touches him, then he is full of extensive supplication.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui me omistaks kasuks pärast mees, ta keerab ära ja vahemaid ise; kuid kui kurja puudutab teda, siis ta on ulatuslik supplication täis.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an is from Allah and you disbelieved in it, who would be more astray than one who is in extreme dissension?"
trans-unit.target: Öelda: "Kas te lugeda: kui Koraan on Jumalalt ja see, kes oleks rohkem kui üks, kes on äärmiselt lahkhelisid eksinud disbelieved?"

trans-unit.source: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. But is it not sufficient concerning your Lord that He is, over all things, a Witness?
trans-unit.target: Näitame neile meie märke silmaringi ja isekeskis kuni see muutub selgeks neile, et see on tõde. Kuid kas ei piisa, oma Issandat, et ta on üle kõik asjad, tunnistaja kohta?

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, they are in doubt about the meeting with their Lord. Unquestionably He is, of all things, encompassing.
trans-unit.target: Kahtlemata nad tekib kahtlusi nende Issand kohtumine. Vaieldamatult ta on, kõik asjad, mis hõlmab.

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ha, Meem.

trans-unit.source: 'Ayn, Seen, Qaf.
trans-unit.target: ' Ayn, näinud, Qaf.

trans-unit.source: Thus has He revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and to those before you - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Seega on ta näidanud teile [O Muhammad], ja Sinu - Jumal, Might, tark ülendatud.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Temale kuulub iganes on taevas ja mis on maa peal, ja ta on kõige kõrgema, viimane suur.

trans-unit.source: The heavens almost break from above them, and the angels exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and ask forgiveness for those on earth. Unquestionably, it is Allah who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Taevas peaaegu murda neid ülevalt ja inglid ülendab [Jumalat] oma Issanda kiituseks ja kohanes neile maa peal. Kahtlemata on Jumal, kes on Forgiving selle Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And those who take as allies other than Him - Allah is [yet] Guardian over them; and you, [O Muhammad], are not over them a manager.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes võtab liitlastena peale teda - Jumal on [veel] eestkostja üle ja sina, [O Muhammad], ei ole nende üle manager.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have revealed to you an Arabic Qur'an that you may warn the Mother of Cities [Makkah] and those around it and warn of the Day of Assembly, about which there is no doubt. A party will be in Paradise and a party in the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Ja seega me on näidanud teile Araabia Koraan, et võib hoiatada linnade ema [Makkah] ja nende ümber ja hoiatada assamblee päeva kohta, mis ei ole kahtlust. Pool saab paradiisi ja pool lauk.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah willed, He could have made them [of] one religion, but He admits whom He wills into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have not any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: Ning kui Allah kombeks, ta oleks võinud neile [ning] üks usk, aga ta möönab, kellele ta tahab võtta oma halastust. Ja selle tekitaja on mitte kaitsja või helper.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken protectors [or allies] besides him? But Allah - He is the Protector, and He gives life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Või rakendanud kaitsjad [või liitlased] talle peale? Kuid Jumal - ta on kaitsja, ja ta annab elu surnud ja ta on üle kõik asjad pädev.

trans-unit.source: And in anything over which you disagree - its ruling is [to be referred] to Allah. [Say], "That is Allah, my Lord; upon Him I have relied, and to Him I turn back."
trans-unit.target: Ja kõike muud mis te ei nõustu - üle oma otsuse on [nimetatud] Jumala. [St] "thats Allahi Issand; talle on panin, ja temale ma omakorda tagasi."

trans-unit.source: [He is] Creator of the heavens and the earth. He has made for you from yourselves, mates, and among the cattle, mates; He multiplies you thereby. There is nothing like unto Him, and He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: [On] Taeva ja maa looja. Ta ei teinud sest sa enestest, tiimikaaslaste ja karja seas tiimikaaslaste; Ta korrutab sa sellega. Midagi taolist tema juurde ja ta on kuulmine, ning nähes.

trans-unit.source: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. He extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Talle kuuluvad võtmed taevas ja maa. Ta laiendab sätet, kellele ta tahab ja piirab [ta]. Tegelikult ta on kõik asjad, teades.

trans-unit.source: He has ordained for you of religion what He enjoined upon Noah and that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what We enjoined upon Abraham and Moses and Jesus - to establish the religion and not be divided therein. Difficult for those who associate others with Allah is that to which you invite them. Allah chooses for Himself whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Ta on ordineeritud teile religioon, mida ta käskis noa ja seda, mis meil näitas teile [O Muhammad], ja me kutsus Aabrahami ja Moses ja Jeesus - usu ja ei saa jagada sealsamas. Raske nende jaoks, kes teised seostavad Allah on, et kuhu sa kutsuda neid. Jumal valib ise, keda ta tahab ja juhendab teda, kes pöördub tagasi [talle].

trans-unit.source: And they did not become divided until after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord [postponing the penalty] until a specified time, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, those who were granted inheritance of the Scripture after them are, concerning it, in disquieting doubt.
trans-unit.target: Ja neid ei ole muutunud jagada kuni pärast seda, kui teadmised olid tulnud neile - armukade vaenulikkus omavahel läbi. Ja kui mitte jaoks sõna, eelnenud alates oma Issanda [edasilükkamist karistus] määratud ajani, see oleks sõlmitud nende vahel. Ja tõepoolest, need, kes anti pühakiri pärimise nende järel on, teda puudutab disquieting kaheldav.

trans-unit.source: So to that [religion of Allah] invite, [O Muhammad], and remain on a right course as you are commanded and do not follow their inclinations but say, "I have believed in what Allah has revealed of the Qur'an, and I have been commanded to do justice among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. For us are our deeds, and for you your deeds. There is no [need for] argument between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is the [final] destination."
trans-unit.target: Nii et [religiooni Jumal] kutsuda, [O Muhammad], ja jääma õige teele, kui kästakse ja järgige oma kalduvustele, kuid öelda, "ja mida Jumal näitas Koraani uskusin ja mind on kästud vääriliselt teie seast. Jumal on Issand ja oma Issanda. Meie jaoks on meie tegusid ja teile oma tegusid. Ei ole [vajadus] argument meie ja teie. Jumal toob meid kokku, ja talle on [lõplik] sihtkoht."

trans-unit.source: And those who argue concerning Allah after He has been responded to - their argument is invalid with their Lord, and upon them is [His] wrath, and for them is a severe punishment.
trans-unit.target: Need, kes pooldavad kohta pärast seda, kui ta ei olnud vastanud - nende argument ei sobi nende Issand ja nende peale Allah on [tema] viha ja neil on karm karistus.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who has sent down the Book in truth and [also] the balance. And what will make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near.
trans-unit.target: See on Jumal, kes on saatnud oma tõde ja [ka] jääksumma raamat. Ja mis teeb sind tajuvad? Võibolla tund on lähedal.

trans-unit.source: Those who do not believe in it are impatient for it, but those who believe are fearful of it and know that it is the truth. Unquestionably, those who dispute concerning the Hour are in extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Need, kes ei usu see on seda kannatamatu, kuid need, kes usuvad, et see kohutav ja tean, et see on tõde. Vaieldamatult, kes vaidluse kohta tunnis on äärmuslik viga.

trans-unit.source: Allah is Subtle with His servants; He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Allah on peent oma sulased; Ta annab sätteid, kellele ta tahab. Ja ta on võimas ja ülendatud võiks.

trans-unit.source: Whoever desires the harvest of the Hereafter - We increase for him in his harvest. And whoever desires the harvest of this world - We give him thereof, but there is not for him in the Hereafter any share.
trans-unit.target: Kes iganes soovib edaspidi - saagi me tõusma teda oma saagi. Ja kes iganes soovib selles maailmas harvest - anname talle sellest, kuid pole teda edaspidi mis tahes osa.

trans-unit.source: Or have they other deities who have ordained for them a religion to which Allah has not consented? But if not for the decisive word, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, the wrongdoers will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Või on nad teiste jumalused, kes on ordineeritud nende religioon, mis Jumal on andnud? Aga kui mitte otsustav sõna jaoks see oleks sõlmitud nende vahel. Ja tõepoolest, mille tekitaja on valus karistuse.

trans-unit.source: You will see the wrongdoers fearful of what they have earned, and it will [certainly] befall them. And those who have believed and done righteous deeds will be in lush regions of the gardens [in Paradise] having whatever they will in the presence of their Lord. That is what is the great bounty.
trans-unit.target: Näed Petturite kardavad nad on teeninud, ja see [kindlasti] tabada neid. Ja need, kes on uskunud ja teinud head teod on lopsakas piirkondades aiad [paradiisis] kellel iganes nad näidatakse juuresolekul nende Issand. Seda on suur halastus.

trans-unit.source: It is that of which Allah gives good tidings to His servants who believe and do righteous deeds. Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for this message any payment [but] only good will through kinship." And whoever commits a good deed - We will increase for him good therein. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Appreciative.
trans-unit.target: See on, et milline Jumal annab rõõmusõnumit oma sulased, kes usuvad ja teha õiged teod. Öelda, [O Muhammad], "Ma ei teilt selle sõnumi piletiga [kuid] ainus hea tahte kaudu suguluse." Ja kes iganes võtab heategu - suurendame teda hea seal. Tõepoolest, Allah on Forgiving ja Appreciative.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He has invented about Allah a lie"? But if Allah willed, He could seal over your heart. And Allah eliminates falsehood and establishes the truth by His words. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Või nad ütlevad, "Ta on leiutanud umbes Allah on vale"? Aga kui Jumal kombeks, ta võiks seal üle oma südame. Ja Allah kõrvaldab valetamine ja kehtestatakse tõde tema sõna. Ta on tõepoolest, teades, et maksimaalselt rinnad.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who accepts repentance from his servants and pardons misdeeds, and He knows what you do.
trans-unit.target: On see, kes aktsepteerib meeleparandus tema teenistujatelt ja andis armu üleastumised ja ta teab, mida teha.

trans-unit.source: And He answers [the supplication of] those who have believed and done righteous deeds and increases [for] them from His bounty. But the disbelievers will have a severe punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta vastab [supplication], kes on uskunud ja teinud õiged teod ja suureneb [jaoks] neid alates tema halastus. Kuid selle uskottomille on karm karistus.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah had extended [excessively] provision for His servants, they would have committed tyranny throughout the earth. But He sends [it] down in an amount which He wills. Indeed He is, of His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ning kui Allah oli laiendatud [ülemäära] reserv oma sulased, nad on võtnud kogu maa türannia. Kuid ta saadab [ta] sätestatakse summas, mida ta tahab. Tegelikult ta on, tema teenistujate, tutvustatakse ja nähes.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who sends down the rain after they had despaired and spreads His mercy. And He is the Protector, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Ja see on tema, kes saadab sätestatakse vihma pärast seda, kui nad olid despaired ja levib tema halastust. Ja ta on kaitsja, on Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: And of his signs is the creation of the heavens and earth and what He has dispersed throughout them of creatures. And He, for gathering them when He wills, is competent.
trans-unit.target: Ja tema märke on taevas ja maa loomise ja mida ta on hajutatud need olendid. Ja ta, koguda, kui ta tahab, on pädev.

trans-unit.source: And whatever strikes you of disaster - it is for what your hands have earned; but He pardons much.
trans-unit.target: Ja mis iganes tabab sind katastroofi - on mida käed teeninud; kuid ta andis armu palju.

trans-unit.source: And you will not cause failure [to Allah] upon the earth. And you have not besides Allah any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: Ja sa ei põhjusta jätmine [Jumalat] maa peal. Ja mõni mitte lisaks Allah on kaitsja või helper.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs are the ships in the sea, like mountains.
trans-unit.target: Ja tema märke on meri, mäed nagu laevad.

trans-unit.source: If He willed, He could still the wind, and they would remain motionless on its surface. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: Kui ta kombeks, ta võiks ikka tuul ja nad jäävad liikumatult, selle pinnale. Tõepoolest, et on märke kõigile patsientide ja tänulik.

trans-unit.source: Or He could destroy them for what they earned; but He pardons much.
trans-unit.target: Või ta võib hävitada neid nad teenitud; kuid ta andis armu palju.

trans-unit.source: And [that is so] those who dispute concerning Our signs may know that for them there is no place of escape.
trans-unit.target: Ja [see on nii] kes vaidlusta meie riknemistunnuste võib teada, et neil puudub koht evakuatsiooniteed.

trans-unit.source: So whatever thing you have been given - it is but [for] enjoyment of the worldly life. But what is with Allah is better and more lasting for those who have believed and upon their Lord rely
trans-unit.target: Seega on mis tahes asi teile on antud - kuid [jaoks] maise elu nautimine. Aga milline on Jumal on parem ja rohkem püsiva neile, kes on uskunud ja oma Issanda sõltuda

trans-unit.source: And those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, and when they are angry, they forgive,
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes vältida suuremate pattude ja immoralities, ja kuna nad on vihased, nad andeks,

trans-unit.source: And those who have responded to their lord and established prayer and whose affair is [determined by] consultation among themselves, and from what We have provided them, they spend.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes on nende Issand vastas asutatud palve ja kelle asi on [määratud] konsultatsiooni omavahel ja mida me oleme pakkunud neile, nad veedavad.

trans-unit.source: And those who, when tyranny strikes them, they defend themselves,
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes türannia lööb neile, kui nad ennast, kaitsta

trans-unit.source: And the retribution for an evil act is an evil one like it, but whoever pardons and makes reconciliation - his reward is [due] from Allah. Indeed, He does not like wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Ja kättemaksu kurja teo eest on paha meeldib see, kuid kes andis armu ja muudab leppimise - tema tasu tuleneb [] Jumalalt. Tõepoolest, ta ei meeldi tekitaja.

trans-unit.source: And whoever avenges himself after having been wronged - those have not upon them any cause [for blame].
trans-unit.target: Ja kes avenges ise tehtud ülekohtu pärast - kõik pole nende peale on [alust süüdistada].

trans-unit.source: The cause is only against the ones who wrong the people and tyrannize upon the earth without right. Those will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Põhjuseks on ainult need, kes valesti inimesed ja tyrannize kellel ei maa peal. Need on valus karistuse.

trans-unit.source: And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters [requiring] determination.
trans-unit.target: Ja kes on kannatlik ja andestab - tõepoolest, mis on määramispiir [nõudvates] küsimustes.

trans-unit.source: And he whom Allah sends astray - for him there is no protector beyond Him. And you will see the wrongdoers, when they see the punishment, saying, "Is there for return [to the former world] any way?"
trans-unit.target: Ja ta, kellele Jumal saadab eksinud - teda seal on mingit protector kaugemale. Ja näed Petturite, kui nad näevad karistus, öeldes: "Kas [naasmist endine maailma] jaoks kuidagi?"

trans-unit.source: And you will see them being exposed to the Fire, humbled from humiliation, looking from [behind] a covert glance. And those who had believed will say, "Indeed, the [true] losers are the ones who lost themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, the wrongdoers are in an enduring punishment."
trans-unit.target: Ja sa näed neid ümbritsevatele tulekahju, alandlikuks alanduse, [taga] covert pilguga vaadates. Ja need, kes uskusid, oli öelda, "tõepoolest [tõeline] kaotajad on need, kes on kaotanud iseennast ja oma perekonda, ülestõusmise päeval. Vaieldamatult, mille tekitaja on kestev karistuse."

trans-unit.source: And there will not be for them any allies to aid them other than Allah. And whoever Allah sends astray - for him there is no way.
trans-unit.target: Ja seal ei ole neile kõik liitlased abi neid ei ole Jumal. Ja kes iganes Jumal saadab eksinud - teda on võimatu.

trans-unit.source: Respond to your Lord before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. No refuge will you have that day, nor for you will there be any denial.
trans-unit.target: Vastata oma Issanda enne päevas tuleb Jumalalt, millest ei ole tõrjuv. No refuge näidatakse teile on sel päeval ega teile kas tuleb rahuldamata jätmist.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away - then We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a guardian; upon you is only [the duty of] notification. And indeed, when We let man taste mercy from us, he rejoices in it; but if evil afflicts him for what his hands have put forth, then indeed, man is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Aga kui nad tõlgivad - siis me ei saatnud, [O Muhammad], nende hooldaja; saades on ainult [kohust] teatise. Ja tõepoolest, kui me laseme mees maitse halastust meilt, ta rõõmustab ta; Aga kui kurja afflicts teda eest mida tema käed on ajama, siis tõepoolest, mees on tänamatu.

trans-unit.source: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He creates what he wills. He gives to whom He wills female [children], and He gives to whom He wills males.
trans-unit.target: Allah kuulub võim taevas ja maa; Ta loob, mida ta tahab. Ta annab, kellele ta tahab naine [lapsi] ja ta annab kellega ta wills meestel.

trans-unit.source: Or He makes them [both] males and females, and He renders whom He wills barren. Indeed, He is Knowing and Competent.
trans-unit.target: Ta muudab need [nii] meestel ja naistel ja ta muudab kellega ta wills viljatu. Ta on tõepoolest, teades ja kompetentne.

trans-unit.source: And it is not for any human being that Allah should speak to him except by revelation or from behind a partition or that He sends a messenger to reveal, by His permission, what He wills. Indeed, He is Most High and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Ja see ei ole inimese jaoks, et Jumal peaks rääkima talle peale Ilmutuse või taga partitsiooni või et ta saadab Messengeri võltsingud tema õigusi, mida ta tahab. Tõepoolest, ta on kõige kõrgema ja tark.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have revealed to you an inspiration of Our command. You did not know what is the Book or [what is] faith, but We have made it a light by which We guide whom We will of Our servants. And indeed, [O Muhammad], you guide to a straight path -
trans-unit.target: Ja seega me on näidanud teile meie käsk inspiratsiooni. Sa ei tea, milline on raamat või [mis on] usku, kuid meil on teinud see valgus, millega me juhend, kellele me meie teenistujate. Ja tõepoolest, [O Muhammad] te suunata õigele teele-

trans-unit.source: The path of Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Unquestionably, to Allah do [all] matters evolve.
trans-unit.target: Jumal, kellele tee kuulub iganes on taevas ja mis on maa peal. Vaieldamatult, et Jumal ei [kõik] küsimustes arenema.

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ha, Meem.

trans-unit.source: By the clear Book,
trans-unit.target: Selge raamatu järgi

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, meil on teinud Araabia Koraan, et saate aru.

trans-unit.source: And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book with Us, exalted and full of wisdom.
trans-unit.target: Ja tegelikult see on, ema raamat koos meiega, ülendatud ja täis tarkust.

trans-unit.source: Then should We turn the message away, disregarding you, because you are a transgressing people?
trans-unit.target: Siis peaks pöörduvad sõnumi ära, arvestamata teile, sest te ei transgressing inimesi?

trans-unit.source: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: Ja kuidas paljud prohvet saatsime endine loomises,

trans-unit.source: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him.
trans-unit.target: Aga seal ei tule neile prohvetiks välja, et nad kasutasid teda naeruvääristama.

trans-unit.source: And We destroyed greater than them in [striking] power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded.
trans-unit.target: Me hävitada neid [silmatorkav] võimu üle ja endine Rahvaste näide on ees.

trans-unit.source: And if you should ask them, "Who has created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "They were created by the Exalted in Might, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui siis paluge neid, "Kes on loonud taeva ja maa?" nad kindlasti ütleks, "Nad lõid võiks, et teades ülendatud."

trans-unit.source: [The one] who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided
trans-unit.target: [Üks] kes on teinud teile maa voodis ja tegi teile talle teed, et sa võiks juhinduda

trans-unit.source: And who sends down rain from the sky in measured amounts, and We revive thereby a dead land - thus will you be brought forth -
trans-unit.target: Ja kes saadab vihma mõõdetud kogustes, mis taevast alla ja me elustada seeläbi surnud maa - seega näidatakse teile tõi ilmale-

trans-unit.source: And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount.
trans-unit.target: Ja kes lõi liikide, neid kõiki, ja on teinud teile laevade ja looma mis sa mount.

trans-unit.source: That you may settle yourselves upon their backs and then remember the favor of your Lord when you have settled upon them and say. "Exalted is He who has subjected this to us, and we could not have [otherwise] subdued it.
trans-unit.target: Et võib lahendada ise oma seljal ja siis mäletan oma Issanda kasuks, kui teil on tasakaalustamisel neile öelda. "Ülendatud on ta, kelle suhtes on see meile ja me võiks mitte on [muidu] halvad see.

trans-unit.source: And indeed we, to our Lord, will [surely] return."
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest meie, meie Issanda [kindlasti] tagasi."

trans-unit.source: But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion. Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Kuid nad on temaga seostada tema teenistujatelt osa. Mees on tõepoolest selgelt tänamatu.

trans-unit.source: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons?
trans-unit.target: Või on ta mis ta on loonud, välja võetud tütart ja valinud te [OLLES] pojad?

trans-unit.source: And when one of them is given good tidings of that which he attributes to the Most Merciful in comparison, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui üks neist on andnud häid sõnumeid, mida ta omistab armollinen võrdlus, tema nägu muutub tume ja ta pärsib leina.

trans-unit.source: So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident [attributed to Allah]?
trans-unit.target: Nii on üks üles kasvanud kaunistused küll unevident konflikti ajal [omistatud Allah]?

trans-unit.source: And they have made the angels, who are servants of the Most Merciful, females. Did they witness their creation? Their testimony will be recorded, and they will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: Ja see ei inglid, kes on teenistujate armollinen, naistel. Tegin nad tunnistajaks nende loomist? Tuleb registreerida nende ütlused ja neid küsitletakse.

trans-unit.source: And they said, "If the Most Merciful had willed, we would not have worshipped them." They have of that no knowledge. They are not but falsifying.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad ütlesid: "kui kõige Merciful oli kombeks, me oleks mitte on kummardasid neid." Neil on seda ei tea. Nad ei ole aga võltsimine.

trans-unit.source: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering?
trans-unit.target: Või oleme andnud neile raamatut enne Koraan, mille küljes?

trans-unit.source: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps [rightly] guided."
trans-unit.target: Pigem nad ütlevad, "tõepoolest, leidsime meie isad pärast religiooni, ja me oleme nende jälgedes [õigustatult] juhendava."

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We did not send before you any warner into a city except that its affluent said, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are, in their footsteps, following."
trans-unit.target: Ja samamoodi me ei saatnud enne mis tahes warner linna peale et tema jõukad ütles: "Tõepoolest, leidsime meie isad pärast religiooni, ja me oleme nende jälgedes pärast."

trans-unit.source: [Each warner] said, "Even if I brought you better guidance than that [religion] upon which you found your fathers?" They said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: [Iga warner] ütles: "isegi siis, kui ma tõin sulle parem juhiseid kui selle usu pärast mis sa leidsid oma isade?" Nad ütlesid: "Tõepoolest, et kellega sa saadeti, oleme uskottomille."

trans-unit.source: So we took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Niisiis võtsime kättemaksu siis vaata, kuidas oli lõpuks vaatama.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship
trans-unit.target: [Märkus, O Muhammad], kui Aabraham ütles isa ja tema inimesed "tõepoolest, ma olen lahtiseostatud, et mis te kummardama

trans-unit.source: Except for He who created me; and indeed, He will guide me."
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud see, kes lõi mind; ja tõepoolest, ta juhendab mind."

trans-unit.source: And he made it a word remaining among his descendants that they might return [to it].
trans-unit.target: Ja ta tegi seda allesjäänud seas tema järeltulijad, et nad võivad tagasi pöörduda [] sõna.

trans-unit.source: However, I gave enjoyment to these [people of Makkah] and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger.
trans-unit.target: Aga ma andsin nautimine need [Makkah inimesed] ja oma isade kuni tuli neile tõtt ja selge Messenger.

trans-unit.source: But when the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and indeed we are, concerning it, disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: Aga kui tõde tuli neile, ütlesid nad: "see on magic, ja tõepoolest me on, see uskottomille kohta."

trans-unit.source: And they said, "Why was this Qur'an not sent down upon a great man from [one of] the two cities?"
trans-unit.target: Ja nad ütles: "miks see Koraan ei saadetud pärast mees [üks] kahes linnas?"

trans-unit.source: Do they distribute the mercy of your Lord? It is We who have apportioned among them their livelihood in the life of this world and have raised some of them above others in degrees [of rank] that they may make use of one another for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.
trans-unit.target: Omavate teie Issand halasta? See on me, kes on jaotatud nende seas elu selles maailmas elatist ning on tekkinud mõned neist ülalmainitud teised kraadides [rank] kohta, mida ta saab teha kasutada ühe teise teenust. Kuid oma Issanda halastus on parem kui iganes nad koguneda.

trans-unit.source: And if it were not that the people would become one community [of disbelievers], We would have made for those who disbelieve in the Most Merciful - for their houses - ceilings and stairways of silver upon which to mount
trans-unit.target: Ja kui see ei olnud, et inimesed saaks ühe kogukonna [uskottomille], me oleks teinud neile, kes usu. armollinen - nende ERAMUTELE - laed ja silver seadusesättele Mount trepid

trans-unit.source: And for their houses - doors and couches [of silver] upon which to recline
trans-unit.target: Ja nende maja - uksed ja seinavalgustid [of silver] mille lebama

trans-unit.source: And gold ornament. But all that is not but the enjoyment of worldly life. And the Hereafter with your Lord is for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Ja kulla ornament. Aga kõik see pole aga maise elu nautimine. Ja edaspidi teie Issand on õige.

trans-unit.source: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion.
trans-unit.target: Ja kes on pimestatuna mälestuseks Viimane armuline - meil nimetada teda kurat ja ta on tema kaaslane.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the devils avert them from the way [of guidance] while they think that they are [rightly] guided
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, kuradid vältida neid on viis [Juhend] Kuigi nad arvavad, et [õigustatult] giidiga

trans-unit.source: Until, when he comes to Us [at Judgement], he says [to his companion], "Oh, I wish there was between me and you the distance between the east and west - how wretched a companion."
trans-unit.target: Enne, kui ta tuleb meile [at kohtuotsuse], ütleb ta [tema kaaslane], et "Oh, soovin oli vahel mina ja sina vahemaa Ida ja Lääne - kuidas armetu kaaslane."

trans-unit.source: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are [all] sharing in the punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ja kunagi see kasu teile see päev, millal on vääriti koheldud, et [kõik] edastate karistuse.

trans-unit.source: Then will you make the deaf hear, [O Muhammad], or guide the blind or he who is in clear error?
trans-unit.target: Siis sa teha Kurtide kuulda [O Muhammad] ega juhend pimedatele või kes on selge viga?

trans-unit.source: And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them.
trans-unit.target: Ja kas (või mitte) me teid ära [death], tõepoolest, me võtab kättemaksu neile.

trans-unit.source: Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: Või kas (või mitte) näitame teile, mida lubame neil, tõepoolest, me võime täiuslik.

trans-unit.source: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Nii järgima seda, mis on näitas sulle. Tõepoolest, olete sirgel teel.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, on meelde tuletada teile ja teie inimesed ja olete [kõik] läheb küsitlema.

trans-unit.source: And ask those We sent before you of Our messengers; have We made besides the Most Merciful deities to be worshipped?
trans-unit.target: Ja küsi nendelt saatsime enne kui meie kullerid; Kas me oleme teinud lisaks armollinen jumalused tuleb teeninud?

trans-unit.source: And certainly did We send Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, and he said, "Indeed, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Kindlasti ei saadame Moses meie märkidega vaarao ja tema asukoha ja ta ütles: "Tõepoolest, ma olen sõnumitooja Maailmade isand."

trans-unit.source: But when he brought them Our signs, at once they laughed at them.
trans-unit.target: Aga kui ta tõi need meie märke korraga nad naersid neid.

trans-unit.source: And We showed them not a sign except that it was greater than its sister, and We seized them with affliction that perhaps they might return [to faith].
trans-unit.target: Ja me näitas neile ei märgiks, et see oli suurem kui tema õde ja me kinni nende viletsust, et võibolla nad võivad tagasi [usus].

trans-unit.source: And they said [to Moses], "O magician, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. Indeed, we will be guided."
trans-unit.target: Ja nad ütlesid [Moses], et "O mustkunstnik, tugineda oma Issanda poolt, mida ta on lubanud te meile. Tõepoolest, me juhindub."

trans-unit.source: But when We removed from them the affliction, at once they broke their word.
trans-unit.target: Aga kui meil eemaldatakse nende viletsust, korraga nad murdis oma sõna.

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see?
trans-unit.target: Ja oma rahva seas nn vaarao ta ütles: "O minu inimesed mitte riik kuulub mulle ja need jõed voolavad all mind; siis sa ei näe?

trans-unit.source: Or am I [not] better than this one who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear?
trans-unit.target: Või olen ma [ei] parem kui see üks, kes on väike ja vaevalt on selge?

trans-unit.source: Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction?"
trans-unit.target: Siis miks seal ei ole suunatud talle käevõrud kulla või tuled temaga koos inglid? "

trans-unit.source: So he bluffed his people, and they obeyed him. Indeed, they were [themselves] a people defiantly disobedient [of Allah].
trans-unit.target: Nii ta bluffed oma rahvale ja nad kuuletusin talle. Tõepoolest, nad olid [ise] väljakutsuvalt sõnakuulmatud [Jumala] rahvas.

trans-unit.source: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad on vihane meile, võtsime neilt kättemaksu ja uppus neid kõiki.

trans-unit.source: And We made them a precedent and an example for the later peoples.
trans-unit.target: Ja tegime neile pretsedenti ja näiteks hilisem Rahvaste.

trans-unit.source: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui Maarja poeg oli näiteks, kohe oma inimesi naeris valjusti.

trans-unit.source: And they said, "Are your gods better, or is he?" They did not present the comparison except for [mere] argument. But, [in fact], they are a people prone to dispute.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad ütlesid: "On teie jumalad parem, või ta on?" Nad ei esitanud, välja arvatud [pelgalt] argument võrdlus. Kuid [tegelikult], nad on inimesed altid vaidlustada.

trans-unit.source: Jesus was not but a servant upon whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel.
trans-unit.target: Jeesus ei olnud aga sulane, kelle me andnud kasuks ja tegime talle näiteks Iisraeli lapsed.

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could have made [instead] of you angels succeeding [one another] on the earth.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui meil kombeks, me oleks võinud [hoopis] sa edukalt [üksteisele] maa inglid.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Jesus will be [a sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, Jeesus olla [märk jaoks] teadmised tunni, nii ei tohi olla kahtluse all, ja järgige mind. See on sirge tee.

trans-unit.source: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: Ja ei lase te vältida Saatan. Tõepoolest, ta on teil selge vaenlane.

trans-unit.source: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui Jeesus tõi selged tõendid, ütles ta, "olen jõudnud sa tarkus ja selge teile mõned et mille üle te erinevad, nii kardavad, et Allah ja kuuletuma mind.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, Allah on minu Issand ja sinu isand, nii et teda kummardama. See on sirge tee."

trans-unit.source: But the denominations from among them differed [and separated], so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day.
trans-unit.target: Kuid nendest nimiväärtuste erines [ja eraldatud], nii häda neile, kes on vääriti koheldud valus päev karistusest.

trans-unit.source: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not?
trans-unit.target: Nad ootavad välja arvatud tund tulnud neile äkki, kuigi nad tajuvad mitte?

trans-unit.source: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous
trans-unit.target: Lähedased sõbrad, et päev, on vaenlased omavahel, välja arvatud õige

trans-unit.source: [To whom Allah will say], "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve,
trans-unit.target: [Kellele Allah ütleb], "O minu sulaseid ei karda näidatakse seal olla kohta te sel päeval ega näidatakse leinata,

trans-unit.source: [You] who believed in Our verses and were Muslims.
trans-unit.target: [Te] kes uskusid meie salmid ja olid moslemid.

trans-unit.source: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted."
trans-unit.target: Sisestage paradiisi, sina ja teie liigid, väga rahul."

trans-unit.source: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Nende seas ringelnud saab plaadid ja laevade kulda. Kõnealuses määruses on mis iganes hinge soov ja [mis] rõõmustab silma ja te täitma seal igavesti.

trans-unit.source: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Ja ongi paradiis, mis tegemise eest mida sa kasutada ei päri.

trans-unit.source: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat.
trans-unit.target: Teil on seal palju vilja, mida sa sööd.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, kurjategijad on Hell, igavesti käitumisele karistust.

trans-unit.source: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair.
trans-unit.target: Ta ei tohi neid vaibuma ja selles on Meeleheitel.

trans-unit.source: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Ja me tegin valesti neid, kuid nemad olid selle tekitaja.

trans-unit.source: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain."
trans-unit.target: Ja nad nõuavad, "O Malik, lase oma lõpu tegema meid Issand!" Ta ütlen, "Tõepoolest, siis jää."

trans-unit.source: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.
trans-unit.target: Meil oli kindlasti toonud teile tõtt, kuid enamik sul, tõtt, olid tõrksad.

trans-unit.source: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan].
trans-unit.target: Või on nad välja [mõned] asi? Aga tegelikult on kavandada [kava].

trans-unit.source: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, [We do], and Our messengers are with them recording.
trans-unit.target: Või kas nad arvavad, et kuuleme nende saladusi ja nende eravestlustes? Jah, [teeme], ja meie kullerid on nendega salvestus.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of [his] worshippers."
trans-unit.target: Ütlen, [O Muhammad], "kui kõige Merciful oli poeg, siis ma oleks esimese [tema] kummardajaid."

trans-unit.source: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Ülendatud Issand taeva ja maa Issand Throne, on eespool nad kirjeldavad.

trans-unit.source: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised.
trans-unit.target: Nii jäta neid asjata vestelda ja lõbustada ennast enne, kui nad vastavad nende päev, mida nad on lubanud.

trans-unit.source: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ja see on Jumal, kes on [ainult] jumalus on taevas ja maa [ainus] jumalus. Ja ta on tark, et teades.

trans-unit.source: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Ja õnnistatud on ta üle, kellele kuulub võim taevas ja maa ja iganes on nende vahel ja kellega on teadmised tunni ja kellega saad tagasi.

trans-unit.source: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess [power of] intercession; but only those who testify to the truth [can benefit], and they know.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, mis on talle peale territooriumil asjaomane valda [võim] eestkostmine; kuid ainult need, kes tunnistada, et [saavad] tõde, ja nad teavad.

trans-unit.source: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded?
trans-unit.target: Ja kui sa küsisid neid, kes on selle loonud, nad kindlasti öelda, "Jumal." Niisiis, kuidas nad eksitada?

trans-unit.source: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."
trans-unit.target: Ja [Allah tunnistab] tema öeldes, "O Issand tõesti need on inimesed, kes ei usu."

trans-unit.source: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Nii omakorda neile peale ja öelda: "Rahu." Kuid nad ei kavatse teada.

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ha, Meem.

trans-unit.source: By the clear Book,
trans-unit.target: Selge raamatu järgi

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, oleme saatnud oma see õnnis öö jooksul. Tõepoolest, olime hoiatanud [inimkonna].

trans-unit.source: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -
trans-unit.target: Sel ööl tehakse eraldi iga täpset asja-

trans-unit.source: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]
trans-unit.target: [Iga] küsimuse [menetluse] meilt. Tõepoolest, me olime saata [messenger]

trans-unit.source: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Kui teie Issand halastust. Tõepoolest, ta on kuulmine, ning teades.

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.
trans-unit.target: Issand taeva ja maa ja et neid, kui sa oleks teatud ajavahemikus.

trans-unit.source: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.
trans-unit.target: Ei ole jumalus, välja arvatud tema; Ta annab elu ja surm. [On] teie Issandat ja teie esimene esiisade isand.

trans-unit.source: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.
trans-unit.target: Kuid nad on kahtluse all, lõbusa ise.

trans-unit.source: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.
trans-unit.target: Siis vaadata kui taevas toon nähtav suitsu päevas.

trans-unit.source: Covering the people; this is a painful torment.
trans-unit.target: Mis hõlmab inimesi; See on valus piin.

trans-unit.source: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."
trans-unit.target: [Nad ütlevad], "meie Issanda eemaldada meilt piin; Tõepoolest, me oleme usklikud."

trans-unit.source: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.
trans-unit.target: Kuidas kas tuleb neile meeldetuletus [tollast]? Ja seal tuli neile selge Messenger.

trans-unit.source: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."
trans-unit.target: Siis nad loobunud teda ja ütles: "[ta oli] õpetas [ja on] hull."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, meil eemaldatakse piin jaoks vähe. Tõepoolest, [uskottomille] naastakse [uskumatus].

trans-unit.source: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.
trans-unit.target: Päev, mil me ründavad suurim rünnak, tõepoolest, võtame kättemaksu.

trans-unit.source: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,
trans-unit.target: Me juba proovitud enne neid rahvale vaarao ja seal tuli neile üllas messenger

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger,"
trans-unit.target: [Öelda], "Render mulle Allah teenijad. Tõepoolest, ma olen sulle usaldusväärne messenger"

trans-unit.source: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.
trans-unit.target: Ja [öelda], "ei tohi olla ülbed Jumalat. Tõepoolest, olen jõudnud teile selge asutusega.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, ma otsisid varjupaika minu Issand ja oma Issanda muidu te kivi mind.

trans-unit.source: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."
trans-unit.target: Aga kui sa ei usu mind, siis jätke mind rahule."

trans-unit.source: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.
trans-unit.target: Ja [lõpuks] ta kutsus ta isand mis need olid kriminaalmenetluse inimesed.

trans-unit.source: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.
trans-unit.target: [Jumal ütles], "siis sätestatud minu sulased öösel. Tõepoolest, olete püüda.

trans-unit.source: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."
trans-unit.target: Ja jätta mere vaikus. Nad tegelevad armee uppusid."

trans-unit.source: How much they left behind of gardens and springs
trans-unit.target: Kui palju nad jäänud aedade ja vedrud

trans-unit.source: And crops and noble sites
trans-unit.target: Ja kultuuride ja üllas saidid

trans-unit.source: And comfort wherein they were amused.
trans-unit.target: Ja mugavus, kus nad olid lõbustas.

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.
trans-unit.target: Seega. Ning me pärida teise inimesed.

trans-unit.source: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Ja taeva ja maa nuttis mitte nende jaoks, samuti olid nad reprieved.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -
trans-unit.target: Ja me kindlasti salvestatud Iisraeli laste alandava piin-

trans-unit.source: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Alates vaarao. Tõepoolest, ta oli ülbed hulgast ning transgressors.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Ja kindlasti valisime neid teadmisi üle [kõik] maailmad.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.
trans-unit.target: Ja andsime neile märke, et kus puudus selge kohtuprotsessi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying,
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need [uskottomille] on selge,

trans-unit.source: "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: "Seal ei ole, kuid meie esimesest surmast, ja me ei Ülestõusnud.

trans-unit.source: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Seejärel taastada [] meie esiisade kui peaksite olema tõesed."

trans-unit.source: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.
trans-unit.target: Kas nad parem või Tubba inimesed "ja need, mis on enne neid? Me hävitada, [sest] tõepoolest, need olid kurjategijad.

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.
trans-unit.target: Ja me ei tekitanud, taeva ja maa ja et nende mängimiseks vahel.

trans-unit.source: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Me ei loo neid, välja arvatud tõde, kuid enamik neist ei tea.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, ülestõusmise päeval on määratud ajal neid kõiki-

trans-unit.source: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -
trans-unit.target: Päev, millal mingit seost ei jõua vastav seos üldse ega on nad aidanud-

trans-unit.source: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Välja arvatud nende usklike kohta, kellele Jumal on armu. Tõepoolest, ta on ülendatud võiks, on Merciful.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, zaqqum puu

trans-unit.source: Is food for the sinful.
trans-unit.target: On toit sugulise.

trans-unit.source: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies
trans-unit.target: Nagu kahtlane õli, keedab jooksul kõhud

trans-unit.source: Like the boiling of scalding water.
trans-unit.target: Nagu kuum aur võib põletada vett keema.

trans-unit.source: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,
trans-unit.target: [See on käskinud], "teda haarata ja lohistage teda Hellfire, keset

trans-unit.source: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."
trans-unit.target: Seejärel valada üle tema pea põletushaavad vee piina."

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble!
trans-unit.target: [See ütles], "maitse! Tõepoolest, teil on au, üllameelne!

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, see on mida sa kasutada vaidlusteks."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place;
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, õige on kindlas kohas;

trans-unit.source: Within gardens and springs,
trans-unit.target: Aiad ja vedrud,

trans-unit.source: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.
trans-unit.target: Seljas [rõivad] trahvi siid ja brokaat, vastakuti.

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
trans-unit.target: Seega. Ja me abielluda neile õiglase naistele suur, [ilus] silmad.

trans-unit.source: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.
trans-unit.target: Nad nõuavad seal jaoks iga [omamoodi] puu - ohutu ja turvaline.

trans-unit.source: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire
