trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.
trans-unit.target: Tegelikult on Jumal, kes on [pidev] pakkuja tugevus kindlalt valdaja.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, neile, kes on vääriti koheldud on osa [karistuse] nagu nende eelkäijad osa nii lasin mitte kärsitult Kutsun mina.

trans-unit.source: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.
trans-unit.target: Ja häda neile, kes on disbelieved, mida nad on lubanud päevast.

trans-unit.source: By the mount
trans-unit.target: Poolt mäel

trans-unit.source: And [by] a Book inscribed
trans-unit.target: Ja [poolt] raamat kirjutatud

trans-unit.source: In parchment spread open
trans-unit.target: Pärgament levinud avatud

trans-unit.source: And [by] the frequented House
trans-unit.target: Ja [poolt] sageli külastatavates House

trans-unit.source: And [by] the heaven raised high
trans-unit.target: Ja [poolt] taevas kasvanud kõrge

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],
trans-unit.target: Ja [poolt] meri täitis [tulega]

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, teie Issandat karistuse tagajärge.

trans-unit.source: Of it there is no preventer.
trans-unit.target: See ei ole vältija.

trans-unit.source: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion
trans-unit.target: Päeval taevas näidatakse võnkuma ringliikumine koos

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will pass on, departing -
trans-unit.target: Ja mägedes mööda linna, lahkuvad -

trans-unit.source: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Siis häda, et päevas, vaatama,

trans-unit.source: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.
trans-unit.target: Kes on lõbusa ise [tühi] diskursuses.

trans-unit.source: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],
trans-unit.target: Nad on tõukejõu tulekahju põrgu poole [tugev] tõuke [ütlevad oma inglid], päev

trans-unit.source: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.
trans-unit.target: "See on tulekahju, mida kasutasite eitada.

trans-unit.source: Then is this magic, or do you not see?
trans-unit.target: Siis on see magic või te ei näe?

trans-unit.source: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [Enter] põletada; Seejärel tuleb patsiendile või kannatamatu - see on kõik sama teile. Teil on ainult olles recompensed [jaoks] mida sa kasutada seda teha."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, õigemeelsed toimub aiad ja rõõm,

trans-unit.source: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Nautida nende Issand on andnud neile ja nende Issand kaitstud neid Hellfire karistuse.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [Nad räägitakse], "Söö ja jook rahulolu, mida sa kasutada seda teha."

trans-unit.source: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
trans-unit.target: Nad näidatakse lebamis troonid rivistatud, ja me abielluda neile õiglase naistele suur, [ilus] silmad.

trans-unit.source: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes uskusid ja kelle järeltulijad nende järel usus - me liitub nendega nende järglastel ning me ei võta neile midagi nende teod. Iga isiku jaoks ta teenis, on alles.

trans-unit.source: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.
trans-unit.target: Ja anname need puuvilju ja liha, mida iganes nad soovivad.

trans-unit.source: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.
trans-unit.target: Nad vahetavad omavahel tassi [veini] milles [tulemused] haige kõnet või komisjoni patu.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.
trans-unit.target: Seal hakkavad ringlema [sulane] nende seas poiste [eriti] neid, nagu oleksid need pärlid hästi kaitstud.

trans-unit.source: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
trans-unit.target: Ja need lähenevad üksteisele täitetoimingutega omavahel.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].
trans-unit.target: Nad ütlevad, "tõepoolest, me olime varem [Epämieluisa Jumal] kardavad meie inimeste seas.

trans-unit.source: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.
trans-unit.target: Nii Jumal meid kasuks antud ja kaitstud meile kõrvetav tulekahju karistuse.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, me kasutasime teda enne supplicate. Ongi tema, kes on Beneficent, on Merciful."

trans-unit.source: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.
trans-unit.target: Nii meenutavad [O Muhammad], sa ei ole, poolt kasuks teie Issand, mille Arbuja või hull.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"
trans-unit.target: Või nad öelda, [,], "Luuletaja kellele ootame ebaõnne aega?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
trans-unit.target: Öelda, "Oota, tõepoolest olen, koos sinuga, kelnerid seas."

trans-unit.source: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?
trans-unit.target: Tehke oma mõtetes käsk neid [öelda] või on nad transgressing inimesi?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Või nad ütlevad, "ta on muutnud"? Pigem on nad usuvad.

trans-unit.source: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: Siis lasta neil koostab meeldib, kui nad peaksid olema tõesed.

trans-unit.source: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?
trans-unit.target: Olid nad loonud midagi või olid nad loojad [ise]?

trans-unit.source: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.
trans-unit.target: Või kas nad luua taeva ja maa? Pigem on ei teatud.

trans-unit.source: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?
trans-unit.target: Või on nad oma Issanda hoiukohaks [sisaldava sätte]? Või on need kontrollerid [neist]?

trans-unit.source: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.
trans-unit.target: Või on nad trepp [taevasse], pärast mida nad kuulama? Siis lase oma kuulaja toota selget volitust.

trans-unit.source: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
trans-unit.target: Või on ta tütred, pojad installides?

trans-unit.source: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
trans-unit.target: Või ei, [O Muhammad], küsida neid makse, et nad on tagatud võlaga koormatud alla?

trans-unit.source: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
trans-unit.target: Või on nad [tundmine] nähtamatu, nii et nad [selle] üles kirjutama?

trans-unit.source: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.
trans-unit.target: Või kavandatavate plaan? Kuid need, kes usu - nad on objekti plaani.

trans-unit.source: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Või on nad jumalus, välja arvatud Jumal? Ülendatud on Allah üle iganes nad seostavad teda.

trans-unit.source: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."
trans-unit.target: Ja need oleksid näha taeva alla, nad ütleksid, katkend "[see on pelgalt] Pilved kuhjaga."

trans-unit.source: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -
trans-unit.target: Nii lahkuda enne, kui nad vastavad nende päev, kus nad olen tabanud tapvat-

trans-unit.source: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.
trans-unit.target: Päeval nende plaan ei jõua neid üldse, samuti on nad aidanud.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ja tõepoolest, neile, kes on vääriti koheldud on karistus enne seda, kuid enamik neist ei tea.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.
trans-unit.target: Ja kannatlik, [O Muhammad] otsuse oma Issanda jaoks tõepoolest, te olete meie silmis. Ja ülendab [Jumalat] oma Issanda kiituseks, kui püsti.

trans-unit.source: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
trans-unit.target: Ja osa öösel talle ülendab ja pärast [Seadistus] tähte.

trans-unit.source: By the star when it descends,
trans-unit.target: Kui see laskub, Star

trans-unit.source: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,
trans-unit.target: Sinu kaaslane [Muhammad] on eksinud, samuti on ta eksinud,

trans-unit.source: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.
trans-unit.target: Samuti ei ta sõna: [oma] kalle.

trans-unit.source: It is not but a revelation revealed,
trans-unit.target: Ei ole aga ilmutus näitas,

trans-unit.source: Taught to him by one intense in strength -
trans-unit.target: Õpetas talle üks tugev, tugev-

trans-unit.source: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form
trans-unit.target: Üks usaldatavust. Ja ta tõusis [tema] tõsi vorm

trans-unit.source: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.
trans-unit.target: Kui ta oli kõrgem [osa selle] horizon.

trans-unit.source: Then he approached and descended
trans-unit.target: Siis ta lähenes ja laskus

trans-unit.source: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.
trans-unit.target: Ja oli eemalt kaks vibu pikkused või lähemal.

trans-unit.source: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta näitas tema teenija, ta näitas.

trans-unit.source: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.
trans-unit.target: Süda ei valeta [umbes] mida ta nägi.

trans-unit.source: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?
trans-unit.target: Nii on teil vaidluste temaga üle mida ta nägi?

trans-unit.source: And he certainly saw him in another descent
trans-unit.target: Ja ta kindlasti nägi teda teine laskumine

trans-unit.source: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -
trans-unit.target: Kell Lote puu äärmiselt piiri-

trans-unit.source: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -
trans-unit.target: Lähedal on varjupaik Aed-

trans-unit.source: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].
trans-unit.target: Kuuluvate Lote puu, et mis hõlmatud [on].

trans-unit.source: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].
trans-unit.target: [Prohvet] silmist ei kõrvalepõige, ega see ületaks [oma piirangu].

trans-unit.source: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Ta kindlasti nägi ta isand suurim märke.

trans-unit.source: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?
trans-unit.target: Nii et kas oled mõelnud al-Lat ja al-'Uzza?

trans-unit.source: And Manat, the third - the other one?
trans-unit.target: Ja Manat, kolmas - teine?

trans-unit.source: Is the male for you and for Him the female?
trans-unit.target: Kas mees teile ja teda naissoost?

trans-unit.source: That, then, is an unjust division.
trans-unit.target: Mis, siis on alusetu osakond.

trans-unit.source: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.
trans-unit.target: Nad ei ole, kuid [lihtsalt] nimed on nimeks neile - teie ja teie esiisade - milleks Jumal on saatnud oma autoriteeti. Nad järgivad ei oletus ja [oma] hinge soov peale ja seal on juba pärit neile nende Issand arendus.

trans-unit.source: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?
trans-unit.target: Või on seal mees mida iganes ta soovib?

trans-unit.source: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: Pigem Allah kuulub edaspidi ja esimene [elu].

trans-unit.source: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui palju inglid seal on taevas kelle eestkostmine näidatakse Kasuta üldse välja arvatud [ainult] pärast Jumalat lubatud [ta] kellele ta testamentide ja kiidab.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes ei usu edaspidi nime inglid naiste nimed,

trans-unit.source: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.
trans-unit.target: Ja neil on sellest kaotusest. Nad järgivad välja arvatud ei oletus, ja tõepoolest, eelduse kasutab mitte tõe vastu üldse.

trans-unit.source: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.
trans-unit.target: Nii omakorda eemal kes pöörab selja meie sõnumi ja soove ei peale maise elu.

trans-unit.source: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.
trans-unit.target: Mis on nende teadmiste summa. Tõepoolest, teie Issand on enamik teades kes strays alates oma teed ja ta on enamik teades, kes juhindub.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -
trans-unit.target: Ja Allah kuulub iganes on taevas ja mis iganes on Earth - et ta palk neile, kes teevad kurja [kahju] mida nad teinud ja need, kes seda hea parim [tasu] - palk

trans-unit.source: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.
trans-unit.target: Need, kes vältida suuri patte ja immoralities, ainult [toime] väikesed. Teie Issand on tõepoolest suur andestust. Ta oli enamik teades teid kui ta toodetud maast ja kui sa olid looted teie emad emaka. Nii väidavad end olevat puhas; Ta on enamik teades, kes kardab teda.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who turned away
trans-unit.target: Kas olete näinud kes pöörasid

trans-unit.source: And gave a little and [then] refrained?
trans-unit.target: Ja andis vähe ja [siis] soostunud?

trans-unit.source: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?
trans-unit.target: Kas tal on teadmised nähtamatu, nii et ta näeb?

trans-unit.source: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses
trans-unit.target: Või ta ei ole teavitatud mis oli Moses pühakirja

trans-unit.source: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -
trans-unit.target: Ja [ning] Abraham, kes täitnud [kohustused]-

trans-unit.source: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another
trans-unit.target: Et ükski koormuse kandjaks kannab teise koormuse

trans-unit.source: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives
trans-unit.target: Ja et seal ei ole mehe peale selle hea eest, mida ta püüab

trans-unit.source: And that his effort is going to be seen -
trans-unit.target: Ja et tema jõupingutusi saab vaadelda-

trans-unit.source: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense
trans-unit.target: Siis ta näidatakse recompensed seda nii palju registreerimiskohas

trans-unit.source: And that to your Lord is the finality
trans-unit.target: Ja et teie Issand on lõplikkus

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep
trans-unit.target: Ja et see on see, kes teeb [üks] naerma ja nutma

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who causes death and gives life
trans-unit.target: Ja et see on tema, kes põhjustab surma ja toob elule

trans-unit.source: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -
trans-unit.target: Ja et ta loob kaks tiimikaaslaste - mees ja naine-

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted
trans-unit.target: Alates sperma tilk kui see kiirgab

trans-unit.source: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation
trans-unit.target: Ja selle [ametisoleva] talle on järgmise loomine

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who enriches and suffices
trans-unit.target: Ja et see on tema, kes rikastab ja piisab

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius
trans-unit.target: Ja et see on tema, kes on Issand Sirius

trans-unit.source: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad
trans-unit.target: Ja et ta hävitas esimene [rahvas] ' Aad

trans-unit.source: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -
trans-unit.target: Ja Thamud - ja ta ei varuosad [neid]-

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.
trans-unit.target: Ja noa enne inimesi. Tõepoolest, see oli neil, kes olid [isegi] alusetu ja repressiivsed.

trans-unit.source: And the overturned towns He hurled down
trans-unit.target: Ta hurled alla kukuks linnade

trans-unit.source: And covered them by that which He covered.
trans-unit.target: Ja see, mida ta kaetud hõlmatud.

trans-unit.source: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?
trans-unit.target: Siis mis soosib teie Issand teil kahtlus?

trans-unit.source: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.
trans-unit.target: See prohvet on nagu endine warners warner.

trans-unit.source: The Approaching Day has approached.
trans-unit.target: Päeval läheneb on lähenes.

trans-unit.source: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.
trans-unit.target: Ta, [omadest] peale Allahi on mingit remover.

trans-unit.source: Then at this statement do you wonder?
trans-unit.target: Siis see avaldus kell imestate?

trans-unit.source: And you laugh and do not weep
trans-unit.target: Ja naerda ja nutta

trans-unit.source: While you are proudly sporting?
trans-unit.target: Kuigi olete uhkelt spordi?

trans-unit.source: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].
trans-unit.target: Nii polvistuvan Allah ja kummardama [talle].

trans-unit.source: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
trans-unit.target: Tunnis on ligidale ja moon kombineeris [kahes].

trans-unit.source: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
trans-unit.target: Ja kui nad näevad ime, nad tõlgivad ja öelda: "Passing võlu."

trans-unit.source: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
trans-unit.target: Ja nad keelata ning järgida oma kalduvustele. Aga iga asi on küla [aeg].

trans-unit.source: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
trans-unit.target: Ja seal on juba jõudnud neile teavet, et kus on hoiatav mõju-

trans-unit.source: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
trans-unit.target: Ulatuslik tarkus - aga hoiatus ei abista [neid].

trans-unit.source: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
trans-unit.target: Nii et jäta neid [O Muhammad]. Helistaja kutsub midagi keelata, päev

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
trans-unit.target: Nende silmad alandlikuks, nad tekivad haudoistaan siiretena rohutirtsud leviku,

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
trans-unit.target: Võidusõidu ees, helistajale suunas. Kui uskottomille öeldakse "See on raske päev."

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
trans-unit.target: Noah inimesed eitas enne neid, ja nad eitada meie teenija ja ütles: "Hull," ja ta oli repelled.

trans-unit.source: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
trans-unit.target: Nii ta toetuda oma isanda "Tõepoolest, ma olen Surun, nii aidata."

trans-unit.source: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
trans-unit.target: Siis avasime ka Taeva väravad, valades ette vihma

trans-unit.source: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
trans-unit.target: Põhjustatud lõhkemisega springs maa ja vete täidetud juba predestined asi.

trans-unit.source: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
trans-unit.target: Ja viisime talle mõne [ehitus] plangud ja küüned,

trans-unit.source: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
trans-unit.target: Purjetamine nagu ta, keda oli lubatud tasu meie vaatluse all.

trans-unit.source: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ja me vasakule märgiks, nii on seal kõik, kes mäletavad?

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: Ja kuidas [tugev] olid minu karistus ja hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ja oleme kindlasti teinud Koraan lihtne mälestuseks, nii on olemas keegi, kes mäletavad?

trans-unit.source: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: "Aad eitada; ja kuidas [tugev] olid minu karistus ja hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, saatsime neile karjuvad Tuul päeval pidev ebaõnn,

trans-unit.source: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
trans-unit.target: Taastan inimesed, nagu oleksid need šahtid palmipuudest sunnitud oma kodudest lahkuma.

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: Ja kuidas [tugev] olid minu karistus ja hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ja oleme kindlasti teinud Koraan lihtne mälestuseks, nii on olemas keegi, kes mäletavad?

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied the warning
trans-unit.target: Thamud eitas hoiatus

trans-unit.source: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: Ja ütles, "on üks inimene seas meile, et me eemale? Tõepoolest, siis oleks meil viga ja hullus.

trans-unit.source: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
trans-unit.target: Sõnum saadetud ta meie hulgast? Pigem on ta ülbe valetaja."

trans-unit.source: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
trans-unit.target: Nad teavad homme, kes on ülbe valetaja.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, saadame ta-camel, kui kohtuprotsess, nii et neid vaatama ja kannatlikkust.

trans-unit.source: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
trans-unit.target: Ja teatama, et vesi vahetatakse iga [päev] drink [by turn] käis nende vahel.

trans-unit.source: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
trans-unit.target: Aga nad kutsusid oma kaaslane ja ta julges ja Läänerinde [tema].

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: Ja kuidas [tugev] olid minu karistus ja hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, saatsime neile ühe blast taevast, ja nad said nagu kuiv oksake killud [loom] pliiatsi.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ja oleme kindlasti teinud Koraan lihtne mälestuseks, nii on olemas keegi, kes mäletavad?

trans-unit.source: The people of Lot denied the warning.
trans-unit.target: Palju inimesi eitas hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, me saatis neile tormi kivid, välja arvatud palju pere - me salvestada neid enne koitu

trans-unit.source: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
trans-unit.target: Nagu meie kasuks. Seega me kes tänab rahuldust.

trans-unit.source: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta oli juba hoiatas neid meie rünnak, kuid nad vaidlustanud hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
trans-unit.target: Ja neil oleks kindel teda oma külalistele, kuid me kustutatakse nende silmad [öelda], "Maitse minu karistus ja hoiatuse."

trans-unit.source: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ja tuli neile hommikuks seaduskuulekad karistuse.

trans-unit.source: So taste My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: Nii maitse minu karistus ja hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ja oleme kindlasti teinud Koraan lihtne mälestuseks, nii on olemas keegi, kes mäletavad?

trans-unit.source: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
trans-unit.target: Ja kindlasti tuli vaarao rahvale hoiatus.

trans-unit.source: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: Nad eitada meie märke, kõik neist, nii et me arestitud neid arestimise ühe ülendatud linnas võiks ja täiuslik võimesse.

trans-unit.source: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
trans-unit.target: On oma uskottomille parem kui need [endine, need] või olete puutumatus pühakiri?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
trans-unit.target: Või nad ütlevad, "Me oleme toetamine [üksteisele] koost"?

trans-unit.source: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
trans-unit.target: [Nende] assamblee saab lüüa ja nad pöörduvad nende selja [retriidi].

trans-unit.source: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
trans-unit.target: Aga tunnis on asumisel [jaoks nõuetekohase karistuse], ja tunnis on rohkem katastroofilised ja rohkem mõru.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, kurjategijad on viga ja hullus.

trans-unit.source: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
trans-unit.target: Päeval nad vedasid Tulle oma nägu [see ütles], "Touch Saqar maitse."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, kõik asjad oleme loonud saatus.

trans-unit.source: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
trans-unit.target: Ja meie käsk on vaid üks, nagu pilgul silma.

trans-unit.source: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ja meil on juba hävitatud liigid, nii on olemas keegi, kes mäletavad?

trans-unit.source: And everything they did is in written records.
trans-unit.target: Ja kõik nad on teinud aastal kirjalikes registrites.

trans-unit.source: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Ja iga väike ning suur [asja] on märgitud.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, õige on üheks aiad ja jõed,

trans-unit.source: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: Istuv honor lähedal suveräänsus, täiuslik võimesse.

trans-unit.source: The Most Merciful
trans-unit.target: Viimane armuline

trans-unit.source: Taught the Qur'an,
trans-unit.target: Õpetada Koraan,

trans-unit.source: Created man,
trans-unit.target: Loodud mees,

trans-unit.source: [And] taught him eloquence.
trans-unit.target: [Ja] õpetas teda ilukõne.

trans-unit.source: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,
trans-unit.target: Päike ja kuu [liikuda] poolt täpset arvutamist,

trans-unit.source: And the stars and trees prostrate.
trans-unit.target: Ja tähed ja puude polvistuvan.

trans-unit.source: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
trans-unit.target: Ja taevas ta tõstatas ja kehtestada tasakaal

trans-unit.source: That you not transgress within the balance.
trans-unit.target: Et sa ei ületaks jooksul tasakaalu.

trans-unit.source: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.
trans-unit.target: Ja loovad kaal õiglus ja ei tee puudulik tasakaal.

trans-unit.source: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta pani [saada] olendid maa peal.

trans-unit.source: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
trans-unit.target: Seal on puu ja palmi puud lasknud kestad [kuupäev] ning

trans-unit.source: And grain having husks and scented plants.
trans-unit.target: Ja tera kestad ja lõhnav taimed.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.
trans-unit.target: Ta lõi mees meeldib, [et] clay keraamika.

trans-unit.source: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.
trans-unit.target: Ja ta lõi selle dzinni suitsuta leegiga tulekahju.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.
trans-unit.target: [On] Isand kaks päikesetõusu ja isand kaks päikeseloojanguid.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
trans-unit.target: Ta vabastati kahe mere kohtumine [pool];

trans-unit.source: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.
trans-unit.target: Nende vahel on takistuseks [nii] mitte ei transgresses.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.
trans-unit.target: Mõlemas neist tekkima pärl ja korall.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
trans-unit.target: Ja talle kuuluvad laevad [koos purjed] kõrgenenud meres nagu mäed.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: Everyone upon the earth will perish,
trans-unit.target: Igaüks rahvahulgal hukkub,

trans-unit.source: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
trans-unit.target: Ja jääb nägu Lord, Majesteedi omanik ja au.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.
trans-unit.target: Kes on taeva ja maa küsib temalt; iga päev ta toob kaasa asja.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.
trans-unit.target: Me osaleda teile, O silmapaistev olendid.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].
trans-unit.target: O ettevõtte dzinni ja inimkond, kui teil on võimalik minna kaugemale taevas ja maa, sealt läbi. Te ei andke välja arvatud asutuse [Jumalalt].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.
trans-unit.target: Seal saadetakse teie peale tule ja suitsu leek ja sa ei saa kaitsta endid.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -
trans-unit.target: Ja kui taevas on jagatud avatud ja muutub rose-colored, nagu nafta-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks? -

trans-unit.source: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.
trans-unit.target: Siis sellel päeval ükski küsiti tema patuta mehed või dzinni.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
trans-unit.target: Kurjategijad selguvad nende kaubamärkidega ja need tuleb ära ka forelocks ja jalgade.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.
trans-unit.target: See on põrgu, mida kurjategijad eitada.

trans-unit.source: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].
trans-unit.target: Nad lähevad ja kerisega [äärmiselt määral] karvatustamisveega.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -
trans-unit.target: Aga kes on kartsid oma isanda positsiooni on kaks aiad-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks? -

trans-unit.source: Having [spreading] branches.
trans-unit.target: Olles [levib] oksad.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are two springs, flowing.
trans-unit.target: Nad mõlemad on kaks springs, voolav.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.
trans-unit.target: Nad mõlemad on iga puu kahesugused.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
trans-unit.target: [On] lebamis voodit mille hõõrdkatted on siid brokaat ning nende kahe aiad puu ripub madal.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -
trans-unit.target: Neist on naised piiravad [nende] pilke, enne neid puutumatuna mees või jinni -

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks? -

trans-unit.source: As if they were rubies and coral.
trans-unit.target: Justkui oleks rubiinid ja korall.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
trans-unit.target: On hea, [midagi] aga hea palk?

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -
trans-unit.target: Ja nende alla mõlemad [in excellence] on kaks [other] aiad-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks? -

trans-unit.source: Dark green [in color].
trans-unit.target: Tume roheline [color].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are two springs, spouting.
trans-unit.target: Nad mõlemad on kaks springs, spouting.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.
trans-unit.target: Nad mõlemad on puu ja palmi puud ja Granaatõunad.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: In them are good and beautiful women -
trans-unit.target: Neist on head ja ilusad naised-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks? -

trans-unit.source: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -
trans-unit.target: Need reserveeritud paviljonid - Fair

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks? -

trans-unit.source: Untouched before them by man or jinni -
trans-unit.target: Enne neid puutumatuna mees või jinni-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks? -

trans-unit.source: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.
trans-unit.target: Lebamis rohelised padjad ja ilus trahvi vaibad.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Mis soosib teie Issand teil laseks?

trans-unit.source: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
trans-unit.target: Õnnistatud on Issand, Majesteedi omanik ja au.

trans-unit.source: When the Occurrence occurs,
trans-unit.target: Kindlustusjuhtumi toimumise

trans-unit.source: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.
trans-unit.target: Ei, selle toimumist mingit eitamise.

trans-unit.source: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].
trans-unit.target: See alandada [mõned] ja [teised] üles tõsta.

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with convulsion
trans-unit.target: Kuna maa on raputanud krambid

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling
trans-unit.target: Ja mägedes on jaotatud, lagunev

trans-unit.source: And become dust dispersing.
trans-unit.target: Ja tolmu pritsimiseks.

trans-unit.source: And you become [of] three kinds:
trans-unit.target: Ja jääte [ning] kolmel viisil:

trans-unit.source: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
trans-unit.target: Seejärel kaaslased õigus - millised on õigus kaaslasega?

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
trans-unit.target: Ja vasakule - mis on vasakult kaaslased kaaslasega?

trans-unit.source: And the forerunners, the forerunners -
trans-unit.target: Ja maa, maa-

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]
trans-unit.target: Need on need, mis on toonud lähedal [Jumal]

trans-unit.source: In the Gardens of Pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Rõõm, aiad

trans-unit.source: A [large] company of the former peoples
trans-unit.target: [] Suurettevõte endine Rahvaste

trans-unit.source: And a few of the later peoples,
trans-unit.target: Ja mõned hiljem Rahvaste

trans-unit.source: On thrones woven [with ornament],
trans-unit.target: Troonid kootud [koos ornament],

trans-unit.source: Reclining on them, facing each other.
trans-unit.target: Lebamis, vastakuti.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal
trans-unit.target: Seal liigelda nende tehtud igavene noormeeste seas

trans-unit.source: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -
trans-unit.target: Laevade, pitchers ja tass [veini] voolav kevadest-

trans-unit.source: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -
trans-unit.target: Mingit peavalu näidatakse neil sellest, samuti ei nad joobeseisundis-

trans-unit.source: And fruit of what they select
trans-unit.target: Ja mida nad valige viljad

trans-unit.source: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.
trans-unit.target: Ja liha fowl: mida iganes nad soovivad.

trans-unit.source: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,
trans-unit.target: Ja [nad on] õiglane naiste suur, [ilus] silmad,

trans-unit.source: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,
trans-unit.target: Sarnasusi pärlid hästi kaitstud,

trans-unit.source: As reward for what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Nagu nad varem ei tasu.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -
trans-unit.target: Nad ei kuule seal haige kõnet või komisjoni Sin-

trans-unit.source: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."
trans-unit.target: Ainult ütlus: "Rahu, rahu"

trans-unit.source: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
trans-unit.target: Õigus - millised on õigus kaaslased kaaslasega?

trans-unit.source: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed
trans-unit.target: [Neid] seas lote puud, mille okkad ära

trans-unit.source: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]
trans-unit.target: Ja [banaanipõõsad] kihiline [puuviljadega]

trans-unit.source: And shade extended
trans-unit.target: Ja laiendatud varju

trans-unit.source: And water poured out
trans-unit.target: Ja vesi valatakse

trans-unit.source: And fruit, abundant [and varied],
trans-unit.target: Ja puu, rikkalik [ja vaheldusrikas],

trans-unit.source: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,
trans-unit.target: [Et hooaeg] piiratud ega keelatud,

trans-unit.source: And [upon] beds raised high.
trans-unit.target: Ja [korral] voodid tõstetud kõrgele.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, oleme valmistanud naiste paradiis [uus] loomine

trans-unit.source: And made them virgins,
trans-unit.target: Ja tegi neist neitsid,

trans-unit.source: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,
trans-unit.target: Pühendatud [abikaasasid] ja võrdse vana,

trans-unit.source: For the companions of the right [who are]
trans-unit.target: Kaaslased õigust [kes ei] jaoks

trans-unit.source: A company of the former peoples
trans-unit.target: Äriühingu endine Rahvaste

trans-unit.source: And a company of the later peoples.
trans-unit.target: Ja hiljem Rahvaste ettevõte.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
trans-unit.target: Ja vasakule - mis on vasakult kaaslased kaaslasega?

trans-unit.source: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water
trans-unit.target: [Neid] kõrvetav tulekahju ja põletushaavad vee

trans-unit.source: And a shade of black smoke,
trans-unit.target: Ja varju must suits,

trans-unit.source: Neither cool nor beneficial.
trans-unit.target: Ei lahe ega kasulik.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest nad olid enne seda indulging rikkusest,

trans-unit.source: And they used to persist in the great violation,
trans-unit.target: Ja nad kasutasid püsib suur rikutakse

trans-unit.source: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: Ja nad kasutasid öelda, "kui me sureme ja muutuvad tolmu ja kondid, me tõepoolest Ülestõusnud?

trans-unit.source: And our forefathers [as well]?"
trans-unit.target: Ja meie esiisade [ning], ja?"

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples
trans-unit.target: Ütlen, [O Muhammad], "tõepoolest, endine ja hiljem Rahvaste

trans-unit.source: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."
trans-unit.target: Oled kogunesid ametissenimetamise teadaolev päev."

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,
trans-unit.target: Siis tõepoolest, sa O olijatele astray [] Salgajate,

trans-unit.source: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum
trans-unit.target: Zaqqum puude süüa

trans-unit.source: And filling with it your bellies
trans-unit.target: Ja täites sellega oma kõhud

trans-unit.source: And drinking on top of it from scalding water
trans-unit.target: Ja põletushaavad vee peal seda juues

trans-unit.source: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.
trans-unit.target: Ja juua nii janu kaamelid joomine.

trans-unit.source: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: See on nende majutus päeva palk.

trans-unit.source: We have created you, so why do you not believe?
trans-unit.target: Oleme loonud teile, nii et miks te ei usu?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen that which you emit?
trans-unit.target: Kas olete näinud seda, mis te paisata?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?
trans-unit.target: See on teile, kes loob see või me looja?

trans-unit.source: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone
trans-unit.target: Meil on otsustatud surma teie seas ja oleme, et mitte maha jääda

trans-unit.source: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Selles me muuta teie sarnasusi ja toodavad teile sel kujul, mis ei tea.

trans-unit.source: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: Ning teil on juba teada esimene loomine, nii et te ei mäleta?

trans-unit.source: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?
trans-unit.target: Ja kas olete näinud, et mis mis külvata?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?
trans-unit.target: Kas sa, kes ta kasvada või kasvataja me oleme?

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,
trans-unit.target: Kui meil kombeks, saaksime it [Keemiline] praht ja teil jääb ime,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;
trans-unit.target: [Öelda], "tõepoolest, meil on [nüüd] võlgu;

trans-unit.source: Rather, we have been deprived."
trans-unit.target: Pigem on meil on ilma jäetud."

trans-unit.source: And have you seen the water that you drink?
trans-unit.target: Ja kas olete näinud juua vett?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?
trans-unit.target: Kas see kes tõi selle maha pilved, või on see meil, kes seda alandada?

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?
trans-unit.target: Kui meil kombeks, saaksime seda mõru, nii et mida sa ole tänulik?

trans-unit.source: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?
trans-unit.target: Ja te näinud olete süüdata tulekahju?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?
trans-unit.target: Kas see teile kes toodetud oma puu, või on meil tootja?

trans-unit.source: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,
trans-unit.target: Oleme teinud meeldetuletus ja eraldise reisijad,

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Nii ülendab teie Issand, viimane suur nimi.

trans-unit.source: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,
trans-unit.target: Siis ma vannun tähte, seades

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.
trans-unit.target: Ja tegelikult on vande - kui sa ei tea - [viimane] suur.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, see on üllas Koraan

trans-unit.source: In a Register well-protected;
trans-unit.target: Registrisse, mis on hästi kaitstud;

trans-unit.source: None touch it except the purified.
trans-unit.target: Ükski seda puudutada, välja arvatud selle puhastatud.

trans-unit.source: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: [On] Maailmade Issanda ilmutus.

trans-unit.source: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent
trans-unit.target: Siis on see avaldus, et olete ükskõikne

trans-unit.source: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?
trans-unit.target: Ja teha [tänu] teie säte, et [pakkuja] eitada?

trans-unit.source: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat
trans-unit.target: Siis miks, kui hing surmahetkel jõuab kurgus

trans-unit.source: And you are at that time looking on -
trans-unit.target: Ja siis on seda aega otsin edasi -

trans-unit.source: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -
trans-unit.target: Ja meie inglid on talle lähemal kui sina, aga sa ei näe-

trans-unit.source: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,
trans-unit.target: Siis miks sa ei ole, kui sa ei recompensed,

trans-unit.source: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?
trans-unit.target: Viia see tagasi, kui sa peaksid olema tõesed?

trans-unit.source: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,
trans-unit.target: Ja kui surnu oli nende lähedal Allahi tõi

trans-unit.source: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Seejärel [teda on] ülejäänud ja halastus ja Aed nauding.

trans-unit.source: And if he was of the companions of the right,
trans-unit.target: Ja kui ta oli õigus, kaaslased

trans-unit.source: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."
trans-unit.target: Seejärel [inglid ütlevad], "rahu teile; [on] õiguse kaaslased. "

trans-unit.source: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,
trans-unit.target: Aga kui ta oli [kes ei] Salgajate eksinud,

trans-unit.source: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water
trans-unit.target: Seejärel [teda on] üle saada põletushaavad vee

trans-unit.source: And burning in Hellfire
trans-unit.target: Hellfire kirjutamisel

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is the true certainty,
trans-unit.target: See on tõepoolest tõsi kindlus

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Nii ülendab teie Issand, viimane suur nimi.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Mis iganes on taevas ja maa exalts Jumal ja ta on ülendatud Might, tark.

trans-unit.source: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Tema on võim taevas ja maa. Ta annab elu ja surm, ja ta on üle kõik asjad pädev.

trans-unit.source: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ta on esimene ja Viimane, üleneja ja intiimne ja ta on kõik asjad, teades.

trans-unit.source: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: See on tema, kes lõi taeva ja maa kuue päevaga ja ise troonile eespool kehtestatud. Ta teab, mis tungib maasse ja koorub ta ja mis põlvneb taevas ja mida tõuseb ja ta on sinuga kõikjal. Ja Jumal, mida teha, on näha.

trans-unit.source: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: Tema on võim taevas ja maa. Ja Jumal on tagasi [kõik] on tähtis.

trans-unit.source: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Ta põhjustab öö sisestage kuupäev ja põhjustab päevast öö siseneda, ja ta on teades, et maksimaalselt rinnad.

trans-unit.source: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Usume Jumal ja tema saadik ja veeta välja selle, kus ta on teinud teile pärijatele. Neile, kes on teie seas uskusid ja veetis, tekib suur auhind.

trans-unit.source: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers?
trans-unit.target: Ja miks sa ei usu Jumal samas sõnumitooja kutsub teid uskuma oma Lord ja ta on võtnud oma pakti kui [tõeliselt] saab usklikud?

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: See on tema, kes saadab sätestatakse pärast tema sulane [Muhammad] salmid selged tõendid, et ta võib tuua teile darknesses valgusesse. Ja tõepoolest, Allah on teile lahke ja Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Ja miks sa ei saa kulutada Allah Jumalat et põhjus kuulub pärandi taeva ja maa? Ei võrdse teie seas on need, kes veetis enne [Makkah] vallutamist ja võitles [ja need, kes tegi seda pärast seda]. Need on suurem määral kui need, kes hiljem veetsime ja võitles. Aga kõik Jumala lubas parim [tasu]. Ja Jumal, mida teha, on teada.

trans-unit.source: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward?
trans-unit.target: Kes on see, et oleks laenu Allah kena laenu nii, et ta ajapikku teda ja ta on üllas tasu?

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Päeval, näete uskuda mehed ja naised, nende kerge menetluses enne neid ja nende õigust arvata, [see ütles], "oma rõõmusõnumit, mis on tänapäeval [ning] aiad all mis jõed tõusevad, kus te täitma igavesti." Seda on suur saavutamiseks.

trans-unit.source: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment.
trans-unit.target: Ajuvaba mehed ja naised, ajuvaba kes uskus, "Oota meid et me võib omandada mõningaid oma valgust." öelda [sama] Ta ütles: "Mine tagasi selja taha ja otsima valgust." Ja seina pannakse nendevahelist uks, selle interjöör sisaldavate halastust, kuid väljaspool seda on piin.

trans-unit.source: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah.
trans-unit.target: Silmakirjatsejatega kutsume usklikud, "Me ei olnud teiega?" Nad ütlevad, "Jah, aga vaevab iseendid ja kauaoodatud [ebaõnne meile] ja kahtles ja soovmõtlemisest eksitada teid kuni tuli käsk Jumal. Ja selle petja pettis teid Allah kohta.

trans-unit.source: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Nii et täna võetakse lunaraha teie ega need, kes disbelieved. Teie varjupaika on tulekahju. On enamik väärt teist, ja armetu on sihtkoht.

trans-unit.source: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: On aeg ei tulnud neile, kes oleks uskunud, et nende südamed peaks muutuma alandlikult alistuvad mälestuseks Jumal ja mida on tulnud ette tõde? Las nad ei ole nagu need, kes anti enne pühakiri ja pikaajaliselt läbida kogu neid, nii et kõvastunud nende südamed; ja paljud neist on väljakutsuvalt sõnakuulmatud.

trans-unit.source: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand.
trans-unit.target: Tean, et Jumal annab elu maa oma lifelessness pärast. Oleme teinud selge teile märke; ehk oskate.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, mehi, kes praktikas heategevus ja naistele, kes tegelikkuses heategevus ja [need kes] on laenatud Jumala kena laenu - korrutatakse neile ja nad on üllas tasu.

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes on uskunud Jumalat ja tema inglid - need on [Auastmed] toetajaid tõde ja märtrite koos nende Issand. Nende jaoks on nende tasu ja nende valgus. Kuid need, kes on disbelieved ja eitada meie Salme - need on Hellfire kaaslased.

trans-unit.source: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.
trans-unit.target: Tean, et elu selles maailmas on vaid meelelahutuseks ja diversiooni ja Ehted ja hooplemine üksteist ning konkurentsi kasv jõukuse ja lapsed - nagu vihm, kelle [mis] taime kasvu näide rõõmustavad mullafreesid; siis see kuivab ja näed seda pöördus kollane; siis muutub see [Hajus] praht. Ja edaspidi on karm karistus ja andestust Allah ja heakskiitu. Ja mis on välja arvatud soovmõtlemine nautida maise elu.

trans-unit.source: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: Rassi poole andestust oma Issanda ja Aed, mille laius on nagu taeva ja maa, valmis neile, kes uskus Jumalat ja tema inglid laius. See on Jumal, mille ta omistab kellega ta wills halastus ja Allah on suur halastus valdaja.

trans-unit.source: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy -
trans-unit.target: No katastroof maa peal või jagasite välja, et enne kui me toome selle kokkulangemise - tõepoolest et jaoks Jumal, on lihtne - registris, ei

trans-unit.source: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful -
trans-unit.target: Et te heitke meelt üle mis on hoidutaks ja ei exult [in uhkus] üle mida ta on andnud teile. Ja Allah ei meeldi kõigile füüsilisest eksitada ja hooplev-

trans-unit.source: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: [Neid] kes mõtled ja kohustab inimest stinginess korral. Ja kes iganes keerab ära - siis tõepoolest, Allah on vaja, et Praiseworthy tasuta.

trans-unit.source: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Me juba saatnud meie kullerid selgeid tõendeid ja saatnud oma nendega pühakiri ja et inimesed võivad säilitada [nende asjade] tasakaalu Euroopa. Ja saatsime ette raud, kus on suur sõjavägi võiks ja toob kasu inimestele, ja nii et Jumal võib teha ilmne need, kes toetavad teda ja tema käskjalad nähtamatu. Tõepoolest, Allah on võimas ja ülendatud võiks.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Ja me juba saatnud noa ja Aabraham ja paigutatud saavad järglased prophethood ja Pühakirja; ja nende seas on ta, kes ei juhindu, kuid paljud neist on väljakutsuvalt sõnakuulmatud.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Siis me saadetakse pärast nende jälgedes meie kullerid ja järgnes [neile] Jeesus, Maarja, poeg ja andis talle evangeeliumi. Ja meil on paigutatud südamed neid, kes teda järgis, kaastunde ja halastuse ja munklus, mis nad innovaatilisuse; Me ei ette seda neile välja arvatud [et nad tegid seda] Allah heakskiiduta. Kuid nad ei järginud seda nõuetekohaselt järgimine. Nii andsime need, kes uskusid nende seas oma tasu, kuid paljud neist on väljakutsuvalt sõnakuulmatud.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O kes oleks uskunud, kardavad, et Allah ja tema saadik; usuvad Ta [siis] annab sulle oma halastust Kolmeinimesetuba osa ja teha teile valgust mis siis kõndida ja andestan sulle; ja Jumal on Forgiving ja Merciful.

trans-unit.source: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: [On], et pühakiri inimesed võivad teada, et nad ei ole võimalik [saada] midagi halastus Jumal ja et [kõik] halastus on käsi Jumal; Ta annab selle, kellele ta tahab. Ja Jumala suur halastus valdaja.

trans-unit.source: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Kindlasti on Jumal kuulnud see, kes koos sinuga [O Muhammad], tema abikaasa kohta väidab ja suunab kaebuse Allah kõnes. Ja Jumal kuuleb oma dialoogi; Tõepoolest, Allah on kohtukõne ja nägemine.

trans-unit.source: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Need, kes hääldada thihar Joukostanne [eraldamiseks] alates nende naised - nad ei ole [seega] nende emad. Nende emad on puuduvad, kuid need, kes sünnitas neid. Ja tõepoolest, nad ütlevad, on taunitav kinnitus ja on valetamine. Aga tõepoolest, Allah on Pardoning ja Forgiving.

trans-unit.source: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Ja need, kes thihar nende naised hääldada sedagi [soovivad] liikuda tagasi nad ütlesid - siis [tuleb] vabastades ori, enne kui nad puudutavad üksteist. See on, mida sa oled manitses; ja Jumal on tuttav mida.

trans-unit.source: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ja kes ei leia [ori] - siis kiire kaks kuud järjest enne kui nad puudutavad üksteist; ja see, kes ei suuda - siis kuuskümmend vaeste inimeste toitmiseks. Mis on teile uskuda [täiesti] Allah ja tema saadik; ja need on piirid [määratud] Allah. Ja selle uskottomille on valus karistus.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes on vastu Allah ja tema saadik on abased kui enne neid olid abased. Ja me kindlasti saadetud salmid selged tõendid allapoole. Ja selle uskottomille on alandav karistus.

trans-unit.source: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: Päeval, kui Allah taaselustada neid kõiki ja teatama neile, mida nad tegid. Jumal oli küsitletud, kuigi nad unustasid ja Jumal on kõik asjad üle tunnistaja.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Kas sa ei mõelnud, et Jumal teab, mis on taevas ja mis on maa peal? Seal on viite, kuid mida ta on kuues neist - ei era vestlus kolm, vaid et ta on nendest neljas, samuti puuduvad ja mitte vähem kui selle ja rohkem, välja arvatud, et ta on nendega [teadlik] kui need on. Seejärel teatab ta neile, mida nad tegid, ülestõusmise päev. Tõepoolest Jumal on kõik asjad, teades.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Kas oled ei mõelnud neid, kes olid keelatud alates eravestlusi, siis nad tagasi seda, mis nad olid keelatud ning vestlevad omavahel patu ja agressiivsus ja sõnakuulmatuse Messenger? Ja kui nad tulevad, nad tervitan teid koos selle sõna, mis Jumal tervitan teid ja öelda omavahel, "Miks ei Jumal karistada meid eest mida me ütleme?" Piisav nende jaoks on põrgu, mis neil näidatakse [enter] kirjutamist ja armetu on sihtkoht.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: O kes on uskunud, kui sa vestelda privaatselt, mitte vestlevad patu ja agressiivsus ja sõnakuulmatuse Messenger kuid converse õigluses ja vagadus. Ja hirmu Jumal, kellele te kohtadest.

trans-unit.source: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Privaatne vestlus on ainult alates Saatan, et ta võib kurvastada, kes oleks uskunud, kuid ta ei kahjusta need üldse välja arvatud Jumala loal. Ja Allah olgu korral tugineda usklikud.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: O kes on uskunud, kui te olete rääkinud, "Kosmos endid" assambleedes teete ruumi; Jumal teeb sulle ruumi. Ja kui te olete rääkinud, "Tekivad", siis tekib; Jumal tõstab need, kes teie seast on uskunud ja need, kes anti teadmisi, kraadi võrra. Ja Jumal on tuttav mida.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O kes on uskunud, millal sa [soovist] eraviisiliselt konsulteerima sõnumitooja, esitada enne oma arutelu heategevus. Mis on sinu jaoks parem ja puhtam. Aga kui sa ei leia [tähendab] - siis tõepoolest, Allah on Forgiving ja Merciful.

trans-unit.source: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Ole sa kartsid esitada enne konsultatsiooni heategevusorganisatsioonid? Siis kui te seda ei tee ja Jumal on sulle andeks antud, siis [vähemalt] luua palve ja anna zakah ja kuuletuma Allah ja tema saadik. Ja Jumal on tuttav mida.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying].
trans-unit.target: Kas oled ei mõelnud neid, kes teevad liitlased inimesi, kellele Jumal on muutunud vihaseks? Nad ei ole teist ega neist ja nad vannun vale, kuigi nad teavad [nad valetavad].

trans-unit.source: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.
trans-unit.target: Jumal on valmis neid karm karistus. Ta oli paha, mida nad teevad.

trans-unit.source: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Nad võtsid oma [vale] vande nagu katmiseks, nii et nad hoidnud [inimesed] kuidas Jumal ja neil on alandav karistuse.

trans-unit.source: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally
trans-unit.target: Kunagi näidatakse oma rikkust või nende lapsed kasutada neid Allah vastu üldse. Need on kaaslased tulekahju; nad järgivad selles igavesti

trans-unit.source: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Linna päev Allah taaselustada neid kõiki ja nad näidatakse talle vannun, vannun teile ja arvan, et nad on [seisab] midagi. Kahtlemata on need, kes on valetas.

trans-unit.source: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers.
trans-unit.target: Saatan on neid ületada ja tegi neist mälestuseks Jumal unustada. Need on Saatana poole. Kahtlemata pool Saatana - neid kaotajad.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled.
trans-unit.target: Tõepoolest, need, kes on vastu Allah ja tema saadik - need olla seas kõige alandlikuks.

trans-unit.source: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Jumal kirjutas, "Ma kindlasti võidab, mul ja minu kullerid." Tõepoolest, Allah on võimas ja ülendatud võiks.

trans-unit.source: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Te ei leia inimesi, kes usuvad Jumalat ja millel kiindumust neile, kes on vastu Allah ja tema saadik, isegi kui nad olid oma isade või nende pojad või nende vendade või nende Hõimurahvaste viimasel päeval. Need - ta on otsustatud, maksimaalselt oma südamed usku ja toetanud neid vaim teda. Ja me tunnistavad neid aiad all mis jõed tõusevad, kus nad kinni igavesti. Jumal on rahul neile, ja nad on temaga rahul - need on Jumala poole. Kahtlemata osaline Allah - nad on edukas.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Mis iganes on taevas ja mis on maa peal exalts Allah ja ta on ülendatud Might, tark.

trans-unit.source: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision.
trans-unit.target: See on see, kes välja saata need, kes oma kodust esimene kogumine pühakiri rahva seas disbelieved. Te ei usu, nad lahkuvad ja nad arvasid, et nende kindlused kaitsevad neid Jumal; [kinnitatud] kuid Jumal tuli neile kui nad olid oodanud ja ta viskas terror nende südamesse [nii] need hävitada oma maja [oma] käed ja käed usklike poolt. Nii et võtke hoiatus, O inimesed nägemise.

trans-unit.source: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in [this] world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Ja kui mitte selle Jumal oli otsustatud, nende evakueerimist, ta oleks karistatud, neid [siin] maailmas ja neile edaspidi ei tule karistuse.

trans-unit.source: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Ongi, sest nad olid vastu, Allah ja tema saadik. Ja kes iganes ei nõua Jumal - siis Allah on tõepoolest raske karistus.

trans-unit.source: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Iganes sa [nende] palmipuudega kärpima või jättis alalise Reisikohvrid - see oli Jumala loal ja nii ta häbi väljakutsuvalt sõnakuulmatud.

trans-unit.source: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Ja mida Jumal taastada [omandiõiguse] sõnumitooja neilt - te ei mitte kannus seda [aastal ekspeditsiooni] hobust või kaamelid aga Jumal annab tema käskjalad võim üle, kellele ta tahab, ja Jumal on üle kõik asjad pädev.

trans-unit.source: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Ja mida Jumal taastatud sõnumitooja linnades - inimestelt on Allah ja sõnumitooja ja [tema] asuvaid sugulasi ja orbude [luhtunud] reisija - nii, et ei ole igavene jaotus rikaste seast. Ja mis iganes Messenger pakub teile - võtta; ja mida ta on keelatud sa - hoiduma. Ja hirm Jumala; Tõepoolest, Allah on raske karistus.

trans-unit.source: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful.
trans-unit.target: Kehv emigrantide, kes olid heidetud kodudest ja nende omadusi, keda Allah ja [tema] heakskiidu ja tõendavad Allah ja tema saadik, bounty [ka on osa]. Need on esitatud tõesed.
